job_desc: zk SNARKs  miners  nodes  bulls  bears  FOMO and FUD  Some of those terms may sound like Marvel villains or curse words   I should FUD you upside the head for staring at my nodes     but to a trained ear they spell m a g i c  In our view   and yes  it s a bold statement   crypto will be the currency your grandkids consider the norm Trading in these currencies used to be shady  until the launch of Cryptohopper  an AI driven bot that makes crypto trading accessible  fun  and worthwhile  Do you want to help people with a bot that hosts more than nine million transactions worth an estimated 2 billion USD each month  Show us what you got As our Data Analyst  You ll be  a hopefully extremely proud  member of our tech and product team  an eclectic mix of front and back end developers  Product specialists and Growth Hackers  Your team invents  analyses  co creates and develops the best possible solution for both n00bs and expert traders  On our way  we gather loads of valuable data and it s about time to let this lead us further along  As our Data Analyst you will gather  structure  analyze and visualize data and use this to identifying trends and underpin strategic decisions  All to improve our unique service in every way possible  You might even discover new crypto services as you go  Beats working on a weather app that does the same as 15 000 other ones  right  As you know the big wins with Data  you analyze and prioritize quickly evolving business requirements  what should we prioritize over other priorities that wrestle with quite a few more Hi  we re the tools Python  R  SAS  Tableau  PowerBI  Qlikview  SQL  NoSQL  Java  VBA  big data technology  Hadoop  Redshift  Spark  Presto  Hive You know you got this if   You bring 3 years of Data Analyses experience to the table  And yes  the more  the merrier   You are happy as a toddler on a sugar rush when you create an automated chart of complex data records   You thrive on Python  Tableau  AI  and all the nitty gritty data stuff   You are super curious about crypto  trading  and fin tech  pro traders allowed What we offer A mission driven culture with a great work life balance and a good benefits package  Sure  we work hard to get sh t done  but we also regularly push our moustache  sorry  it s a silly joke for Dutch readers  for a VR gaming session  picnics in the park  indoor bouldering  drinks at the pub  and whatever happens in our  wo man cave   can probably best stay there  The setting aside  we also   Pay you  big surprise    up to 50K   60K per year  skill dependent    Allow you to work wherever works best  including at least 1 or 2 days in our Amsterdam HQ   Send you on your merry way for 25 days each year  minimum  more is negotiable    Provide you with great gear  a high end laptop and whatever else you need to succeed   Shower you with extras  like trading benefits  discover the crypto maniac inside yourself    training budget  your own pingpong bat   Pour you a stiff drink on Fridays and laugh our ways towards the weekends  We sincerely look forward to hearing what s on your mind  too Ready to virtually meet our engineers We don t require  in fact  please don t  a long motivation letter  we d rather have a few pointers and a good chat to tell you everything you want to know  About life  the universe  and everything  Apply here  More information  Call or WhatsApp Laura Voorsluijs at  31614886381  n a for trading insights     Soort dienstverband  VoltijdsSollicitatievragen Do you live in the Netherlands

Wat ga je doen Heb jij een wo master in een beta studie en heb je affiniteit met data  Kickstart je data science carrière bij Detailresult Groep  Een  retail  wereld waarin de hoeveelheid data exponentieel toeneemt  waarin technologische innovaties elkaar in rap tempo opvolgen  waarin markten transparanter worden en klantbehoeften veranderen  brengt volop kansen en nieuwe uitdagingen met zich mee  Als Junior Data Scientist ben je onderdeel van het Advanced Analytics team en word jij in een zesweekse fulltime Data Science bootcamp klaargestoomd om impact te maken in de Food Retail  In ons kantoor in Amsterdam wordt er dankzij jou geen beslissing meer genomen op buikgevoel  maar op basis van analyse en feiten  Met jouw vernieuwende inzichten geef je input voor actuele vraagstukken die spelen bij Dirk en DekaMarkt  Welke voorraden zijn er binnen onze ruim 225 filialen nodig voor de komende Paasacties  Hoe passen we het assortiment perfect aan op het verzorgingsgebied per filiaal  En hoe optimaliseren we het pickproces in onze distributiecentra  Je werkzaamheden zijn hierin veelzijdig  je bent in het gehele proces betrokken en zorgt zo dat er een volledige end to end oplossing staat  Naast je modeleer  en programmeer werk doe je intakes  stem je af met de business  denk je na over de implementatie en zorg je samen met IT voor een geautomatiseerde output  Vanwege de grote verscheidenheid aan vraagstukken werk je samen met meerdere business units  van Commercie tot Logistiek en van Digital tot Marketing  Detailresult Groep is een organisatie met aanpakkers  jouw aanbevelingen zal je veelal direct in de praktijk zien  Een gemiddelde werkdag ziet er ongeveer als volgt uit Tijd en activiteit 9 00  9 30 Stand up met data science project team 9 30  11 00 Programmeren  SQL  Python  R  11 00  11 30 Telefonische afstemming met IT over live zetten van model 12 00  13 00 Lunch 13 00 14 00 Project meeting met business 14 00 15 00 Conceptueel modeleringsplan opstellen rondom het whiteboard samen met andere Data Scientisten 15 00 17 00 Modeleringsplan uitwerken in code  SQL  Python  R  17 00 17 30 Mail bijwerken Wat wij je bieden We stomen je klaar door middel van een zesweekse bootcamp tot een volwaardige Data Scientist professional  Hierna start je een interessante en uitdagende baan binnen de afdeling Advanced Analytics  Dit team is jong  compact  ambitieus en leergierig en sinds 2017 binnen Detailresult Groep gestart  Je werkt samen met je directe collega s maar ook met externe partijen die leading zijn binnen de wereld van Big Data en AI  Uiteraard zijn de randvoorwaarden goed geregeld  je krijgt een iPhone en laptop van de zaak  Er staat een groot Data Warehouse klaar met enorm grote datasets  dankzij een rijke historie  We bieden je een omgeving waarin kansen en mogelijkheden te over zijn  Alles staat klaar  we missen alleen jou nog  Om jou hierin een vlammende start te geven  investeren wij in je persoonlijke én professionele ontwikkeling  Daarnaast ontvang je goede primaire en secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden  zoals  Afhankelijk van ervaring een  start salaris tussen de  37 575   en  53 678   bruto per jaar inclusief vakantiegeld op basis van fulltime 30 vakantiedagen op fulltime basis Een thuiswerkregeling en flexibele werktijden Een jaarcontract  daarna een contract voor onbepaalde tijd Interne opleidings  en doorgroeimogelijkheden waarmee je vakinhoudelijke trainingen kunt volgen Een goede pensioenregeling en mogelijkheid tot deelname aan collectieve zorgverzekeringen en private leaseregeling Een  menukaart  waardoor je flexibel arbeidsvoorwaarden uit kan ruilen voor andere voorwaarden die beter bij je passen  zoals meer vakantiedagen of aanvullende reiskostenvergoeding Een goede werkgever Wij zijn Detailresult Groep  En we hebben samen een doel  klanten twee onderscheidende supermarkten bieden  Dirk en DekaMarkt  Wij doen dit op een duurzame  eerlijke en verantwoorde wijze omdat onze supermarkten een vitale functie vervullen in de maatschappij  Met meer dan 225 filialen  24 000  collega s  en een consumentenomzet van ruim 2 miljard in 2020 zijn wij de ideale plek voor jouw carrière  Bijvoorbeeld door ons programma  Mijn Koers   waarin wij aandacht hebben voor jou op het gebied van jouw gezondheid  jouw veiligheid en jouw loopbaan  nu en in de toekomst  Zo benutten wij ieders talent  Wij stellen uitdagende doelen en weten deze te behalen door verantwoordelijkheid te geven  beslissingen te nemen  naar elkaar te luisteren en helder te communiceren om goed werk te leveren  Zo zijn we samen elke dag de beste  Wat vragen wij van je We zoeken een allrounder die analytisch sterk is  communicatief vaardig en goed kan samenwerken  Jij kunt als geen ander ingewikkelde analyses uitleggen op een manier die voor iedereen te volgen is  Je ziet uitdagingen in onontgonnen paden en krijgt energie van puzzels oplossen  in plaats van dat ze voor je worden uitgetekend  Je houdt er van uitdagingen aan te gaan vanaf begin tot eind en je gaat altijd voor het beste resultaat  Daarnaast beschik je over  Een afgeronde master opleiding in een bèta studie Een zeer goede kennis van de Nederlandse taal  zowel in woord als geschrift Een leergierige en ambitieuze mindset Sterke analytische en communicatieve competenties Positieve energie Eerdere ervaring in een Data Science Our purpose Join a team that s passionate about partnership  With careers at Dow  we take time to explore questions and talk to each other  We love to learn  Our people are driven by limitless curiosity  We are an innovative  customer centric  inclusive  and sustainable materials science company Employing 36 500 individualsAcross 109 manufacturing sites In over 31 countries Our portfolio of products and solutions include  Plastics  With new technology trends  our plastic additives can be experienced in many everyday items including vinyl  blow molding bottles  film  rigid containers  PVC plastics  siding  decks and rails  foam pipes and profile formulations  window frames and high efficiency lubricants  Industrial intermediates  As the product of a reaction that is beneficial when used as a precursor chemical for another product  industrial intermediates can take on many shapes and forms  Ours are used in home comfort and appliance  building and construction  adhesives and lubricants  and more  Coatings  Whether it s a water based coating or solvent based coating  a thin film is deposited on materials to enhance specific properties such as enhanced performance  durability  aesthetics  and sustainability  Silicone businesses  Our silicone based materials can withstand more demanding applications  from those operating at extreme temperatures  to those under harsh environmental conditions for long periods of time  Learn more about our partnerships  collaborations and innovations on LinkedIn   Dow  or Twitter   DowNewsroom   We make diversity and inclusion a priority because sharing our perspectives and building on each other s ideas will drive innovation  Could you imagine yourself in a place like this  We have an exciting opportunity for a Data Quality Analyst  This position is located in Terneuzen  The Netherlands   About you As the Data Quality Analyst within the Fixed Asset Integrity Team in Terneuzen  you are responsible for SAP Data quality impacted by different work processes like daily Maintenance  repair  inspection and project execution  An important aspect is to control correct data transfer from project deliverables and repair modifications into Maintenance databases like SAP  Furthermore you will maintain and monitor an asset integrity dashboard that will be used to obtain full monthly inspection and deferral compliance and to avoid repair overdues  Primary focus areas are Data Governance and Data Quality capabilities  Job responsibilities  Ensures data quality of assets in SAP related to Compliance and Reliability Verifies transfer of project deliverables  e g  Design characteristics and Mechanical Integrity data into SAP database  Maintains  improves and reports Dashboards  Compliance and Reliability  in order to best visualize progress and other trends  Effectively communicates status  metrics  risks  and issues on a timely basis within the team and with external stakeholders  Pro actively assists with issue resolution  Trends compliance status improvements  Minimal on a weekly base More frequent before month closure First day of the month  Compliance check  Maintain Compliance Dashboard  Analyst will be the new owner of Fixed Asset   Integrity Dashboard  Data as show in KvG Repair Dashboard  Analyst will be the new owner of KvG   Repair Dashboard  Updates data for Responsible Care Leadership Team dashboard Reports to Terneuzen Leadership Team  Responsible Care Leadership Team and other Compliance roles Updates Legal data reports Proactive Assist Equipment owners  KvG and other departments to reach 100  data compliance and maintain compliance with Legal Requirements and Dow Internal GMISS regulations  Data analytics on request Assistance during audits Expedite closed delays and Overdues Gap closures Detect Compliance defects Collects equipment owner data input MDA Input and Mass uploads  with MDA  Owner of SAP data procedures We want you on the team if you have  Minimum MBO 4 diploma   in the direction of Information Systems  Technical Education or other related discipline  A minimum of 5 years of relevant IT   Business Process or SAP experience  We prefer if you have  Working knowledge of functional work processes at Dow  i e  Maintenance  Project execution  Quality  Planning etc   Ability to take initiative as well as strong organizational and communication skills are strongly preferred  Ability to work in a diverse team environment  Strong customer focused   client facing skills  Dow Offers  A robust total rewards program  including  competitive base pay  variable pay that rewards individual  team  and Company performance  and comprehensive benefits On going learning opportunities within a diverse  inclusive and rewarding work environment Career experiences that can span different Dow businesses and functions with opportunities for personal and professional growth The chance to work within a global company and interact with colleagues from around the world Opportunities that spark your imagination and ignite your passion to help others About Dow Dow  NYSE  DOW  combines global breadth  asset integration and scale  focused innovation and leading business positions to achieve profitable growth  The Company s ambition is to become the most innovative  customer centric  inclusive and sustainable materials science company  with a purpose to deliver a sustainable future for the world through our materials science expertise and collaboration with our partners  Dow s portfolio of plastics  industrial intermediates  coatings and silicones businesses delivers a broad range of differentiated science based products and solutions for its customers in high growth market segments  such as packaging  infrastructure  mobility and consumer care  Dow operates 106 manufacturing sites in 31 countries and employs approximately 35 700 people  Dow delivered sales of approximately  39 billion in 2020  References to Dow or the Company mean Dow Inc  and its subsidiaries

As a Data Scientist at Facebook  you will shape the future of people facing and business facing products we build across our entire family of applications  Facebook  Instagram  Messenger  WhatsApp  Oculus   By applying your technical skills  analytical mindset  and product intuition to one of the richest data sets in the world  you will help define the experiences we build for billions of people and hundreds of millions of businesses around the world  You will collaborate on a wide array of product and business problems with a diverse set of cross functional partners across Product  Engineering  Research  Data Engineering  Marketing  Sales  Finance and others  You will use data and analysis to identify and solve product development s biggest challenges  You will influence product strategy and investment decisions with data  be focused on impact  and collaborate with other teams  By joining Facebook  you will become part of a world class analytics community dedicated to skill development and career growth in analytics and beyond Product leadership  You will use data to shape product development  quantify new opportunities  identify upcoming challenges  and ensure the products we build bring value to people  businesses  and Facebook  You will help your partner teams prioritize what to build  set goals  and understand their product s ecosystem Analytics  You will guide teams using data and insights  You will focus on developing hypotheses and employ a diverse toolkit of rigorous analytical approaches  different methodologies  frameworks  and technical approaches to test them Communication and influence  You won t simply present data  but tell data driven stories  You will convince and influence your partners using clear insights and recommendations  You will build credibility through structure and clarity  and be a trusted strategic partner Data Scientist  Analytics Responsibilities  Work with large and complex data sets to solve a wide array of challenging problems using different analytical and statistical approaches  Apply technical expertise with quantitative analysis  experimentation  data mining  and the presentation of data to develop strategies for our products that serve billions of people and hundreds of millions of businesses  Identify and measure success of product efforts through goal setting  forecasting  and monitoring of key product metrics to understand trends  Define  understand  and test opportunities and levers to improve the product  and drive roadmaps through your insights and recommendations  Partner with Product  Engineering  and cross functional teams to inform  influence  support  and execute product strategy and investment decisions Minimum Qualifications  Bachelors Masters Degree with 7  years  or Ph D  with 5  years  of experience working within an analytical role Leadership skills in driving large complex efforts with many stakeholders to successful outcomes Communication skills and experience influencing key stakeholders and building cross functional partnerships Experience with data querying languages  e g  SQL   scripting languages  e g  Python   and or statistical mathematical software  e g  R Preferred Qualifications  Masters or Ph D  Degree in a quantitative field

As an a Data Analyst you will help us to make better use of the data we collect and make sure we deliver the best product as possible to our customers  Being a Data Analyst at Floryn means you are a healthy mix between an entrepreneur and data analyst  You should be interested in how the business operates  what makes the machine tick  but also how you can leverage technology to gain insight into this  You will work closely with the Development  Data  Risk  Marketing and Sales teams  We have a lot of interesting data on customer behaviour  marketing channels  sales and CRM  loan administration  company financials and machine learning models  We use Looker for our BI stack  so you can re use your definitions across reports  no more copy pasting SQL queries  We like simple visualisations and dashboards that can actually tell a story  What you ll be doing  Writing and automating data models in Looker and DBT  create clear definitions that can be used by business users in dashboards and reports  Build and manage dashboards  reports  scorecards  and other analytical services with visualizations that can tell a story  Collaborate across all our teams to understand business questions that data can answer  Build processes and standards that enable teams to become more self sufficient in creating their own reports  Raise questions of your own when you look at the data  we expect you to take initiative and come up with new insights about our business About Floryn  Floryn is one of the fastest growing fintech companies in the Netherlands  We aim to be the most responsible  scalable and customer friendly online lender in Europe  We ve lent out over   200 million since inception  2016  and have processed over   2 billion in transaction volume  We re located in a monumental job_desc: Data Analyst  Are you a data enthusiast with previous experience in data or business analytics  Do you have a practical mindset and strong business partnering skills  Are you someone who can transform a business question into a data driven solution enabling real impact  Are you eager for an opportunity of learning more about performance based marketing and contributing to the growth of our scale up company  If so  we have the perfect job opportunity for you About the role  In this role you will join our Business Intelligence team  5 people  supporting our business teams with all data related topics  Together with other Data Analysts and a Data Warehouse Specialist you work close with Project Managers  Product Managers and Developers  You create and present reporting environments to help stakeholders taking and analysing business decisions  You proactively look for new data insights  KPIs or data structures that could provide the business with new optimization opportunities that you can flexibly test  implement and take ownership for  You will collaborate with the data team to improve the current infrastructure and to research and implement new technical integrations for our data processing activities  Next to this  you will be dealing with multiple internal stakeholders and project divisions daily and you will have the opportunity to propose and implement new predictive models  data flows  reports or automation pipelines to ensure the organization is provided with the right insights enabling business growth Job responsibilities  Design KPIs and measurable metrics according to the different stakeholders and product needs  Build dashboards and reports around growth initiatives and business priorities  Manage the relationship with key stakeholders in order to gather and guide reporting and analytical requirements  Understand and find the best solutions for stakeholders  ad hoc questions related to different business projects and divisions based on data insights  user behavior  stock management  payment performance  fraud detection  customer churn and lifetime value  anomaly detection  revenue forecasting  traffic performance  etc    Help migrating the current data architecture and pipelines into a Cloud based Data Warehouse  Keep up to date with the state of the art tools and technologies to drive improvements in BI systems efficiency  process automations and reporting structures  Proactively translate the results from your analysis to actionable points that help stakeholders take the correct approach to improve their business  Collaborate with cross functional teams with different expertise  including Operations  Product  Payments  Marketing and Finance  Maintain  build and improve SQL queries and stored procedures in the data warehouse to prepare and analyze data  Support the team with day to day tasks and troubleshooting processes Who are you   You are curious by nature  challenge assumptions  and make sure you understand the real business challenge before jumping into solutions  You have a passion for data and get excited by exploring its complexity and extracting interesting insights while still being able to translate and explain this into actual business impact  You have a can do mindset  take ownership and responsibilities and enjoy working with a diverse team of people  Bachelor or master s degree in Statistics  Mathematics  Econometrics  Business Analytics  Computer Science  Engineering  Mathematics or any related field of study  3  years of relevant work experience  Experience in an E commerce or performance marketing environment is a plus  Experience with Business Intelligence tools like Power BI  Tableau or Looker  Technical experience working with relational databases and SQL  Experience using Python and building pipelines  Strong mathematical and statistical background  Experience with Cloud based environments and ETLs  Azure  AWS  Snowflake  Redshift  etc    Experience using DAX and Power Query is a plus  Experience implementing machine learning algorithms is a plus  Excellent analytical and problem solving skills  Excellent communication skills and able to present complicated concepts to stakeholders in a synthetic way  Self motivated and comfortable operating in a rapidly changing environment  You are hands on and like to learn more about the business side  Able to work both independently and as a part of a team  Proactive attitude and eager to constantly improve yourself  About us At Creative Clicks  we breathe entrepreneurial air  This isn t optional  it s an absolute necessity  Started in 2009  we now work with more than 120 employees within 6 offices worldwide and we are active in 65  countries across six continents  Still  we are one team  with one dream  building the largest mobile marketing platform in the world  We have mastered the science of mobile performance based advertisement and bring outstanding return on investment for our publishing and advertising partners  We identify opportunities in the field of mobile performance based marketing and execute them internationally via our unparalleled marketing and distribution network  How we do this  We believe everyone is unique  So  be you  Our success is a result of our Triple E Philosophy  Be the Energetic and Entrepreneurial Expert  Dream big  everything is possible  We give our people autonomy and accountability  without internal politics  And we celebrate our successes together  every day  What do we offer you   We offer you an international and innovative environment and freedom to bring your inspiration into action   Working at Creative Clicks means working in a very ambitious environment with a lot of responsibility  It is a place to learn  experiment  discover and develop yourself in a fast growing company  The results are important  but that is another great part too  We celebrate our successes with boat trips  parties and weekly Friday drinks on our roof terrace  Also  the perfect place for our fresh lunches  Who wouldn t want to work in a beautiful office in the heart of Amsterdam

job_desc: Machine learning engineers first and foremost sit at the intersection of software engineering  data science  and DevOps  You work together with data scientists and engineers in a team to build production ready  scalable machine learning systems   About us  Xccelerated is an initiative within the Xebia Group  accelerating growth of Data  Cloud   AI competence  Our 13 month advanced training programs integrate hands on learning and skill development with working at one of our partner companies  It is an intense learning journey for people who have proven their potential and are ready for the next step in their career   Working as a ML Engineer through Xccelerated  what is that like  Every ML engineer kicks off with two full time weeks of hands on bootcamp training  This intensive training focuses on writing deployable code with Python  containerization  data processing at large scale with Apache Spark and Kafka  and cloud fundamentals  Participants learn through classroom lectures  short assignments  hackathons and collaborative project assignments  Our ML Engineering Lead chooses the best training approach for the topic  depending on your needs   After these 2 kick off weeks  you ll work four days a week at the location of one of our partner organizations and one day a week at the Xccelerated office on remote   which involves ongoing training and project support from our technical leads  At the end of your first year  you get the opportunity to join the partner organization directly   The role itself  As a ML Engineer you will work together with other medior  and senior team members on challenging projects for our clients  In these projects you will work on data science   ML related topics  such as predictive software solutions  fraud detection or data engineering challenges such as building data pipelines  developing on cloud architectures and productionizing machine learning models   Besides this  you like big data tools and programming frameworks to ensure that the raw data gathered from data pipelines are used to build production ready scalable applications driven by data and AI  Who are you  You have   A technical bachelor s or master s degree  e g  computer science  informatics  artificial intelligence  software engineering  2 5 years of work experience as a ML Engineer or Data scientist Statistical knowledge  but are mainly experienced with end to end systems and able to run  deploy and monitor them  Preferably experience with the entire data pipeline  from data storage to model development  Knowledge of open source technologies like Spark  Kafka  Airflow and Kubernetes Good communication skills What we offer  Good salary 25 vacation days Kick off with 2 full time weeks of hands on bootcamp training Technical trainings   Innovation days  every week  Challenging assignments Company laptop  Macbook  Lunches  amazing coffee and snack bar Flexibility in working from home   at the office Working at one of our partner companies  e g  Heineken  ING  Randstad Group  FedEx  Vattenfall  Lely  Interested  We d love to meet you   Please get in touch  Contact Samantha Alves Goncalves at sgoncalves xccelerated io or by phone at 0613889770  https   www xccelerated io

job_desc: Weet jij als geen ander het belang van grote hoeveelheden waardevolle data en vind jij het leuk om met deze data aan de slag te gaan en te zorgen dat we zoveel mogelijk data kunnen benutten  Als je dol bent om data om te zetten in overzichtelijke analyses zijn wij op zoek naar jou Als Trainee Data   Analytics bij MvH Media geniet je van veel vrijheid  Zo bepaal je zelf waar je werkt  is er veel ruimte voor eigen initiatieven en heb je de allerleukste collega s Dit doe jij Je bent net  of bijna  HBO of WO afgestudeerd en hebt een relevante opleiding gevolgd  Jij houdt van uitpluizen van een grote berg data  Een speld in een hooiberg vinden geeft je energie en die uitdaging ga je iedere keer weer graag aan  In dit traineeship geven wij jou de kans het vak in de praktijk te leren onder de vleugels van onze experts  Je weet als geen ander dat Cloud een belangrijk thema is waar Digital Analytics bijna niet meer omheen kan en daarmee neemt ook het belang van kennis over dit thema binnen onze organisatie toe  Je levert graag data en analyses aan van de hoogste kwaliteit en vind het leuk om de klant een toelichting te geven op de door jou gemaakte analyses Dit ben jij   Als analytische en conceptuele denker weet jij op een strategisch niveau gebruik te maken van verschillende databronnen   Google Cloud  Azure en AWS hebben geen geheimen meer voor je  Je weet hier prima de weg in te vinden en weet hier alle benodigde data uit te halen  Het is daarbij een pré als je  een aantal van  de volgende programmeertalen onder de knie hebt  Python  Node js   Javascript  R   Analyseren is jouw middle name  Jij begrijpt de relevantie van data analytics   De nieuwste trends en ontwikkelingen binnen het data landschap volg je op de voet   Met jouw sterke communicatieve vaardigheden  nuchterheid én een goede dosis humor weet jij onze klanten en prospects aan te spreken   Ambitie drijft jou  Je wilt de beste worden in het vakgebied en vindt het prettig om nauw samen te werken met mensen die dezelfde ambitie hebben  Je bent nooit uitgeleerd Dit zijn wij Wij zijn MvH Media  bestaan inmiddels ruim 10 jaar en zijn gek op online marketing  We zijn gevestigd in de buurt van Breda en Tilburg  We hebben inmiddels vijf keer een FD Gazellen Award als team weten te behalen en we staan in de Emerce top 100 beste bedrijven in de e business in de categorie Digital Marketing Bureau middelgroot  We zijn gedreven om elke dag het beste in onszelf naar boven te halen en zijn altijd op de hoogte van de laatste trends en ontwikkelingen binnen de e commerce wereld Wij bieden jou de mogelijkheden om kansen te pakken die aansluiten bij jouw persoonlijke ambities en groei  We geven ruimte om blogs  artikelen en whitepapers te schrijven  Wij snappen dat je het belangrijk vindt om jezelf verder te blijven ontwikkelen  Zo zijn er lezingen te volgen óf de mogelijkheid om zelf gastcolleges te geven aan hogescholen   universiteiten We willen blijven groeien en het zou gaaf zijn als jij daar je steentje aan bij zou willen dragen Als je ons team komt versterken krijg je naast een leuke baan in een informele organisatie  een mooi salaris en een hecht team het volgende   Ruimte voor creativiteit en om mee te denken hoe we nog beter kunnen worden   Wanneer het mooi weer is een heerlijke lunchplek op ons dakterras   Op vrijdagen een gezellige borrel of Ben jij de data analist die ons helpt om beter zicht te krijgen op belangrijke trends en ontwikkelingen op het terrein van internationaal ondernemen  En ben je gemotiveerd om te zorgen dat bedrijven 1 op 1 geholpen worden bij succesvol internationaal zakendoen  Dan horen we graag van je  Als neutrale en onafhankelijke overheidspartij staan we dicht bij bedrijven die internationaal  willen  zaken doen  We verbinden deze bedrijven effectief en efficiënt met relevante  kennis of zakelijke  partijen in het buitenland  Dat doen we door accountgesprekken te introduceren voor het mkb om hiermee de toegang tot de overheidsdienstverlening alsmede de 1 loket beleving te versterken  Het internationaliserende mkb wordt hiermee ondersteund in zijn groei  Samen met onze regionale partners uit het Trade   Innovate netwerk brengen we structureel de wensen  internationale ambities en belemmeringen in kaart bij een representatieve groep van Nederlandse mkb ondernemers  Daarbij geven wij ook directe ondersteuning follow up op de relevante zaken die uit de gesprekken voortkomen  Dit doen we reeds in het kader van het Trade Relations Programma  TRP  en gaan we opzetten voor het Brexit Bezoeker Programma  BBP   Het BBP is een onderdeel van het EU handelsprogramma en valt onder de individuele dienstverlening en wil op bedrijfsniveau  via gerichte accountmanagementgesprekken met MKB ondernemers  een nog scherper beeld te krijgen van de meest door Brexit getroffen sectoren en hun wensen en behoeften  De data analist werkt samen met de andere collega s uit het datateam internationaal ondernemen aan het zo goed mogelijk uitvoeren en doorontwikkelen van deze beide programma s  In deze functie ligt de nadruk op het BBP  Om onze klanten en opdrachtgevers zo goed mogelijk te bedienen  hebben wij inzichten nodig uit data  Van ruwe data via slimme bewerkingen en analyses naar kennis en inzicht komen  is een belangrijk onderdeel van onze strategie  Die strategie is erop gericht om onszelf  als de partner voor duurzame economische ontwikkeling  op de kaart zetten  Dat doen we ook door het ontwikkelen van een jaarlijks terugkerende monitor handelsklimaat  Deze wordt komend jaar ontwikkeld en als data analist ben je direct betrokken in de projectgroep hiervan  De belangrijkste databron zowel voor deze monitor als voor de BBP en TRP rapportages is Achilles  Alle bedrijfscontactgegevens en verleende diensten worden vastgelegd in het Achilles systeem van RVO  Je ondersteunt de adviseur datakwaliteit bij de controle op consistente en volledige invoer van data in Achilles  Je houdt je actief bezig met het verwerken van deze data  zowel kwalitatief als kwantitatief  analyseren van de data die ingevoerd worden door de verschillende gebruikers zoals RVO collega s  posten en regiopartners en je draagt bij aan het verbeteren van de registratie en daarmee de datakwaliteit  Feitelijk verricht je belangrijke voorbereidende werkzaamheden voor en werk je nauw samen met jouw andere collega s uit het datateam te weten de Product Owner Achilles  de Business Analist en de adviseur datakwaliteit  Dit datateam maakt onderdeel uit van het team Strategie   Ontwikkeling binnen de afdeling internationaal ondernemen  Tenslotte hou je altijd oog op kansen om meer uit data te halen door o a  het bijdragen aan pilots om data te verrijken en kwaliteit te verbeteren  Hiermee draag je dus bij aan een van de belangrijke pijlers van de internationaal ondernemen strategie 2025  om van data naar kennis te komen  Functie eisen Minimaal een relevante HBO opleiding  Aantoonbare analytische en rapportagevaardigheden  Je bent in staat om deze vaardigheden en de resultaten van je analyses over te brengen op een manier die collega s aanspreekt en motiveert Functioneel beheerders ontwikkelen en onderhouden digitale loketten  Projectmanagers onderzoeken wat de mogelijkheden van big data zijn  Juristen adviseren over de toepassing van wet  en regelgeving en handelen bezwaar en beroepen af binnen de ruimte die wet  en regelgeving biedt  Ook zijn ze betrokken bij het opstellen van nieuwe wet  en regelgeving  En communicatieadviseurs ontwikkelen toegankelijke websites voor voorlichting en advies  Wie ondernemend Nederland een warm hart toedraagt  kan bij onze organisatie dus alle kanten op

ERIKS Digital is looking for a Junior Data Scientist   We are looking for a junior data scientist to join our international data and analytics team to help build our data science expertise  In ERIKS Digital  it is our mission to maximize the power of digital technology and data for every ERIKS colleague and customer  The Data Office  which comprises of the Data Product Team and the Data Platform team  delivers on this mission by developing the required data infrastructure and platforms to make data available across the organization and by developing data products that provide actionable insights for better decision making to help ERIKS to meet its strategic goals  We are looking for a junior data scientist who will be part of our data product team  We are looking for a strong team player who can execute and translate potential use cases into clear and supported stories to ensure adoption and value  To support your success  we have the right mandate in the company  a modern Azure based data platform and a global audience  The Data Office is an international team that consists of 14 colleagues with 8 nationalities and for which we are currently fulfilling 2 positions  We strongly believe in diversity of culture  gender and perspectives to innovate and solve problems  Our core values are Integrity  Trust  Inclusivity  Passion  Curiosity  They are part of us in our professional and personal life  We are keen to grow our team with new colleagues who share these values and add more diversity to our team  You collaborate with stakeholders throughout the world to prioritize which opportunities should be explored to create value for ERIKS  You will work in multi disciplinary teams on value cases  including local data analysts  domain specialists and business stakeholders  What you will do  Perform analysis for business use cases and present the results to stakeholders in clear user storiesAnalyze  research and build  machine learning  algorithms on our data platform  creating insights and applications that will create value for our colleagues and customers Help shape the Data Science domain and develop the Data Analytics team at ERIKS DigitalProactively develop use cases and stories to generate value for ERIKS through Data ScienceEnrich the data in our Data PlatformMentor junior team membersInspire and encourage innovationSeek and develop innovative methods and processes and keep up to date on latest trends  tools and advancements in the area of analytics and dataInteract with the wider Data Analytics Community within ERIKS What we are looking for in you  You have 1  years professional experience in predictive analytics  data science  or similar roleExperience in working with querying data from relational databases using SQL  programming in Python or R  visualizing in PowerBIExperience with Azure environment  especially Machine Learning Services is a nice to haveYou have experience working with a variety of statistical and machine learning methods  time series analysis  regression  classification  clustering  survival analysis You are a collaborative team playerYou have a positive and solution oriented mindsetYou have strong communication skillsYou have delivered at least 1 data science projectYou are familiar with recent developments in machine learning What do we offer  Competitive salary  25 holidays  12 ATV days and a good pension schemeSmall   high energy team  lots of challengesA nice office next to Amstel stationFlexibility About ERIKS  80 years ago  ERIKS started as a supplier to the dairy industry in the Netherlands  providing mechanical components and tools that helped dairy plants increase efficiency  Since then  the company kept innovating  evolving  and expanding  Through a consistent focus on technology and service  it became a key sparring partner and service provider for a range of industries  Among its clients are high tech  manufacturing and food companies  such as ASML and Heineken   energy industry players  from windmill operators to power plants   heavy vehicle manufacturers  making cars  ships  or airplanes   construction firms  medicine production businesses  and more   For these clients  ERIKS provides a wide range of technical products  for instance hoses and valves   co engineering  customization solutions  and related services  Technical teams are at customers  beck and call for sophisticated support and advice   from design to smart maintenance  And on the local web shops  customers can easily order tools or component parts   We provide products and know how in a way that has a direct impact on the economy  In each household you ll find at least one item of which the production was improved with help from ERIKS     Floris Jan Cuypers  COO at ERIKS  Dutch DNA  global culture  With its expansion into 17 countries and many different industries  ERIKS became a global organization  with a truly international culture and vision and with talent  experts  and client relationships from everywhere  Meanwhile  its headquarters and roots are in The Netherlands  The company is owned by SHV  a family owned Dutch group with a portfolio of seven companies that together employ nearly 60 000 people worldwide  The culture at both SHV and ERIKS is built on integrity  entrepreneurship  and a core value of investing in people  With its 6 500 employees and nearly 2 billion Euros revenue  ERIKS is an established corporate   yet one with the entrepreneurial drive and willingness to invest that is often found at younger  smaller  PE backed businesses  Digital transformation  ERIKS now finds itself in a very exciting phase  that of a companywide digital transformation  The potential of digital technology for ERIKS extends to all business aspects  from easy business workflows to direct commercial purposes  Digital technology can advance ERIKS e commerce channels as well as offer new innovations and service propositions that are partially or fully digital  Examples include the proposition of Smart Asset Management  IoT  or  ERIKS Wiki   a knowledge mining database for employees and customers  ERIKS has a dedicated approach to digitization  The company is internally building a proactive  solution oriented product organisation with top notch developers and digital and industry experts  Recently  a Chief Digital Officer was hired  and the next three years people  operating model  architecture  governance  and strategy will take full focus  Eriks Digital is an equal opportunity employer and strives for equal treatment for all genders  Eriks Digital adheres to ethical recruiting methods ensuring that we do not discriminate against any candidate because of age  disability  gender reassignment  marriage or civil partnership  pregnancy and maternity  race  religion or belief  sex  or sexual orientation  This is a fundamental part of our values and beliefs  and we strive to create an inclusive environment where everyone can reach their potential

job_desc: The opportunity Amazing Data Analyst   Team Data Analytics ING Collections NL   Will you help us improve our services for customers in financial difficulties through the smart use of data  Do you want to contribute to reducing the debt problem in the Netherlands  Are you passionate about making impact  based on data driven insights  Do you enjoy solving problems and do you also want to have an impact on society by doing so  Then we are looking for you  You  as an amazing Data Analyst  will help us realize our ambition of being mobile first  frictionless  relevant and strive to prevent debt a data driven way  This and more can be achieved whilst working in multi disciplinary teams consisting of customer journey experts  other data analysts  data scientists and our operational colleagues  What do we stand for within Collections  Collections NL wants to make a difference by being the partner of customers in financial difficulties  We offer our customers  personal  easy  smart  and customer centric solutions with the help of advanced analytics  By doing so we want to prevent customers from getting into financial hardship  prevention  and to help those with ING product related debts in a sustainable fashion  Even when it comes to debt recovery  more and more customers want to be able to handle everything independently and digitally  while looking for personal and relevant advice when it comes to complex financial issues or problems  Therefore we are improving our customer journeys on a daily basis in order to better serve our customers and more effectively  By doing so we contribute to a sustainable financially fit Netherlands  What does Collections do  Not to sound cliché  but  no day is the same at the innovative Collections department as can be illustrated by some of the topics we are currently working on  Developing a chatbot call bot Analyzing call reasons to better route customers  with the aid of Speech Analytics Segmentation and probability to default models with custom customer journeys Predictive models to be able to detect debt and possibly nudge preventively Digitization initiatives to improve the customer experience within self service Data driven approach in measuring the effectiveness all used tools for debt recovery Collaborations with the AFM  Nederlandse Schuldhulproute and also other ING countries acting on our social responsibility as an institution  striving for sustainable debt prevention and recovery The team We are 5 data analysts who have a crucial and decisive role within the tribe  where we are responsible for maximizing the impact of Collections based on data driven decisions and proactive analyses and advice  Think about analyses such as the efficiency of debt collection within NL compared to other countries  what we can learn from others  What tools or measures can we use to get and keep customers out of arrears  Feel free to reach out for more info on the team  Roles and responsibilities You know that success is a team effort You have an ambitious pro active and positive mentality You generate  analyze and present relevant customer insights and enable personal and relevant customer interactions through smart data analysis Standard reports are entrusted to our data warehouse team who made our data mart  They also build the reports in Cognos  so you can primarily focus on analysis  Your competencies A master s degree in the field of analytics  mathematics  econometrics or other analytical studies Bridgebuilder  understand data and translate the insights into actions for your stakeholders   2 4 years of demonstrable experience with data analysis via e g  SQL  SAS  Excel  Cognos  R  Python You like to participate in fun activities with the team and department    You like to continuously develop yourself You take initiative but you value cooperation just as much How to succeed We hire smart people like you for your potential  Our biggest expectation is that you ll stay curious  Keep learning  Take on responsibility  In return  we ll back you to develop into an even more awesome version of yourself  Rewards   benefits We want to make sure that it s possible for you to strike the right balance between your career and your private life  You can find out more about our employment conditions at https   www ing jobs netherlands Why ING benefits htm The benefits of working with us at ING include A salary tailored to your qualities and experience24 27 vacation days depending on contractPension scheme13th month salaryIndividual Savings Contribution  BIS   3 5  of your gross annual salary8  Holiday paymentPersonal growth and challenging work with endless possibilitiesAn informal working environment with innovative colleaguesWork Agile  so new ideas come to life faster Interested  Please upload your CV and motivation letter by clicking the  Apply  button  About us With 57 000 employees and operations in approximately 40 countries  there is no shortage of opportunities for people with initiative who want to help people take a step ahead in life and in business  Do you want to work at the cutting edge of what s possible and at the same time ensure you work with integrity and hold the customer s interests at heart  Do you want to be surrounded by progressive  inspiring  diverse and supportive colleagues  Then there is no better place to invest your talents than at ING  Join us  Apply today

High School or Equivalent diploma Proficiency in Dutch and English Language grammar and spelling  both written and verbal  Proficient computer skills in MS Office with good typing speed     40 wpm and  90  accuracy   including basic troubleshooting with the ability to utilize proprietary tools  Willingness and flexibility to work in shifts  Job summary All Amazon teams and businesses  from Prime delivery to AWS  are guided by four key tenets  customer obsession rather than competitor focus  passion for invention  commitment to operational excellence  and long term thinking   We are driven by the excitement of building technologies  inventing products  and providing services that transform the way our customers live their lives and run their businesses   What unites Amazonians across teams and geographies is that we are all striving to delight our customers and make their lives easier  The scope and scale of our mission drives us to seek diverse perspectives  be resourceful  and navigate through ambiguity  Inventing and delivering things that were never thought possible isn t easy  but we embrace this challenge every day   By working together on behalf of our customers  we are building the future one innovative product  service  and idea at a time  Come build the future with us   We are hiring Data Associates in our  Netherlands  The Hague  team to undertake labeling functions   We value your high attention to details and your ability to adapt to dynamic changes due to emerging business requirements  You are recognized as a role model for your proactivity in identifying issues with efficiency and accuracy   Are you ready to embrace the challenge   Summary of Responsibilities Work with text  speech and other types of data and attach tags to the contents  at scale  Deliver high quality of labeled data  leveraging guidelines to meet specific key performance indicators  and using in house tools and software  Report issues with tools and software to the development team when necessary  Provide feedback for improvements to existing tooling that can increase labeling throughput and quality  Maintain strict confidentiality and follow all applicable Amazon policies for securing confidential information   What We Offer Attractive and competitive salary Opportunity to work in a world class organization Benefits package Additional details  Team operates between Monday to Friday with various shifts  shifts put in place only to manage seating capacity  no 24h coverage needed and it will be an eight hour working shift with an hour of break   Overtime is occasionally needed  We compensate for regular hours and any overtime work  Previous experience in a similar environment Proven record of delivery of performance metrics in an Operations environment Practical knowledge of data processing needs and trade offs Excellent communication skills  highly collaborative team player Effective time management Be self motivated and take initiative Ability to respond positively to working in a demanding environment  Amazon is an equal opportunities employer  We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success  We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills  We value your passion to discover  invent  simplify and build  Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon  Please consult our Privacy Notice  https   www amazon jobs en privacy page  to know more about how we collect  use and transfer the personal data of our candidates

Daarom wil je als Data Expert Employee Experience bij NS werkenAls Data Expert Employee Experience kijk je naar data in relatie tot de reis van NS medewerkers  van onboarding  leren  ontwikkelen tot doorgroeien  In deze rol werk je nauw samen met de service designer ter verbetering van de medewerkersreis  Daarbij werk je fact basis en maak je zelfstandig analyses  Een rol binnen ComIT waarmee je impact maakt  Dit ga je doen als Data Expert Employee Experience bij NS Weet jij als geen ander dat medewerkers het goud zijn van iedere succesvolle en klantgerichte organisatie  Gaat jouw hart sneller kloppen tijdens een ontdekkingstocht in de data richting employee experience kansen én ben jij iemand die dan doorpakt richting actie  Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jou  Wij zijn cluster Medewerker en binnen de afdeling ComIT  niet binnen NS HR  zorgen wij er voor dat onze meer dan 450 medewerkers optimaal kunnen presteren zodat zij voor zichzelf en onze organisatie het beste resultaat kunnen behalen  Want alleen met gelukkige  gezonde en energieke collega s zorgen we er samen voor dat zij de maximale waarde voor onze klanten kunnen realiseren  Dit doen we oa door het verzorgen van een zo goed mogelijke Employee Experience die de medewerker op zijn reis begeleid tijdens stappen als onboarding  leren en ontwikkelen  doorgroei en vitaliteit  Om deze ambitie waar te maken hebben we binnen cluster Medewerker een verbeterteam opgestart  Dit team zoekt constant samen met het team van expertise leads naar nieuwe mogelijkheden om de werkbeleving van onze medewerkers te verbeteren  Ter versterking van het verbeterteam zijn we op zoek naar een Data analist  We zijn op zoek naar iemand die analytisch kan kijken naar verbeteringen  maar die ook niet bang is om de mouwen op te stropen en meewerkt om problemen op te lossen  In deze rol weet je dat het proces en aanleveren van de juiste data net zo belangrijk is als de uiteindelijke rapportage en analyse  Je kijkt dan ook met een brede blik naar het hele proces  Je bent in het team actief bezig met  Verzamelen  ordenen en controleren van alle mogelijk relevante  medewerkers data en maakt hier vlijmscherpe It s an exciting time to join us as we are reshaping our Asset Maintenance organization to become a real value driver for the business  In this 6 months assignment  with potential extension for 3 6 additional months  you will have business impact by providing high quality data analysis and support our Heads of Portfolio in maintenance data analysis to facilitate better decision making  We offer As Junior Data Analyst you will have the opportunity to gain insight into a truly global  large and complex  world class organization where you will be driving supporting improvements and working closely with experienced maintenance professionals  Within this complex working environment you will have a high degree of empowerment to take ownership and responsibility for developing insight into our maintenance data and support our Heads of Portfolio in implementing the new Global Asset Maintenance strategy and the new ways of working  You will work with diverse stakeholders and great colleagues in a large variety of positions and the role is enabling you to build a great network within APM Terminals globally  We offer an attractive career in an open and engaging working environment with a competitive compensation package  We provide opportunities for personal and professional growth and it is up to you to use this occasion to build an attractive career within a dynamic environment with future international career opportunities   At APM Terminals we value the diversity of our talent and will always strive to recruit the best person for the job   we value diversity in all its forms  including but not limited to  gender  age  nationality  race  sexual orientation  disability or religious beliefs  We are proud of our diversity and see it as a genuine source of strength for building high performing teams  Qualified applicants are encouraged to apply through the job portal and include a CV in English in their application  Internal applicants  please note that HR will request your staff card upon receipt of your application  Key responsibilities As Junior Data Analyst you will contribute to internal quality data assurance and accuracy improvements in terminals as well as  in conjunction with the business analyst  drive automation of Maintenance   Repair  M R  reporting to enable real time transparency of business and faster better informed decision making  Reporting directly to our Head of Portfolio  your role will be to analyze maintenance performance of terminals in scope to support our Heads of Portfolio and to facilitate decision making  You will be driving improvement of data accuracy and quality as well as compliance with reporting standards across terminals  You ll work closely with the Heads of Portfolio whom you will support in implementing a consistent way of working and continuous improvement in maintenance  reliability and performance   Other responsibilities include Analyze maintenance performance of terminals in scope to establish and understand trends for better monitoring and decision making  ensuring process enhancement and cost reductionDevelop internal and external benchmark of key maintenance performanceEnsure high quality data analysis and accurate performance reporting across portfolioBuild equipment Total Cost of Ownership and support on fleet performance and heat mapsSupport OPEX investment business cases and support to create base line and ambitions level for Asset Maintenance and fleet performance  LI POST We are looking for You hold or you are finishing an Engineering degree  preferably Mechanical or Electrical  or equivalent and you have maintenance analytics experience in an operational Asset Maintenance environment  You have expertise in information analysis or data modelling and strong analytical skills with the ability to visualize data  You have proficiency in data analytics  modelling and visualization tools  e g  MS Power BI  Tableau and ERwin    Your English communication skills are excellent both in speaking as well as in writing and you have strong communication skills with the ability to influence  Your computer skills are strong in standard and preferably in professional programs  i e  MS Office  EPR CMMS systems    Furthermore  you have attention to detail combined with a can do mentality being able to solve problems in a structured manner by generating  evaluating and implementing solutions  If you are looking for a positive change in career and if you are ready for this challenging new chapter  we look forward to receiving your application  At APM Terminals  we are a team of over 20 000 employees spread across more than 60 countries united by a passion to provide our expertise in port operations and container management services  By providing the expertise and port infrastructure essential to world trade  we actively support the advancement of the societies around us  enabling local economies to unlock their potential and build an even stronger global community  Working with a team of talented professionals you will get a chance to experience different cultures and make friends all over the world  You ll find a culturally diverse  stimulating environment at any of our offices  terminals or depots  When you join APM Terminals  the world is your workplace  APM Terminals is an independent business unit within the Danish Maersk Group   a Global Fortune 500 company with about 89 000 employees and offices in 130 countries with global growth opportunities in a range of fields from shipping and energy to our offshore and manufacturing industries   Join us to achieve even your most ambitious career goals  Netherlands The Hague Local Terminal Operations Engineering Last application date  26 3 2022

The Role Where you fit in Shell Trading integrates a worldwide trading network with an unsurpassed global portfolio in crude oil  refined products  natural gas  electrical power  and chemicals  It has larger locations in London  Houston  Calgary  Singapore  Dubai  Rotterdam  and Barbados  Shell Trading is one of the world s largest energy traders and is a key segment of the Shell portfolio  Shell Energy Europe  SE EE  sells and actively trades energy related products and services associated with European natural gas  power  and environmental products  SE EE was created in 2009 through the combination of Shell s marketing and trading companies in Europe  SE EE is part of Shell Energy which is the commercial heart of the Integrated Gas Business and aligns all Energy Trading activity throughout the world  As part of the SE EE and NEs growth strategy  Power and Gas wholesale and customer activities are scaling significantly in existing and expanding into new market areas and deal types  This involves a significant amount of work on selecting  integrating  and maintaining new systems and processes  Shell Energy Europe Ltd   SE EE  acts as the Balancing Responsible Party  BRP  for renewable assets operated across Europe  This involves consolidating for varying local markets long and short positions to net off imbalance positions  minimise value leakage  and maximise value creation opportunity against the system price  Data is critically important in this process to inform optimisation of forecasts and to predict system buyout price  Different markets have different regulatory regimes related to the balancing market and a deep understanding of each market is critical to ensure continued license to operate for SE EE  and maximising value for the end to end business  This role in SE EE will be based in The Netherlands which means that this role will officially be part of Shell Nederland BV  What s the role  The primary accountabilities of the Renewable Data Analyst  Power  are  Work in a team of multiple Data Analysts to validate and correct data to support business critical processes  Keep track of Shell Energy Europe Ltd  s Portfolio in SE EE s data management solution for NL BRP  Collect  process  and analyse operational data  including allocation  reconciliation  and measurement data  in order to report to internal and external stakeholders  Troubleshoot issues with internal and external counterparties  including Dutch Grid Operators  Anomalies in generation and consumption patterns investigated and understood  Actively manage relationships with internal and external stakeholders  including relevant market organizations  Facilitate necessary management approvals  Work to standardise  and automate as many of these processes as possible in conjunction with IT  Understand the deal funnel to assess and manage the workload associated with integrating new opportunities into relevant systems Deep understanding of balancing regimes in country  well connected with regulatory bodies  able to understand upcoming regulatory changes and able to coordinate teams to implement system and process changes ahead of new introduction of new and or changed rules  What we need from you  The successful candidate would be required to  Be inspired by and committed to the success of Shell in the Energy Transition  Be comfortable with big  complex data sets  analysis  and application of that data to drive business value  Can process large data sets through building own queries to support resolve complex issues and support decision making  Show a keen interest in IT digitalization and other technology advancements and how these can be applied to drive competitive advantage in Shell  Understand the end to end Life of a Deal process in SE EE  Excellent customer service attention manner  Ability to scope and manage changes to IT projects and drive process improvements  Have experience in regulatory reporting frameworks for Power in Europe  demonstrating an interest in balancing regimes  Develop business relationships with customers and IT vendors  Operate effectively as part of a team as well as autonomously  Adapt quickly to a dynamic environment and demonstrate resilience under pressure  The successful candidate should also possess the following skills  Very strong interpersonal and communication skills  fluent in spoken and written Dutch and English   Excellent stakeholder engagement  Highly analytical  data driven with strong attention to detail  Process Improvement mindset  A basic knowledge of Trading and Supply European Power Operations  Trade Finance and Controls  European Regulatory Reporting and Compliance  COMPANY DESCRIPTION Shell Nederland BV is a platform for international collaboration  with Shell offering direct employment to around ten thousand people in the Netherlands alone  including roughly 2 800 non Dutch employees from around 80 countries  Diversity is key at Shell Nederland  and our employees reflect the innovation that stems from a diverse workforce  By joining Shell Nederland  you will benefit from an unrivalled industry leading development programme that will see you tap into a pool of expert knowledge that will help propel your career  Shell Nederland is the holding company of most Shell companies operating in the Netherlands  Shell Nederland also has an advisory and coordinating role in numerous areas  An innovative place to work There s never been a more exciting time to work at Shell  Everyone here is helping solve one of the biggest challenges facing the world today  bringing the benefits of energy to everyone on the planet  whilst managing the risks of climate change  Join us and you ll add your talent and imagination to a business with the power to shape the future   whether by investing in renewables  exploring new ways to store energy or developing technology that helps the world to use energy more efficiently  An inclusive place to work To power progress together  we need to attract and develop the brightest minds and make sure every voice is heard  Here are just some of the ways we Breed ingezet worden op diverse projecten  Jezelf ontwikkelen tot Data IoT Engineer  Een functie in het hart van de energietransitie  Waarom kiezen voor Eneco  ENECO   WAT WIJ DOEN De projecten en activiteiten van Energy Management Solutions  EMS  bevinden zich werkelijk in het hart van de energietransitie  EMS verbindt namelijk tienduizenden huishoudelijke  en zakelijke energieapparaten  zoals warmtepompen  thuisbatterijen  boilers  etc  maar ook wind  en zonneparken  aan de cloud en maakt het mogelijk deze individueel en of collectief op een slimme manier te verduurzamen  energiebesparingen te realiseren  het comfort te verhogen  en of geld te verdienen voor haar klanten  door deze te koppelen aan real time flexmarkten   EMS ontwerpt  bouwt en beheert deze slimme IoT oplossingen zelf  die draaien in AWS en MS Azure  en maakt daarbij veel gebruik van Linux  cloud managed services en machine learning AI  Wat ga je doen  Als junior IoT data engineer word je breed ingezet op onze projecten  Dit betreft bijv  het verwerken van grote hoeveelheden data om zo te komen tot efficiënte en duurzame algoritmes voor slimme  optimale aansturing  Of het   als onderdeel van een team   ontwikkelen van allerhande services voor  op cloud  en IoT gebaseerde  oplossingen  Je doet in deze projecten niet alleen veel ervaring op met de meest moderne IT  en dataomgevingen  je leert ook veel over het gedrag en de potentiële waarde van diverse energy assets  In elke opdracht houd je rekening met het individuele gewenste gedrag van een asset of woning  alsook het gedrag en mogelijkheden van het grotere portfolio  Zo draag je direct bij aan de noodzakelijke energietransitie en word je een expert op het boeiende en zeer diverse snijvlak van IT en energie  Je bent verantwoordelijk voor Het verwerken van grote hoeveelheden data  Het ontwikkelen van allerhande services  Wat breng je mee  Je werkt samen als één team aan het waarmaken van één missie  Daarbij ben je proactief om te helpen de energietransitie te versnellen  Je creëert ruimte om inzichten en meningen met collega s uit te wisselen en neemt verantwoording om bij te dragen aan het gezamenlijke plan Ben jij een gedreven leider die goed kan coachen en verbinden  En heb je ervaring met datamanagement en kwaliteitsprocessen  Dan zoeken wij jou Wat ga je doen De Data Officer  DO  is het PGB boegbeeld om data als belangrijke waarde van de organisatie te positioneren  handen en voeten te geven en door te vertalen naar concrete activiteiten en projecten  Het is een nieuwe rol waarvoor de DO een positie zal moeten verwerven binnen de organisatie en deze mede vorm zal gaan geven De DO werkt PGB breed  rapporteert aan de Chief Data Officer  is onderdeel van de data organisatie binnen PGB en zorgt voor het overall beeld van datagovernance en datakwaliteit  De DO adviseert de organisatie waar nodig en stuurt deze functioneel aan op het gebied van datamanagement en datagovernance  De DO werkt nauw samen met de Chief Data Officer  het lijnmanagement  de Data Stewards  de Data Architect  data eigenaren en overige teams Een aantal voorbeelden van je verantwoordelijkheden zijn Ontwikkelen van een overkoepelende  integrale en gedragen PGB visie   strategie en kaderstelling opdata  datamanagement en data gedreven werken  Zoekt daarvoor draagvlak binnen PGB en draagt devisie binnen PGB actief uit opstellen van beleid  kaders en onderliggende richtlijnen  control frameworks  formats en procedures voor datamanagement en datakwaliteit implementatie hiervan zodat de domein specifieke onderdelen volgens datagovernance zijn ingericht  Onderdeel hiervan zijn het in kaart brengen van data flows  de identificatie van kritische data elementen  KDA  en het beheren van datakwaliteitsprocessen vastlegging en uitvoering van datakwaliteitsprocessen  zoals data identificatie  datarisicobeoordeling en  controls en datamonitoring samen met de data eigenaren coördinatie bij het melden en oplossen van issues op het gebied van datakwaliteit Wie ben jij Je bent een leider die collega s voortdurend weet te coachen en motiveren  Iemand die weet hoe een organisatie in beweging iste zetten naar een meer datagedreven organisatie en weet hoe een strategie praktisch moet worden vertaald naar tactische en operationele activiteiten  Binnen de teams waarmee je samenwerkt ben je een verbindende factor en een kartrekker  Hiernaast weet je met je brede ervaring op het gebied van datamanagement en met name datagovernance om de teams goed te adviseren Verder heb je Een afgeronde wo opleiding op het gebied van  bedrijfskundige  informatiekunde of  management informatica  computer science  verandermanagement of een daarmee vergelijkbaar niveau van kennisen vaardigheden   Ruime ervaring met advisering en acteren op strategisch en bestuurlijk niveau   Ervaring met het formuleren van een visie strategie en de doorvertaling hiervan naar concrete acties and work with the latest techstack and learning is part of the job  You will be working with a variety of stakeholders across the whole organisation ranging from our core travel product  next level expense management and finance and shape business decisions and our future product   The ideal candidate will be extremely curious  have a strong background in statistics and be obsessed with results  We take great pride in our diversity of backgrounds  cultures  and perspectives and we strongly believe this is helping us to grow as a successful and impactful team  To learn more about our team  you can watch this recent talk on the types of problems we work on and this one on how we work together as a group   RESPONSIBILITIES Support and advise the business with ad hoc analytics as well as applying statistical techniques to create insights and discover new business opportunities Enable and support the business regarding the development and use of data analysis and reporting by  building reporting grade data sources in our BI environment and translating those data sources into meaningful dashboards and reports for easy business use Provide business expertise and guidance  consultative partnership  on how to apply leverage data analytics and reporting within business operations Create and deliver documentation and training on reporting and BI tools for business users to enable self service on company data QUALIFICATIONS Masters in mathematics  statistics  computer science  information science  or related technical field 3  years of work experience in Data Analysis Experienced in SQL  experience with dbt is highly desirable  Experienced in BI tooling like Tableau  Looker  etc Demonstrated ability to translate business information needs into technical requirements and functional code reporting Demonstrated knowledge of standard statistical techniques like significance testing  regression modeling  etc Familiar with commonly used data technical tools like  R  Python Git Excellent communication and stakeholder relationship skills and a strong team player

infrastructuur en het implementeren van bijbehorende tools op het gebied van duurzaam en maatschappelijk verantwoord beleggen  Je verkent de ESG databehoefte van portefeuillemanagers  analisten en strategen binnen de organisatie en vertaalt deze behoefte naar data oplossingen  Je verzamelt en organiseert data  voert analyses uit en onderzoekt trends in deze data  Vervolgens koppel je de resultaten van je analyse terug naar je collega s  die dit als input voor het analyseren van beleggingen en beleidsontwikkeling kunnen gebruiken  Naast het verzamelen  structuren en verwerken van de data zelf  houd je je ook bezig met de ontwikkeling van de tools die hier een bijdrage aan leveren  Hierbij onderzoek je de mogelijkheden van nieuwe technologie en ben je verantwoordelijk voor de implementatie van deze technologie  Over de functie Je werkt samen met zeven collega s in het Analistenteam  Daarnaast ben je onderdeel van het MVB team  waar vertegenwoordigers van verschillende afdelingen aan deelnemen  Door ook bij het MVB team aan te sluiten  zorg je ervoor dat de analyse van ESG data goed wordt geïntegreerd binnen de gehele organisatie  Groeipad De ESG Data Scientist is een nieuwe functie binnen Rail   OV  Naarmate je meer data in kaart hebt gebracht is het belangrijk om ook mee te denken over de structurering en borging van data  Dit kan waar mogelijk bedrijfsbreed job_desc: We are looking for an Associate with 2  years of working experience in consulting  the ability to work on projects with expert team members  and to provide inspiring guidance to juniors in the team to join our Data Science and Business Analytics team  What we offer Interact with our stakeholders to drive the business towards impactful change Lead and support your team in creating new business solutions via data driven insights Seize opportunities at the client and Metyis in our entrepreneurial environment Become part of a fast growing international and diverse team Who we are  We are Metyis  We are a dynamic and forward thinking consultancy firm that operates across a wide range of industries  creating solutions that are tailored to specific needs  We bring long lasting impact and growth to our partners and clients  With our multidisciplinary teams we create bold strategies and innovative solutions that are tailored to our client s needs and help them capitalizing opportunities  Together we strive to bring long lasting impact and celebrate collective victories  At Metyis we share an entrepreneurial mindset  a compelling passion to create  and  more importantly  a firm belief in our partnership driven business model  This is embedded in our culture and safeguarded as we evolve  Our team counts over 450 ambitious professionals with various backgrounds  spread over several continents  Our work environment unifies creative problem solving and strategic thinking  We provide resources to visionaries who understand the direction that the world is moving  Tomorrow s world is data driven  It is digital  It is international  Become part of the journey  become part of Metyis  Partners for impact  What you will do Analyze the business and its different processes and functions to create data driven strategic solutions Build data driven models to optimize processes using statistical  machine learning techniques  Be part of creating prototypes and integrating machine learning in business processes  to enable automated   smart data driven decision making Design and build scalable pipelines in multi cloud environments  AWS  Azure  GCP  etc   or on prem Translate gathered results   ideas into engaging  actionable  and easy to understand insights using effective data visualization techniques Thrive in a fast paced environment  adapt quickly  and take ownership of your work Guide more junior members of the team What you ll bring Master  or Ph D   degree in a quantitative field with a focus on data analysis  e g  econometrics  AI  mathematics  physics  and other exact sciences  Sharp thinking ability to translate high level business questions into concrete analysis Robust knowledge of statistical concepts  accompanied by expertise with a set of analytical tools ranging from databases  e g   SQL  BigQuery  noSQL  to programming languages  e g  R  Python  PySpark   and from data visualization  e g  Tableau  PowerBI  to machine learning  Understanding data engineering solutions is a plus  Ability to explain complicated analysis to a non technical audience with your storytelling and data visualization skills Ability to work on projects with expert team members and to provide inspiring guidance to juniors in the team 2  years of consulting experience or relevant industry experience Excellent communication skills  especially to explain complex analytical concepts in non technical terms to business users Professional fluency in Dutch and English
