Ben jij iemand die denkt  onderzoekt  beslist en adviseert op basis van data  Zou je graag een waardevolle bijdrage leveren aan het uitbouwen van onze logistieke diensten binnen de héle keten  En zoek je een veelzijdige en afwisselende baan met ontwikkelmogelijkheden voor de toekomst  Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jou   WAT GA JE DOEN ALS ONZE DATA ANALIST   Als onze Data analist ben je verantwoordelijk voor de analysefase  Hierbij denk je ook buiten de reguliere bedrijfsvoering en vaste patronen om en zorg je voor pragmatische oplossingen  Met jouw  data driven mindset  help je jouw collega s bij het onderzoeken  analyseren en oplossen van businessproblemen  Bovenal haal je vanuit je data analyses nieuwe kansen en denkrichtingen naar boven  Zo voeg je direct waarde toe aan de diensten van BFG Warehousing  Je dagelijkse werk bestaat uit het verzamelen en ordenen van relevante data  waarbij je deze controleert op correctheid en datamodellen ontwikkelt  Je maakt rapportages en analyses en helpt bij het automatiseren hiervan  Ook lever je een bijdrage aan voorspel  en optimalisatiemodellen om de klanttevredenheid  effectiviteit en performance te verbeteren  Daarbij breng je advies uit aan het management  Je rapporteert aan de Teamleider Supply Chain Planning   Forecast  BFG Warehousing is als logistiek servicepartner in de foodbranche meer dan alleen een logistiek dienstverlener  We bedienen de hele keten  van forecasting richting leveranciers tot de analyse van aflevertijden bij klanten en het voorkomen en beheersen van derving in de foodchain  Door data slim en innovatief in te zetten  genereer jij waardevolle nieuwe inzichten in de Supply Chain van BFG Warehousing en zijn opdrachtgevers  Jij hebt de vrijheid om deze nieuwe functie samen met de Teamleider Supply Chain Planning   Forecast te ontwikkelen en uit te bouwen  WAT MAG JIJ VAN ONS VERWACHTEN  Een uitdagende baan bij een familiebedrijf met een platte organisatiestructuur  Samenwerken met een team van enthousiaste collega s in een prettige en informele werksfeer  Volop ruimte voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling  Uitstekende primaire en secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden OVER BFG WAREHOUSING  BFG Warehousing B V  is onderdeel van Bieze Food Group  een familiebedrijf met veel ruimte voor en vraag naar ondernemerschap  zelfstandigheid  verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel  energie  doorzettingsvermogen en humor  Als een van de grootste duurzame en gekoelde distributiecentra van Nederland staat flexibiliteit bij al onze diensten voorop  Meedenken met de ketenpartners en ze in elke situatie de meest ideale logistieke oplossing bieden  dát is waar wij goed in zijn  WAT VERWACHTEN WE VAN JOU ALS DATA ANALIST  Je hebt een afgeronde hbo opleiding op het gebied van wiskunde  economie of econometrie  Je beschikt over kennis van relevante statistische analysemethodes  Je kunt goed omgaan met  analyse programma s zoals Microsoft Excel  Microsoft Power BI  Microsoft Dynamics AX en andere datatools  Je beschikt over goed ontwikkelde analytische vaardigheden en bent een kei in het oplossen van problemen  Mensen kennen jou als een zelfstandig werkende collega die een groot verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel laat zien en zorgvuldigheid hoog op zijn prioriteitenlijst heeft staan MEER INFORMATIE OF DIRECT SOLLICITEREN   Neem voor meer informatie over deze vacature en andere mogelijkheden contact met ons op via  31  0 33 247 71 00  Ben je zelf  momenteel  niet geïnteresseerd  maar ken je dé persoon voor deze baan  Deel dan de vacature

Professional Job Netherlands  Delft Customer Success Netherlands As a Data Specialist in the Customer Success Operations team at Exact  you will transform our various datasets into reports and dashboards that provide actionable and valuable information for the business  And where is your career heading  That s up to you  The career opportunities are unprecedented  1 850 enterprising colleagues have already paved the way  Are you on board This   the job you are looking for The role of Data Specialist in the Customer Success Operations team is responsible for providing comprehensive insights and analyses that help drive decision making across all customer success disciplines  You will collaborate with the other Data Specialists and project leads within the team to deliver the best possible insights and improvement plans for Customer Success teams  And that s not all  We can rely on you as a Data Specialist to  work closely together with different stakeholders within the customer success disciplines to make their job as efficient as possible  Develop interactive reports and the creation of scalability and behavioral metrics  Assess customer contact related plans and procedures to help improve the understanding of our internal processes and their effectiveness for all departmental KPIs such as  first contact resolution    case deflection  and  self service rates  This   your team You will join the 8 colleagues in the Customer Success Operations team within the Customer Success department  Our colleagues in Customer Success offer support in setting up  customising and applying the software  always going the extra mile for customers  Customer support professionals  consultants and project managers work together to provide the best support to our customers  As part of Customer Success  the Operations team is aiming to achieve the shared KPIs for Customer Success  delivering the best possible customer experience and focusing on customer satisfaction This   what you future colleagues says Being directly involved in improvement process through reporting and analysis of customer success metrics feels really rewarding  There is always a room for development  creativity and initiative as well  For the time I have been working as a Data Specialist at Exact  I have gradually improved my technical skills and business acumen     Victoria Nenasheva  Customer Success Data Specialist This   what you bring With us  you can be yourself  and we would love to discover what sets you apart  For the position of Data Specialist in the Customer Success Operations team you have  Experience in working with varied types of data  revenue  transactional logs  surveys  big query  etc    Experience with data analysis and visualization tools  MS SQL  Power BI  AWS  etc    The ability to oversee the total information architecture  A pragmatic mind set and willing to use small iterations to achieve fast results  Very strong analytical skills  Knowledge of quantitative research methods and experience in using these methods  Experience in relevant business operations is a big plus  This   what you get At Exact  we work hard  And there is something in return  The balance between work and relaxation is very important to us  So once everything gets back to normal  you can work up a sweat in our own gym or take a break at the coffee bar  Empty your head and then tackle your daily tasks with renewed energy  And  of course  that s not all  As a Data Specialist in the Customer Success Operations team  based on 32 40 hours per week  you can also count on  a salary matching your experience and skills  a holiday allowance of 8   a thirteenth month bonus  Reimbursement of travel    working from home  expenses This  our application procedure If we have enough in common  there will first be an online interview with the Talent Acquisition Business Partner  The second step is an interview with the hiring manager and an in depth discussion with a future colleague  If you have any questions about the position and or the application procedure  Wendy Vermeulen  Manager Talent Acquisition  will be happy to answer them by phone on  31 613 29 46 56  This   Exact Founded in 1984 and now operating in more than 100 countries  we are a leader in the global business and financial software market  What makes us stand out  We combine the energy of a start up with the advantages of a multinational  Our aim is to create the best business software with the most innovative software solutions  Over 550 000 entrepreneurs and accountants trust our software and use it on a daily basis  As an employer  we accept our social responsibility  This is important to us and we genuinely believe in it  We think green in everything we do  whether it s by reducing paper consumption  encouraging digital working and minimising travel by plane and car  We also support employees who want to contribute to the  local  community  Exact celebrates Vacatures Head of Data FinTech Data inspirator en natuurlijk verbinder met vooruitziende blik Opleidingsniveau Master Werkervaring 7 10    10 jaar locatie Utrecht Vacatures 6 750   8 250 Solliciteer direct Solliciteren Deel Pieter de Boer Recruiter Stel mij een vraag  Direct naar  Klanten blij  Wat je doet  n iets voor jou  Wat je krijgt Hoe maak jij onze klanten en partners blij  De FinTech data organisatie staat aan de vooravond van de volgende fase  Het fundament staat  het beton is gegoten  FinTech s ketenbetrouwbaarheid is gewaarborgd  we zijn  on top of our  data en  in control  over onze processen  Naast data analisten in elk van de vier producten  kunnen we een lange termijn datablik en  outside in  inspiratie goed gebruiken  Om met de juiste datagedreven  mindset  de gaafste FinTech innovaties voor onze klanten en partners te bedenken   Wat je doet als Head of Data Je gaat helpen de data organisatie binnen FinTech naar een strategisch en toekomstgericht niveau te brengen  Weet dat we hongerig zijn naar verbetering en dat we dus graag naar buiten kijken om te leren wat we als FinTech   of zelfs bol com   beter kunnen doen op het gebied van data  Je droomt weg bij alle mogelijkheden die we als FinTech nog hebben om nog meer data gedreven te werken  Die mogelijkheden vertaal je in een strak meerjarenplan   Als Head of Data maak je het verschil voor miljoenen klanten binnen het FinTech domein  bent inspirator van je centrale data club en verantwoordelijk voor de teamimpact  Je spot voordelen van synergie en creëert samenwerkingsverbanden tussen Data Analyse en Data Science  Met je data pet op ben je een luisterend oor voor de Producten  snapt de belangen van FinTech en brengt scherpte op data gedreven werken en experimenteren  Je bent dus een natuurlijk verbinder en motivator en durft ook mensen aan te spreken  Ook cruciaal  je kunt je eigen belang makkelijk parkeren  maakt anderen beter en adviseert op strategisch niveau  Samen met andere domeinen trek je complexe projecten met flair  Dus ben je een oersterke sparringpartner voor het domein  en product leiderschap binnen FinTech  Ben jij de m v x die inspiratie biedt binnen en buiten het domein én leiding geeft aan het  nog op te bouwen  team van data analisten   Je bent het gezicht van FinTech Data en legt contact binnen en buiten FinTech  met bijvoorbeeld Data Science en Business Intelligence  Je adviseert het Domein Leiderschap over de laatste trends en ontwikkelingen rondom Data  die je vertaalt naar concrete plannen Je houdt van abstractie en strategie maar kan dat ook vertalen naar wat data kan betekenen voor FinTech Je opereert op ooghoogte met Product Leiderschap en adviseert hoe ze hun datateams naar grote hoogtes kunnen brengen Je begeleidt samen met de People Lead Data de veranderagenda rond de voorziene dataorganisatie  houdt deze constant onder de loep en stuurt bij waar nodig Je predikt het benutten van data bij het maken van  strategische  beslissingen en denkt in hypothese gedreven besluitvorming Samen met het centrale data team drijven jullie strategische en cross product initiatieven  en domeinprojecten waar data key is  Ook monitor je samen met je team de FinTech KPI s en bouwen jullie top notch dashboards om tot verrassende inzichten te komen  En jullie creëren een data analisten community  zodat jullie samen elke dag beter worden in het vak en uiteraard  fun  hebben  3 redenen waarom dit  n iets voor jou is Laat zien waarom niet Laat zien waarom wel  Je niet op de hoogte bent van de latest en greatest op het gebied van data Nee  als je van alles interessant vindt  behalve de laatste data trends en de nieuwste technologie  Je leeft het liefste in een luchtkasteel Nee  als je data initiatieven vaak op de plank belanden  je omgeving heeft geen idee wat ze ermee moeten  Je snapt weinig van AI Nee  als je denkt dat AI alleen maar staat voor  ad interim  en ook geen idee hebt wat Machine Learning voor klanten kan betekenen   Ruime leidinggevende ervaring aan een club van dataenthousiastelingen Ja  als je al 5  jaar leiding geeft aan team van data analisten  engineers en of scientists en deze ervaring koppelt aan bewezen strategische skills   Moon shots   mars trips klinken als de dag van morgen Ja  als je verder denkt dan je kijken kunt en mensen enthousiast weet te maken voor toekomstige data vergezichten   Je vertroetelt stakeholders Ja  als je stevige bruggen bouwt  tussen én binnen groepen  en anderen in staat stelt om met de mooiste inzichten voor partners   klanten te komen Hier kom je terecht We onboarden je binnen onze productorganisatie die bestaat uit 46 multidisciplinaire productteams  die de transitie van Agile naar Product led thinking maken  Deze teams zijn gegroepeerd in 8 domeinen  die allemaal bijdragen aan de purpose van bol com   Samen veranderen we retail om het dagelijks leven makkelijker te maken   Je opereert in samenwerking met de Producten  Invoicing  Fraud   Risk  Payments   Collection  binnen FinTech en rapporteert samen met de People Lead aan het Domein Leadership  Goed om te weten  bol com werkt op basis van Spark  een blend van Agile en Holacracy  Autonomie en ownership gaan hier hand in hand  We werken multidisciplinair  waarbij het enablen van teams bovenaan staat  Belangrijke uitgangspunten zijn rollen boven functies  vertrouwen  verantwoordelijkheid en focus op de ontwikkeling van onze mensen    Wij creëren een omgeving waarin we de kracht van diversiteit benutten  De voordelen van een blauw hart Wat je nog meer krijgt Aan en uit Bij bol com snappen we als geen ander dat je eerst voor jezelf moet zorgen  dan voor je omgeving en dan voor bol com  In die volgorde  Daarom krijgt iedereen bij bol com 29 vakantiedagen  De cultuur en het kantoor Onze collega s werken keihard om het dagelijks leven van onze klanten makkelijker en leuker te maken  Maar dit doen we uiteraard wel in een inspirerende en creatieve omgeving met leuke activiteiten  De extra s Denk hierbij aan trainingen  een lekkere lunch  een telefoon en eventueel een leaseauto  wanneer dit nodig is voor het uitoefenen van je functie  Sollicitatieproces Alles dat je moet weten over je sollicitatieproces bij bol com Je solliciteert Wij bekijken je sollicitatie zorgvuldig en binnen twee weken weet je of we je uitnodigen voor een gesprek  Het eerste contact Wij nemen telefonisch contact met je op om het eerste gesprek in te plannen  En als we elkaar toch al spreken  pak vooral de kans om alvast prangende vragen te stellen  Elkaar in het echt  digitaal  ontmoeten Tijdens het eerste gesprek maken we kennis met elkaar  We zullen ingaan op jouw competenties en je eerdere werkervaring  En natuurlijk ook de inhoud van de functie  Het tweede gesprek Voor het tweede gesprek vragen we je om van te voren een online assessment te maken  Bij sommige functies kunnen we je vragen om iets extra s  zoals een business case  Wederzijdse liefde Is er een Voodoo is a tech company that creates mobile games and apps  With 6 billions downloads and over 300 million monthly active users  Voodoo is the  1 mobile publisher worldwide  The company is one of the most impressive examples of hypergrowth in the ecosystem  backed by Goldman Sachs  Tencent  and GBL  Deciding to expand its portfolio of products further  Voodoo has more recently announced its investment in blockchain technology to bring blockchain games to mobile users  Voodoo is now a team of over 600 employees worldwide  we re looking for talented individuals from across the globe to come and entertain the world with us  Team Based on our principles and values  you will have the chance to work with a variety of experts  product managers  monetization managers  data analysts   and still more  We harness data and creativity through innovation on the Voodoo gaming portfolio  We gain a better understanding of our player base in order to keep on offering the best entertainment value out there  We bring new ideas to life and develop existing concepts to enrich our already diversified gaming portfolio  We make our games even more fun  engaging  long lasting and entertaining  Pair that with top of the line A B testing capabilities and you ve got yourself a great environment for learning and developing Casual and Hyper Casual games  Join us and be part of a small  international  and passionate team  Role We are looking for a Data Business Analyst who is deeply passionate about data driven decisions  transforming raw data into clear actionable business insights  and who is constantly driving themselves and the team towards completing the next challenge  By joining this team  you will have a strong impact on the business and a unique opportunity to reach hundreds of millions of users with your insights and recommendations  Analyzing large  complex data sets representing the behavior of millions of online and mobile game players to address strategic and operational business questions Provide actionable recommendations and conclusions from game data to shape features  game economies  and future product roadmaps Work closely with internal departments to drive insights that will help produce better games and insights that will drive towards monetization and retention improvements Build automated dashboards and reports to facilitate company wide awareness and understanding of key business metrics and players  experience Manage multiple projects at a time in a fast paced  results oriented environment Profile At least one year of analytical work experience  preferably for a web or mobile company  or in the online gaming industry BA B Sc in Statistics   Math   Engineering  Economy or other quantitative fields Strong SQL with experience in querying large  complex data sets and strong Excel skills High level of analytical and problem solving skills with strong attention to detail Ability to turn complex concepts into actionable recommendations True passion for understanding consumers  social gaming behavior and tolerance for ambiguity Experience working with Periscope   Tableau is an advantage Advanced knowledge in statistical tools and models is an advantage

As a Technical data center specialist you are part of an operations team within the Data Center   Networks department  which is part of ING s Tech Infrastructure   Engineering organization  For this role  fluency in Dutch is mandatory  This position is based in Rotterdam  The opportunity You direct the management  maintenance and changes projects of the technical facilities  mechanical and electrical  of ING s own data center and you are involved in an advisory capacity in the services of ING s data center in the Netherlands  and possibly abroad   Within these activities the focus is on the continuity of service  The team In a small team you ensure continuity of high quality technical installations  such as power  cooling  fire alarm  mechanical and electrical installations  With this you contribute to the availability of online applications that ING customers use Roles and responsibilities As a technical data center specialist  the emphasis of your role is mainly on being in control of the continuity and availability of the technical installations for the data center  Managing  monitoring and guaranteeing the daily routine in the field of technical preventive and corrective maintenance of technical installations  such as electrical systems  LV and HV   UPS systems  generators  cooling installations  During office hours you coordinate complex maintenance work in the field of HVAC  electrical engineering and measurement   control technology  which are performed by our suppliers  You also perform tests in installations  systems and you perform switching actions  To guarantee the continuity of ING services  you work with the team in an on call service  outside office hours  in which you coordinate the handling of malfunctions  You manage the maintenance parties contracted by ING who  based on their own technical expertise  ensure that malfunctions  corrective  and regular  preventive  maintenance are carried out at an operational level  The maintenance parties support you in supplying and safeguarding data with regard to legislation and regulations from technology  Think for example of NEN2767  NEN3140  etc  In this you have a tactical role in which you must safeguard the laws and regulations  Some other activities are  Ensuring the continuity and availability of our technical installations Safeguarding the various Assets in the maintenance management system  with support from the contractor  Requesting and assessing quotations  sub contractors Support with the preparation of MJOP  Multi Year Maintenance Plan  and MJOB  Budget  Optimize performance of the technical infrastructure both financially and towards ING s sustainability objectives Your work environment The team in which you will be working  OPS1  focuses on the building related technical infrastructure of the data centers  This team works in close collaboration with the OPS2  data space facilities   DC CoE  knowledge and advisory team  and Haas  IT Hardware  teams  As a whole  these departments provide the overall data center services for ING s IT users  both nationally and internationally  under the heading of  Global Data Center Services  GDS    It is a challenging work environment in which an experienced team will introduce you to the installations  working methods and processes in a data center  When you have gained enough experience and feel comfortable to take on more responsibility  you will work independently within the team  The installations you will be managing form the basis on which all ING applications and online services function  A working environment with a high risk of damage that calls on your technical creativity  It is a team where collegiality is of paramount importance  How to succeed We hire smart people like you for your potential  Our biggest expectation is that you ll stay curious  Keep learning  Take on responsibility  In return  we ll back you to develop into an even more awesome version of yourself  You are someone who functions well in a challenging complex technical environment  You have team spirit and you don t mind working on consignment service outside normal office hours  You are someone who dares to give a well founded opinion  who is eager to learn and who thinks analytically  If you feel at home in ING s values  considers the interests of those involved with integrity  makes fair and careful decisions  uses available budgets wisely and responsibly  then we ask you to apply  In addition  you recognize yourself in the following profile  Knowledge of mechanical engineering  electrical engineering  measurement   control technology and data infrastructure and demonstrable work experience in these fields Knowledge of contract management and environmental  safety and working conditions regulations and guidelines Knowledge of and affinity with legislation and regulations and also certifications  for example NEN2767  NEN3140  ISO27001 and ISO50001  Good communicative skills English language proficiency Fluency in Dutch is a must Rewards   benefits Rewards and benefits We want to make sure that it s possible for you to strike the right balance between your career and your private life  You can find out more about our employment conditions at https   www ing jobs netherlands Why ING benefits htm The benefits of working with us at ING include A salary tailored to your qualities and experience24 27 vacation days depending on contractPension scheme13th month salaryIndividual Savings Contribution  BIS   3 5  of your gross annual salary8  Holiday paymentPersonal growth and challenging work with endless possibilitiesAn informal working environment with innovative colleaguesWork Agile  so new ideas come to life faster Questions  Contact Pierre Julien Dechassat in the Werk waar je trots op kan zijn Dit ga je doen  Door de energietransitie komt er meer werk dan ooit op ons af  Steeds meer huizen en wijken gaan van het gas af  En de meter  die rollen we nog steeds uit  Dat heeft impact  zeker op onze afdeling Meterdatamanagement  Het team Meterdatamanagement zorgt onder andere voor het verstrekken van meterdata van inmiddels 1 3 miljoen klanten met een slimme meter aan gemandateerde marktpartijen en interne afdelingen  De data uit de meter is essentieel om  zowel intern als extern  procesverbeteringen en kostenbesparing tot stand te brengen  En daar kom jij als data analist bij kijken   Je bent een belangrijke schakel in het realiseren van een functionerend meterpark  Voor het beheren hiervan hebben we diverse systemen en processen  Het beheren van onze data processen kunnen we dan ook aan jou overlaten  In opdracht van de proces managers onderhoud en verbeter je deze systemen en processen  Door jouw inzichten  analyses  dashboards en visualisaties hebben we controle over onze processen en ons meterpark  Door jou verbeteren we onze prestaties   Je analyseert bijvoorbeeld waarom een meter geen data levert  In teamverband vind je visualiseert deze  Ook ben je de vraagbaak coach op de inhoudelijke materie voor de junior data analisten  Zo veel mogelijk functionerende slimme meters  ook dat is de energietransitie  Genoeg te doen dus  Doe jij mee   Jouw sterke punten Worden we blij van  Je bent in staat je complexe werkzaamheden in begrijpelijk Nederlandse taal aan je stakeholders uit te leggen  Je kan analyses vertalen en afdelingen en processen  Je bent pro actief en meedenkend met jouw stakeholders uit de business  Immers zorgen we samen voor een functionerend meterpark  Wat jou verder onze nieuwe  junior  data analist maakt   Je hebt minimaal een hbo niveau opleiding afgerond  bij voorkeur in de richting informatica of vergelijkbaar   Je hebt enige jaren relevante  stage ervaring met relationele databases RDMS SQL en het analyseren  koppelen en transformeren van data   Je hebt kennis en ervaring van een of meerdere programmeertalen  zoals Python  Splunk C    Java   Je bent goed in staat om hoofd  van bijzaken te onderscheiden en kan ook goed zelfstandig werken   Bekijk Onze arbeidsvoorwaarden  Elke maand je Persoonlijk Budget kiezen  Het Persoonlijk Budget is een percentage van je bruto maandsalaris en ontvang je bovenop je salaris  Afhankelijk van je salarisschaal is dat tot 24  van je brutosalaris  inclusief 8  vakantiegeld  Je bepaalt zelf waaraan je het Persoonlijk Budget wilt besteden  Zo kun je het uit laten keren voor een maandelijks extraatje  Of je koopt extra verlofdagen   Flexibele werktijden  Wil je zelf je werkweek indelen  Samen met je leidinggevende bepaal jij zo veel mogelijk je eigen werktijden  We werken 8 uur per dag  Afhankelijk van je werkzaamheden  heb je de mogelijkheid om  wanneer het kan  thuis te werken   Vervoer  We zijn een duurzaam bedrijf  Reis je met het OV naar je werk  dan krijg je van ons een OV Vrij abonnement 2e klas  Dit abonnement mag je ook privé gebruiken  Kies je voor een vaste reiskostenvergoeding dan ontvang je 13 cent per job_desc: Purpose   Overall Relevance for the Organization  Earlier this year  adidas decided to elevate the Data   Analytics function  moving from a tech service to a value oriented business function that actively and directly impacts adidas  P L The Data   Analytics function will include a Global Operations Advanced Analytics team  which will work hand in hand with the Global Operations organization on strategically relevant use cases that have the potential to deliver substantial value and redefine the way that the Global Operations business function operates  For example  the Global Operations Advanced Analytics team will build data science products to make supply chain faster  more efficient  and responsive through seamless demand   supply planning  optimized logistics and distribution  customized replenishment and automated workforce and production planning  The Data Scientists in the Global Operations Advanced Analytics team will support the development of data science methods for specific use cases across the full analytics lifecycle  from defining the business   data understanding to data preparation  modeling  evaluation  and deployment  Key Responsibilities Data science Support the development of data science methods for specific Global Operations use cases Continuously improve our methodologies and challenge the status quo  raising the standards for faster delivery Support improving and automating the data science platform and our machine learning pipeline to facilitate our data science activities and service use cases Data science network and storytelling Develop and nurture a data science network  both within and outside of adidas  to ensure that best practices and innovations are disseminated across the company Support presenting and promoting results and insights to adidas colleagues at all levels Stakeholder management Manage the relationships with the Global Operations project team  ensuring their views and requirements are captured Act as the ambassador for your use case  showcasing the key functionalities  driving adoption  and assuring operational excellence together with IT peersKey relationships Global Operations project teams SCM IT team Other teams within Data   Analytics  e g   Data assets  data platforms  data governance  market teams  Requisite Education and Experience   Minimum Qualifications Work experience University degree in the field of numeric statistical discipline or equivalent At least 4 years work experience  preferably in a data science or analytics environment Analytical experience in Supply chain planning and operations preferred Proven track record of working with senior stakeholders Hard skills Proficiency in data science methods  including supervised techniques  unsupervised techniques  recommender systems  Experience in developing and running simulation  optimization  and what if scenario planning tools to support decision making Proficiency in at least two of the standard data science programming languages  e g   Python  R  Java  Scala  Octave  Solid understanding of relational databases and NoSQL databases  Experience working with Databricks preferred Solid understanding of Machine Learning Operations  MLOps  required to scale and sustain use cases in a large and global corporation Familiarity with agile development methodology Soft skills Impeccable and to the point written and oral communication skills  English  Comfortable in presenting complex topics to stakeholders at various organizational levels Proven team player that can collaborate across functions and organizations Ability to develop influential and collaborative relationships High resilience and solution oriented attitudeAT ADIDAS WE HAVE A WINNING CULTURE  BUT TO WIN  PHYSICAL POWER IS NOT ENOUGH  JUST LIKE ATHLETES OUR EMPLOYEES NEED MENTAL STRENGTH IN THEIR GAME  WE FOSTER THE ATHLETE S MINDSET THROUGH A SET OF BEHAVIORS THAT WE WANT TO ENABLE AND DEVELOP IN OUR PEOPLE AND THAT ARE AT THE CORE OF OUR UNIQUE COMPANY CULTURE   THE 3CS  CONFIDENCE  COLLABORATION AND CREATIVITY  CONFIDENCE allows athletes to make quick decisions on the field  to reach higher  For us at adidas confidence means acknowledging that we don t have all the answers  But we are willing to take risks  we try new things  And if we fail  then this is part of our learning   it helps us improve  COLLABORATION  Every elite athlete relies on partners  coaches  teammates  and nutritionists  We  too  know that we are stronger together  Winning as one team takes open and candid dialogue  inclusiveness and trust in each other s abilities and talents  Being the best sports company in the world takes CREATIVITY  No great athlete succeeds by copying their predecessors Dit ga je doen Herken jij vanuit data ontwikkelingen en verbetermogelijkheden  Heb jij oog voor het leggen van verbanden die een ander niet ziet  Als Klant Data Analist ben jij de specialist op het gebied van klant data  De analyses die jij doet en de adviezen die jij geeft  leiden tot verbeteringen die zorgen voor een optimale ervaring van de klanten van het CAK   De afdeling Klantmanagement is ervoor verantwoordelijk dat de regelingen Zvw en Buitenland werken en denken vanuit de klant en de bedoeling van de regeling  De collega s op de afdeling zorgen ervoor dat het Regelingcluster en alle medewerkers doordrongen zijn van de verschillende klantdoelgroepen  hun specifieke problemen en wensen en de optimale wijze waarop het CAK hen kan bedienen   Jij bent als Klant Data Analist een sparringpartner voor het management  Gevraagd en ongevraagd verzorg jij analyses en geef jij advies  Dit alles met een optimale ervaring voor de klant in het achterhoofd  Tevens maak jij vanuit incidenten ook grondige analyses  Specifieke activiteiten waar jij verantwoordelijk voor bent zijn o a  het verzamelen en inlezen van relevante data  het achterhalen van requirements en het opstellen van rapportages  Uiteraard bekleed je vanuit deze werkzaamheden een adviserende rol richting het management  waarbij jouw adviezen helder geformuleerd en haalbaar zijn  Belangrijk in deze functie is dat jij een goed overzicht houdt over de totale keten  zodat jij weet wat de impact is van jouw werkzaamheden  Daarnaast is proactief communiceren en afstemmen met stakeholders essentieel  Je hebt in je rol veel contact met collega Klant Data Analisten  Adviseurs Klantmanagement en jouw leidinggevende   Met jouw datagedreven manier van werken til jij de afdeling en het CAK naar een hoger niveau  Dit komt tot uiting via jouw analyses  maar is ook terug te zien in de datamodellen en dashboardondersteuning die jij levert  Uiteindelijk ervaren de klanten van het CAK deze impact  waardoor de klantbeleving sterk verbeterd wordt   Dit neem je meeminimaal HBO opleiding afgerond  je hebt meerdere jaren ervaring opgedaan in een vergelijkbare rol  je bent zowel sterk in data analyse als in functionele analyse  uiteraard ben jij sterk analytisch onderlegd  waarbij jij jouw analyses ook graag omzet naar concrete resultaten  je bent assertief  oplossingsgericht en communicatief vaardig  je werkt altijd met een goed eindresultaat in het achterhoofd  je hebt ervaring met Business intelligence tools dataverwerkingsprogramma s zoals bv  PowerBI  SQL en Oracle  je schrikt niet van grote en complexe datastromen   Dat je wilt blijven leren en een baan zoekt voor de lange termijn is belangrijk voor het CAK  Wij investeren graag in jouw ontwikkeling zodat jij blijvend kunt groeien  Werken bij het CAK vraagt energie  doorzettingsvermogen en daadkracht   Dit krijg je van onseen salaris van minimaal   2 906   en maximaal   4 277   bruto per maand  schaal 9 CAO Zorgverzekeraars  bij een 36 urige werkweek  inschaling o b v  opleiding  kennis en relevante ervaring  een functie voor de lange termijn met na een jaar kans op een vast contract  24 5 vakantiedagen o b v  36 urige werkweek  een keuzebudget van 16 33  van je bruto salaris  een goede pensioenvoorziening  ondergebracht bij ABP  een collectieve zorgverzekering en sportmogelijkheden  waar het CAK in kan bijdragen  openbaar vervoer wordt volledig vergoed  2e klasse   Of  0 19 kilometervergoeding wanneer je met de auto komt tot max 75km enkele reis  We gebruiken hiervoor Mobility Mixx  ruimte voor jouw loopbaan en persoonlijke ontwikkeling  Onder andere met een online CAK academie en samenwerkingsverbanden met trainingsbureaus  de mogelijkheid om thuis en op ons kantoor in Den Haag te werken  Vanwege de huidige Covid 19 omstandigheden werken wij voorlopig vanuit huis  Hiervoor ontvang je een thuiswerkvergoeding van twee euro per dag   Wist je dat ruim 1 5 miljoen Nederlanders te maken hebben met het CAK  Het CAK is een belangrijke maatschappelijke speler in het zorgdomein  We voeren regelingen uit in opdracht van het ministerie van Volksgezondheid  Welzijn en Sport  VWS  én vertalen de wet  en regelgeving naar begrijpelijke en toegankelijke informatie voor onze klanten  Dit doen we samen met gedreven specialisten die geloven in verbondenheid  Die  binnen een cultuur van continu leren en verbeteren  elke dag het verschil willen maken voor onze klanten  Want dat is werken bij het CAK  werken met de menselijke maat   Klaar voor een nieuwe uitdaging bij het CAK  Je kunt direct solliciteren via Ontdek hier alles over ons sollicitatietraject   Iedereen is anders en juist de verschillen in mensen helpen ons om een nog beter CAK te zijn  Voel je daarom altijd welkom te solliciteren  wij zijn job_title: Two Assistant Professors in Geometric and Topological aspects of Data and Algorithms
job_desc: Are you a researcher in mathematics  Are you interested in geometry  topology  data science and algorithms  Please apply at Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam  VU   Location  Amsterdam FTE  0 8   1 Job description We are seeking a new colleague who is passionate about scientific research and education  Our department is looking for mathematicians with a proven expertise in geometric and topological aspects of data and algorithms  This topic can be interpreted in a wide sense  we are interested in analytical  statistical  probabilistic and combinatorial ideas to deepen our understanding of the relation between geometric and topological ideas on the one hand  and data science and its algorithms on the other hand  Concrete subject fields include stochastic geometry  topological  methods in  data analysis  geometric aspects of statistical learning  reconstruction of manifolds from data  equivariant deep neural networks  and applications of these  Other combinations of geometry topology and data algorithms are also a possibility   In this position  you develop their own research line  The position of Assistant Professor is initially a tenure track position for five years  After four years  based on transparent criteria  we will take a decision on the tenure  The preferred starting date is on or before September 1  2022   Applications from all groups currently under represented in academic posts are particularly encouraged  We are working to improve the present gender balance within the department  and particularly welcome applications from women Your duties you develop a research line in the broad area covering geometric and topological aspects of data and algorithms you complement existing research activities in the department you contribute to the teaching of the department  at both the undergraduate and graduate level you show academic leadership  nationally and internationally you participate in departmental activities and tasks  including writing grant proposals Requirements you have a PhD in mathematics  for example in the fields mentioned above  with a few years of postdoctoral experience you have a strong research record  as witnessed by excellent publications  original research projects  and an international network you are an inspiring lecturer you have good communication and execution skills you are fluent in English you have a basic teaching qualification   BKO    as required by Dutch universities  or equivalent  If not  you are willing to obtain this qualification What are we offering  A challenging position in a socially involved organisation  Based on full time employment  and depending on experience  the gross monthly salary ranges from  3807 to  5922 in accordance with Dutch academic salary scales 11  or 12  The job profile  Assistant professor or  Universitair docent   is based on the Dutch university job ranking system and the position is available for 0 8 1 0 FTE  For exceptional  experienced candidates an appointment as associate professor is a possibility   The appointment will initially be for 5 years  tenure track   After a satisfactory evaluation of the initial appointment  the contract will be extended indefinitely  Additionally  Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam offers excellent fringe benefits and various schemes and regulations to promote a good work life balance  such as  a maximum of 41 days of annual leave based on full time employment 8  holiday allowance and 8 3  end of year bonus contribution to commuting expenses good paid parental leave scheme child daycare facilities available on campusAbout Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam The ambition of Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam is clear  to contribute to a better world through outstanding education and ground breaking research  We strive to be a university where personal development and commitment to society play a leading role  A university where people from different disciplines and backgrounds collaborate to achieve innovations and to generate new knowledge  Our teaching and research encompass the entire spectrum of academic endeavor   from the humanities  the social sciences and the natural sciences through to the life sciences and the medical sciences   Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam is home to more than 26 000 students  We employ over 4 600 individuals  The VU campus is easily accessible and located in the heart of Amsterdam s Zuidas district  a truly inspiring environment for teaching and research  Diversity  We are an inclusive university community  Diversity is one of our most important values  We believe that engaging in international activities and welcoming students and staff from a wide variety of backgrounds enhances the quality of our education and research  We are always looking for people who can enrich our world with their own unique perspectives and experiences  The Faculty of Science  The Faculty of Science inspires researchers and students to find sustainable solutions for complex societal issues  From forest fires to big data  from obesity to medicines and from molecules to the moon  our teaching and research programmes cover the full spectrum of the natural sciences  We share knowledge and experience with leading research institutes and industries  both here in the Netherlands and abroad   Working at the Faculty of Science means working with students  PhD candidates and researchers  all with a clear focus on their field and a broad view of the world  We employ more than 1 250 staff members  and we are home to around 6 000 students The Department of Mathematics  The Department of Mathematics strives for excellence in research  The department balances pure mathematical research with mathematical research motivated by applications  Researchers in the department are on one hand active at a fundamental and theoretical level  and  on the other hand  work on applications with links to business  the sciences  and societal issues  The department has a strong international research staff with expertise in dynamical systems  geometry and algebra  as well as in stochastics  statistics  data analytics  probability    The department offers bachelor and master programmes in mathematics and in business analytics  In addition  the department provides mathematics courses for other programmes of the Faculty of Science  for programmes of other faculties in the university  and for the Amsterdam University College  Application Are you interested in this position  Please apply via the application button by 1 April 2022 and upload  a cover letter in which you describe your abilities and motivation  a research statement  a brief teaching statement  a curriculum vitae  a publication list  as well as the contact details of three potential referees Applications received by e mail will not be processed  Vacancy questions  If you have any questions regarding this vacancy  please contact   Name  Bob Rink  Position  Professor of Mathematics  E mail  b w rink vu nl

Introduction Do you love complex analyses  have a passion for solving puzzles  and a strong drive to apply this in operations  Would you enjoy interpreting big data  transforming it into meaningful information  and ultimately shaping it to enhance our understanding of our supply chains  Then we are looking for you  Job Mission In this role  you will support Supply Chain   Sourcing Management and Finance with analytics and advice regarding Inventory and Capital Expenditures  CAPEX   This to support ExCom  Business Lines and Sectors with insight into consequences of their planning  business and operational decisions  If you like contributing to key decision processes with your expertise and want to enable ASML to achieve its financial targets then this is the position for you  Job Description In this job you will Weekly Monthly report out on CAPEX to different stakeholders being the single point of contact for themDrive the yearly TAP process and be part of the LTFP process regarding Sourcing   Supply Chain CAPEX  Define together with finance budgets for sectors and Business lines  Analyze inventory data generated out of the system by the inventory management teamDefine based on the analysis actions towards dedicated stakeholdersBe contact person for inventory related topics towards the stakeholders  sectors BL Give advice to the organization on inventory related topics based on your analyses and experience you gathered Education Bachelor or Academic level in econometrics  operations research  industrial engineering or similar  Experience   1 to 4 years relevant work experience  Supply Chain Management   Operations   Finance Experience with MS Office and SAP is required  SQL is preferred Personal skills   personality Excellent communication skills  including stakeholder management High abstraction and analytical abilityResult oriented  hands on mentalityProblem solving  flexible and critical thinking Diversity   Inclusion ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce  It is the policy of the company to recruit  hire  train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race  color  religion  sex  age  national origin  veteran status  disability  sexual orientation  or gender identity  We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company

inrichten en of verbeteren van de particuliere processen in de keten  Je gaat werken in het area DM R  We ondersteunen de area s van de Tribe Wonen op het gebied van Data  Modellen en Wet  en Regelgeving  zodat zij zich kunnen focussen op het optimaliseren van de klantreizen  Dit doen we door te werken aan uitdagende en interessante trajecten die zich onderscheiden door afwisseling  complexiteit en samenwerking met veel verschillende stakeholders zoals Lokale Banken  Operations afdelingen en Risk en Finance  Doorgaans in multidisciplinaire teams met focus  En stel je eens voor dat jij hieraan dagelijks een belangrijke bijdrage kunt leveren  Een verantwoordelijkheid met impact  die jij vormgeeft als Procesmanager DM R bij de Tribe Wonen  Impact creëren Je bent een sterke partner  die op krachtige wijze de eisen en wensen van onze stakeholders zoals Bijzonder Beheer en Risk en Finance inbrengt in onze squads en de area  Je signaleert knelpunten en verbetermogelijkheden en komt proactief met oplossingen  Je adviseert over consistentie in area overstijgende processen en stuurt hier actief op aan  Je initieert veranderingen en draagt zorg voor realisatie en implementatie  waarbij je verantwoordelijk bent van start tot implementatie  Als procesmanager Ketensupport is het Changeplan van de tribe Wonen jouw uitgangspunt  Je realiseert procesveranderingen met impact op de volledige hypotheekketen  Je draagt bij aan het verbeteren van de klantreis door het optimaliseren van de ketenprocessen en initieert en realiseert vanuit LEAN filosofie verbeteringen hierin  Je focus ligt op de impact die deze initiatieven hebben op de keten en je zorgt voor succesvolle implementaties van veranderingen hierin  Als procesmanager DM R heb je de volgende aandachtsgebieden voor de keten  Datakwaliteit  databeschikbaarheid en Data Management  Het gebruik van data en  krediet risico  modellen in onze klantprocessen  Implementatie van  financiële  Wet  en Regelgeving   Met elkaar Samenwerken is de manier waarop we werken  Ons team OKS Particulieren bundelt de krachten om samen met onze ketenpartners de ketendoelstellingen te realiseren en zorgen we ervoor dat onze financieringsketen razendsnel kan anticiperen op veranderde marktomstandigheden  Dit doen we volgens de LEAN filosofie en op Agile wijze  Met jou erbij als Procesmanager Ketensupport staat de teller van en met jou staat het team op 90 diverse collega s waaronder  Procesmanager Ketensupport   Ik vind het ontzettend gaaf om als procesmanager mijn bijdrage te leveren aan het vernieuwen van onze hypotheek keten en om mijn kennis en ervaring in te zetten bij het innoveren van de klantprocessen in hypotheek keten   Met jouw talenten Dat klantgerichtheid  flexibiliteit  ondernemerschap en resultaatgerichtheid onmisbaar zijn voor deze functie is logisch  Daarbovenop is het belangrijk dat je je in onderstaande checklist herkent  een afgeronde HBO Bachelor of WO opleiding bijvoorbeeld in de richting bedrijfseconomie of bedrijfskunde  5 8 jaar relevante werkervaring in een soortgelijke functie  kennis van en ervaring met LEAN en Agile ontwikkelprocessen  minimaal Green Belt gecertificeerd en bereid de opleiding tot LEAN Black Belt te volgen  affiniteit met het inrichten ontwerpen van processen en methodieken  Kennis van en ervaring met het modelleren van processen in Aris is een pre  kennis van en ervaring met de werkzaamheden van  particuliere  financieringen is een pré  Bij de Rabobank Dat de Rabobank een financiële dienstverlener is voor meer dan 8 5 miljoen klanten in 40 landen  wist je vast al  Weet je ook dat we met elkaar werken aan een betere wereld  Dit doen we op 101 manieren  zoals    Nadenken over de toekomst doen we continu  We As a data analyst  you will play a major role in our customers  initiatives in the areas of data integration  data migration data quality and data management  Either working on projects by building a completely new data platform or implementing improvements by revamping an existing data platform   Our team consists of professionals with diverse backgrounds who understand the organisation and the field and enable innovation  We do this in every layer of information architecture such as  artificial intelligence and data science  business processes and decision making  application and infrastructure or access  security and governance   You will be The data analyst acts as the bridge between the customer and the Dev   Ops team in an Agile squadron environment  You discuss requirements  translating them into a plan with a solution design and working together with the developers to achieve a successful result  You are able to perform data analysis and identify data quality controls  and to evaluate the results of your team s development and analysis to all relevant stakeholders in the organisation   You will be joining one of the fastest growing consultancies in Europe  We are now  850 people  We re doers who think  Who can take the client s strategy  turn it into an actionable blueprint and help the client get it done  Who have deep expertise in operationalising strategy  process design  digitisation  data and analytics  automation  technology and change  But because the whole will always be greater than the sum of the parts  we weave these skills together in different ways to respond to new opportunities and challenges   Can you say yes to the following    3 years  experience in the field of Business Analysis    1 year of experience with Agile Scrum way of working    1 year experience with ETL processes  Knowledge of SQL and Data visualizations  e g  Power BI   Real team player with excellent communication   analytical skills  Fluent in Dutch  We offer you The opportunity to work in a diverse and international environment with an informal culture  with a flat hierarchy  in which we cooperate across business areas and levels  You will be working with some of the most talented and experienced consultants  and you will become part of a value driven company  In addition  you will receive direct freedom and responsibility in your work guided by structured coaching from your own mentor   We care about results  not methodologies  But first and foremost  we care about people and how we can constantly challenge each other to become better  To do better  Your background is less important to us than your ability to create results  to create change  We prize excellence and ingenuity but know that both have to be grounded in reality  The reality of making our clients ready for the future   Application Does this sound interesting to you  If you would like to know more or have any questions  please do not hesitate to reach out   We will be reviewing applications and conducting interviews on an on going basis  so please send us your application as soon as possible   Apply today  Experience At least a  technical  HBO education with a WO thinking and working level Real team player with excellent communication   analytical skills Fluent in Dutch Keywords A good sense of humour Sincerely honest Intellectually curious Proactive Location The NetherlandsValcon appeals to me because we have short lines  I do not experience any hierarchy  We all have one clear goal  we want the best for the customer  Annelies de Vries  Manager

Vacature   Junior  Data AnalistOver SynaxionSynaxion is een ICT organisatie en heeft sinds het begin van dit millennium een sterke focus op organisaties met een maatschappelijke functie  In deze  semi Publieke sector biedt Synaxion aan Gemeenten  Onderwijsinstellingen en Bibliotheken haar markt specifieke Business Intelligence software oplossingen en dienstverlening Data Quality  Data Ontsluiting  Data Analytics  Data Visualisatie  Data Science zijn de kern van onze propositie  met als basis het Synaxion Datawarehouse Inmiddels werken honderden organisaties met het Synaxion Datawarehouse en met onze dienstverlening voor Microsoft Power BI voor visueel aantrekkelijke en overzichtelijke dashboards voor rapportage en analyse  Help jij onze klanten met het ontsluiten  het modelleren en het visualiseren van data Synaxion maakt sinds juli 2021 deel uit van de Visma familie  Door samen de  semi publieke markt te benaderen  kunnen we onze ambities nog beter waarmaken  Onze ambitie is om de werelden van eGovernment en Business Intelligence   Data Science nog meer bij elkaar te brengenFunctieomschrijvingEen Data Analist bij Synaxion zet zijn haar kennis en ervaring in en levert een belangrijke bijdrage aan het optimaliseren en verbeteren van  werk processen van onze klanten Als Data Analist ga je aan de slag met het analyseren van HR  financiële en onderwijs gegevens  Je hebt een kritische blik en richt je op zowel beschrijvende  verklarende en voorspellende analyses  Door middel van gesprekken met de klant breng je de informatiebehoefte in kaart en stel je de requirements op  Vervolgens ga je aan de slag met het bouwen van rapportages in Power BI  Als Data Analist denk je proactief naar oplossingen  passend bij de situatie van de klant  Je neemt de klanten mee in het traject met visueel aantrekkelijke analyses die het verschil maken Het verschil maken doen we door data uit interne en externe databronnen te combineren  Op basis van deze data ga je als Data Analist aan de slag met voorspellingen en zet signaleringen en adviezen uit zodat we onze klanten in het onderwijs nog beter kunnen helpen Wat vragen wij Een afgeronde relevante HBO WO opleiding  bijvoorbeeld Informatie Management  Econometrie of Data Science  Ervaring met Business Intelligence tools  bij voorkeur Power BI  Kennis van en of ervaring met relationele datamodellen  bij voorkeur MS SQL  Je hebt aantoonbare kennis van het Microsoft 365 platform  het is een pré als je beschikt over relevante certificeringen  Een kritische blik en in staat zijn procesmatig te denken Gerichte vragen te kunnen stellen aan de klant en zo een goed beeld te krijgen van de informatie waar de klant op wil sturen Je beschikt over een uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlandse Taal  woord en geschrift  Wat bieden wij Een marktconform salaris Vakantiedagen en pensioenregeling Leuke collega sBudget voor trainingen   cursussen Goede balans tussen thuiswerken en op kantoor in Eindhoven Werken voor leuke klanten met interessante processen Regelmatig gezellige etentjes SolliciteerBen je geïnteresseerd  Mooi  We komen graag met jou in contact  Reacties graag met CV voorzien van motivatie Soort dienstverband  Voltijds  Deeltijds  Vaste baanParttime uren  40 per weekSalaris   2 750 00    4 500 00 per maandAanvullende vergoedingen VakantiegeldArbeidsvoorwaarden Budget voor professionele ontwikkelingKerstpakketPensioenReiskostenvergoedingTelefoonplanVrijdagmiddagborrelWerk vanuit huisWerkschema ma vrVerwachte startdatum  01 05 2022

What do you do as a Data Analyst   As a Data Analyst you will play a big part in our Vion Business Analytics Competence Center  VBACC   Vion aims to become a data driven organization  The further development of a Vion wide Azure data platform is a key step in doing so  You will act as the bridge between the business stakeholders and the development team  Data engineers  Data modelers  Front end specialists  You will work in an Agile environment where you discuss requirements with business stakeholders  translate them into solution designs  plan the deliverables  and work as part of the development team towards a successful result  You will perform exploratory data analysis  identify and perform data quality checks  and are able to communicate findings clearly to the relevant stakeholders in the organization  Top 100 food company Every day 100 million consumers worldwide eat a meal with a little bit of Vion  This quantity comes with a big responsibility  At Vion we work passionately every day on the global food challenge  feeding 9 billion people in 2050  How can you contribute to this  The main responsibilities of the role can be described as follows  create the bridge between the business stakeholders and the development team  you gather requirements in the business for dashboards   reports and translate them into appropriate solution designs  you provide technical support to developers in the business and plan the deliverables  you will standardize  optimize and safeguard the Vion processes and dashboard functionalities like designs  scripting  presentation choices  test findings  availability and authorizations in collaboration with the other BI team members  the BI Product Owners  the MDM team and the department IM T  you will contribute to and guide the reporting questions and projects based on your BI knowledge and business affinity  you give solicited and unsolicited advice to the BI Product Owners and Management in the field of BI process improvements and data quality  you perform exploratory data analysis  you will identify and perform data validation and communicate the findings to the relevant stakeholders to improve business processes  What do we expect from you  you have a Master s degree in IT or technical subject  you have a minimum 3 years of experience with business analysis and data analysis  you have experience with the Agile and Scrum way of working and with Data warehousing and Business intelligence projects  knowledge of SQL  Python  Microsoft Azure  data visualization tools  strong communication skills both verbal and written and fluent in Dutch and English  strong analytical skills  you are able to structure and solve both conceptual and concrete problems  pro active  pragmatic  customer oriented  hands on mentality with regards to data  team player with good social skills  What can you expect from us  In our company you will have an attractive  versatile and permanent position  with proven suitability  within a leading international food company  with around 12 400 employees worldwide  innovative market concepts and clear core values  You will be able to influence and shape Vion s digital transition  We offer excellent working conditions and an inspiring environment to work in and an enthusiastic team  Are you interested   In case you think you are the right candidate to become our new colleague  or would you like to have more information about this position  Share your talents with us by sending your application letter and resume via the apply button below  For information ask Maartje Faassen via phone number  31 88 995 3555 For this position Vion is looking for direct contacts with potential candidates  we appreciate if companies do not offer their services in this

Description About Cleeng Cleeng is the Subscriber Retention Management  SRM  Company  We help our clients create a long life relationship with their subscribers by providing the best operational tools as well as predictive analytics  Our solutions are used by market leading brands like Sinclair Broadcast Group  CBC  Broadway HD  BigTenNetwork  McFit  and many others  Cleeng s fully SaaS solution is built for scalability  flexibility  robustness and innovation  Working at Cleeng is rewarding  fun  and challenging  We thrive on innovation  If you want to join a fast growing business and make a real contribution  come join our team and help shape the future of video consumption  Your Mission Your mission is to architect and manage Cleeng infrastructure  supporting the strong growth of our transactional and analytical products  Our 10 year old platform is highly scalable  able to process millions of transactions per hour and analyze TBs of data  and proven throughout our 11 year history  working for top tier PPV events as well as large subscription platforms  We are fast growing  subscriber and data processing doubles every year   and need someone who can lead the team and the infrastructure to the next level  Position Overview As a VP of Infrastructure and Data  you will lead and run a team of DevOps  DataOps and Data Analysts  We see your role as crucial for our future growth  Partnering with other development teams  you will maintain the technical architecture  build a technical strategy and then execute it  Your objective will be to make our platform more scalable  flexible and automated  Working very closely with the CTO and other company leaders  the function can further grow into a more strategic function of the organization  Responsibilities Define technical vision  strategy  and guiding principles for Cleeng transactional infrastructure and data platform  Lead the Infrastructure   Data team  currently 5 FTE  and continue to build and cultivate a world class solution and team  Partner with BI  Backend and Frontend teams  to align the infrastructure requirements  as well as provide leadership and governance  Be an effective spokesperson and champion for the Infrastructure   Data development team and Cleeng main stakeholders  internal or external   Work in a high pace environment and be able to act independently  Must Have Requirements 5  to 10 years experience in a similar position in a large tech organization Proven successful experience in leading and managing infrastructure teams working on AWS platform  Good understanding of how complex  modern infrastructures are built and managed   combining distributed serverless platforms with modular monolithic architecture  Infrastructure As Code  etc  Good knowledge of data platforms   deep understanding of concepts like Data Warehouse  Master Data Management  Star Schema  Machine Learning  Strong interpersonal  relationship and management skills with excellent written and verbal communication skills  Track record of innovative solutioning  problem solving and providing guidance to junior employees  We offer Good salary package  one that fits your needs  Flexible working hours and form of employment  Possibility to work 100  remotely  100   paid sick leave with the agreed limits  A great  full of energy and brand new space  Cleeng office  in the very middle of Poznan  Equipment of your choice and additional accessories for your computer to make your work more efficient and comfortable  Perks  private healthcare  sport s card  Multisport   bicycle parking  and partially refunded costs of car parking  Co financed training and conferences  Work with an international team of well rounded experts in Amsterdam  HQ   Poznan  Manilla  NYC  16 nationalities and counting  Work on unique  market leading  SaaS products  with clients all over the world  from New Zealand  Japan  Europe  US  and Latam  Work closely with people who value diversity  hard work  friendly relationships and love their jobs  and get all together to the next level  Languages English Education Master Experience 4  years

Job Title Data Designer Job Description In this role  you have the opportunity to Unleash the power of design  data and AI to deliver value to people when it matters most  caring for their health  Work in a highly talented team  shape the data and AI design capability  work on exciting challenges in healthcare domain  You will bring the Data Design competence to the next level by leveraging data as design material in the creative process and impact people s health through meaningful data and AI enabled propositions  With your hands on design and programming skills  you bring in a new view on and build exciting new propositions for our users and customers through visualizing and synthesizing on data  We are looking for a Data Design expert that can run projects in the team with high level of independence  This role can be for a computer or data scientist with clear experience in a creative  design environment  able to provide portfolio proving affinity with the design field  On the other hand  this role can be for a UX designer with clear affinity with data  who is able to work hands on with data and program oneself  You are responsible for Building differentiating propositions encompassing data and AI that are relevant to our end users in the healthcare domain Gather  structure  visualize to translate data into insights Support other designers in embedding data and AI into their design practice Bridge the design capabilities with data science AI capabilities Building a toolset and repeatable way of working for data enabled design You are a part of The Data Enabled Design team  a group of data designers with expertise on data visualization  user experience research and prototyping with around data and AI  The Data Enabled Design team is part of global 400  design community and working on both business and research driven projects  To succeed in this role  you should have the following skills and experience University degree  WO HBO  in Design or Computer Science  or related  Hands on programming skills  e g  React  NodeJS  D3  Experience in creating strong design concepts Knowledge and experience in the field of Artificial Intelligence is a pre Independently act in both innovation projects as business projects English verbal and writing In return  we offer you A path towards your most rewarding career  Succeeding in this role in a complex environment will open many doors for your long term career  in other areas in Philips or otherwise  We also believe that we are at our best as a company when you are at yours as a person  Thus  we offer competitive health benefits  a flexible work schedule and access to local well being focused activities  Why should you join Philips  Working at Philips is more than a job  It s a calling to create a healthier society through meaningful work  focused on improving 2 5 billion lives a year by delivering innovative solutions across the health continuum  Our people experience a variety of unexpected moments when their lives and careers come together in meaningful ways  Learn more by watching this video  To find out more about what it s like working for Philips at a personal level  visit the Working at Philips page on our career website  where you can read stories from our employee blog  Once there you can also learn about our recruitment process  or find answers to some of the frequently asked questions   LI EU

Working in Data Is data your specialism  Are you interested in joining on of our data chapters  either as a data engineer  a BI specialist or a data scientist  Great  Here you can let us know you are interested  whether you re a seasoned expert or on your first few hands on experiences  Apply below and we will contact you to explore what opportunities there are  Data Opportunities at Randstad Groep Nederland Do you prefer jumping straight into algorithms  Or perhaps a data lake after all  What about a global data ocean  We have opportunities for data engineers  BI specialists and data scientists  This is what you can expect in each role  Data Engineer  You are responsible for the central nervous system of our labels randstad  tempo team and Yacht  By continuously improving and expanding our AWS based self service datahub and connecting the right data sources  you make sure we have the infrastructure to make all our data dreams a reality  Our datahub team works fully cloud based and is continuously pushing the envelope when it comes to innovating   which is why we are moving from data lake  to data ocean  Business Intelligence Specialist  Whether you prefer the backend and feel right at home in the Data Warehouse  or frontend  dashboards and reporting are your happy place  both are represented within our Operational Insights team  You build on the work done by the datahub data engineers and focus on our Redshift based Data Warehouse and ETL processes  or help us migrate to a tableau based frontend  providing 15 000 reports to all parts of our business  In both cases you work closely with both the business and our other data teams  to maximize the value from our data  Data Scientist  Machine Learning more your thing  Our data scientists work on things like recommender systems and natural language processing  building AI supported smartmatching solutions to support our recruiters and consultants  In a balance between research and business they are also responsible for applying AI breakthroughs into potential new business use cases  Who are you  You know exactly what the value of data is in today s organizations  and you know exactly how to get the right information to the right place  whether that be through pipelines  ETL processes  dashboards or algorithms  Apart from that you have  The ability to think critically and at degree level  the degree itself is secondary for us Demonstrated experience within either  AWS  Python  ECS and data engineering for our data engineers AWS  Redshift  Python and ETL processes for our backend BI specialists Tableau and coud based DWH experience for our frontend BI specialists Machine learning and Python for our data scientists a proactive and agile approach  with the drive and curiosity to continously improve and learn very good knowledge of the English languageThis is what we offer Apart from the most international teams within RGN IT  full of driven and passionate specialists  we also offer  a competitive salary  dependant on your role and experience a broad offering of training opportunities the opportunity to work partially remotely  with regular team days in the office regular research days that give you the opportunity to try out some of your wilder ideas a thorough onboarding with a dedicated buddyeen ruim opleidingsaanbod  bonus system and a share purchase plan a  750 budget to set up your home office a generous mobility scheme 25 days holiday  with the opportunity to purchase an extra 26  a personal benefit budget of 12 347  on top of your salary  incl  the 8 5  holiday bonus Interested  Are you interested in joining one of our data chapters at Randstad IT  We gladly explore the opportunities with you  Through the speculative application you can let us know you are interested and we will contact you  Or you can reach out directly to our talent acquisition specialist Franziska Mattler on 0683088632   franziska mattler randstadgroep nl  Please note that we cannot guarantee that we currently have opportunities available to match your experience  We are most likely to have immediate opportunities for candidates with several years ETL  Data Engineering  AWS or BI and Tableau experience  but will gladly connect with more junior candidates  data scientists and others to keep you informed about any planned additions to the teams

job_desc: To give people the power to build community on our platforms  we need to make sure they have the best and most secure experiences possible  People in Central Analytics empower Facebook s Global Operations organization to be self sufficient in tactical decision making and drive operations strategy through analytics  data infra  and reporting  Our key partners are embedded data teams  core functions on the business side  and Data Engineering Data Science on the product side  We are responsible for providing accurate  reliable and accessible business metrics as well as contextualizing them in operational performance with research and advanced analysis  We are looking for a Data Developer who shares our passion for helping make Facebook a safe place for people and businesses to connect across the world  The right candidate will be comfortable in a fast moving organization  excited to collaborate and focused on positively impacting the experience of a large scale global workforce and the entire Facebook Community  They possess strong data management and manipulation skills  data visualization skills  and the ability to build strong partnerships to drive impact across the organization Data Developer Responsibilities  Build maintain data infrastructure  data pipelines  aggregated data sets  reports  dashboards  to monitor the performance of our operations and drive business understanding Partner with Operations  Data Science  Data Engineering  Product and Engineering teams to solve problems and identify trends and opportunities Apply quantitative skills to and incorporate qualitative insights to inform and influence strategy for Global Operations Build best practices to support the growing data development function within the team and mentor junior colleagues on application of data development gold standardsMinimum Qualifications  B A  or B S  degree with a quantitative focus in Economics  Computer Science  Information Systems  Math  Statistics  Operations Research  or equivalent training 4  years of experience extracting and manipulating data to drive projects Proficiency in querying and manipulating complex raw datasets for analysis using SQL and at least one scripting language  PHP  Python  Perl  etc   Experience with data visualization tools  e g   Tableau  Looker  Professional experience with reporting systems  data pipeline architecture and data modeling Experience explaining technical concepts and analysis implications clearly to varied audiences and experience translating business objectives into actionable analysesPreferred Qualifications  Advanced degree with a quantitative focus  Economics  Computer Science  Operations Research  Math  Statistics  Experience thinking strategically  structurally solving product problems  and driving execution Experience with distributed computing  Hive Hadoop  Experience developing data pipelines via SQL and Python based ETL framework Experience releasing code into production
