About us  Beat is one of the most exciting companies to ever come out of the ride hailing space  One city at a time  all across the globe we make transportation affordable  convenient  and safe for everyone  We also help hundreds of thousands of people earn extra income as drivers   Today we are the fastest growing ride hailing service in Latin America  But serving millions of rides every day pales in comparison to what lies ahead  Our plans for expansion are limitless  Our stellar engineering team operates across a number of European capitals where  right now  some of the world s most ambitious and talented engineers are changing how cities will move in the future   Beat is currently available in Greece  Peru  Chile  Colombia  Mexico and Argentina   About the role  We re accepting these challenges by applying data  algorithms and machine learning to problems in logistics  routes  personalization  search  pricing  experimentation and more  Our Data team is at the heart of this effort and is an essential ingredient in Beat s aggressive growth plan and vision for the future   As a Data Analyst in Pricing  you will take on some of our biggest marketplace challenges such as optimising dynamic pricing models  discovering opportunities for new product features  understanding price elasticity  or evaluating the impact of product changes on our passengers and drivers  Your work will impact the entire marketplace  so you ll have the opportunity to make an immediate difference  Your day to day will involve close collaboration with stakeholders across product  operations  machine learning  data engineering  and technology   What you ll do day in day out  Contribute to solving challenging two sided marketplace problems using data solutions  Understand user behavior with regards to pricing and help shape our pricing strategy  Own end to end data analysis including business interpretations and formulation of next steps  Design and implement frameworks to measure price elasticity of passengers at scale  Evaluate price changes in a controlled manner  either via offline or online experiments  Work together with the product and analytics teams to identify and deliver high impact product improvements and optimizations  Keep yourself updated with advances in the fields related to ride hailing and micro mobility  Work closely with other data members of the team  build a strong data driven culture in the domain and ensure that we have the right knowledge and tools to solve problems  What you need to have  Educational background in quantitative discipline or equivalent experience  At least 3 years of hands on experience in analytics in a fast paced environment  Knowledge of SQL  Python R  and data visualisation tools such as Tableau  Exemplary communication skills  ability to work with cross functional teams  including technical and non technical team members  Strong commercial awareness  ability to clarify ambiguity and balance priorities  Interest in experimentation  designing experiments  and using causal inference methods to draw conclusions  Deep belief in data and ability to rally people behind your findings recommendations  Nice to have  Experience with pricing analytics  What s in it for you  Competitive full time salary Private Health Coverage on the Company s group program  Breakfast  high quality daily lunch on a very low cost  fruit and snacks all day long Flexible working hours  top Line tools  Spanish Lessons Working in a hyper growth environment  you will enjoy numerous learning and career development opportunities A great opportunity to grow and work with the most amazing people in the industry  Being part of an environment that offers challenging goals  autonomy and mentoring  which creates incredible opportunities  both for you and the company  As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce  Beat is committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race  color  national origin  ethnicity  gender  disability  sexual orientation  gender identity  or religion

Je draagt bij aan de groei van ons warmtenet Een dynamische rol waarin continu verbeteren centraal staat Veel ruimte voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling Waarom kiezen voor Eneco  Het echte werk daagt je uit  Om met jouw kennis en vaardigheden de energietransitie te helpen versnellen  Dat betekent elke dag complexe uitdagingen  creatief denken en in oplossingen denken  Bij Eneco streven we ernaar dat werk en privé samengaan én staat werkplezier voorop  Zodat je met een voldaan gevoel naar huis gaat en meer van je vrije tijd geniet  Dat is het echte werk  Wat ga je doen  Om ons warmtenet in topconditie te houden  is het essentieel om de gegevens over ons net goed vast te leggen  Deze Asset Data registreer je in onze systemen  zodat onze monteurs bijvoorbeeld precies weten welke leidingen ze moeten vervangen  Daarnaast maak je  in afstemming met onze Engineers  ontwerptekeningen voor ons warmtenet  zodat we dit netwerk kunnen uitbreiden  Daar blijft het niet bij  Jouw focus ligt ook op het verbeteren en verder digitaliseren van onze processen  Dit doe je niet alleen door deel te nemen aan verbetertrajecten  je neemt hierin ook de leiding  Waarom  Zodat we ons warmtenet in Nederland flink kunnen vergroten  Je komt hiermee te werken in het hart van de energietransitie en je zorgt ervoor dat onze klanten er thuis lekker warmpjes bij zitten  Je bent verantwoordelijk voor Het registreren van Asset Data van ons warmtenet in onze systemen  Het continu verbeteren van de datakwaliteit  Het continu verbeteren en verder digitaliseren van onze processen Het maken van ontwerptekeningen van bijvoorbeeld warmteleidingen of warmtestations  Het afstemmen met andere afdelingen over zowel lopende zaken als verbeteringen  Wat breng je mee  Je werkt samen als één team aan het waarmaken van één missie  Daarbij ben je proactief om te helpen de energietransitie te versnellen  Je creëert ruimte om inzichten en meningen met collega s uit te wisselen en neemt verantwoording om bij te dragen aan het gezamenlijke plan  Een  bij voorkeur technisch  HBO diploma en enkele jaren relevante werkervaring Je hebt aantoonbare ervaring in het verbeteren   digitaliseren van processen over de grenzen van het eigen team heen  Je kunt je nieuwe situaties en werkwijzen snel eigen maken  Waar ga je werken  Je komt te werken in continu veranderende omgeving in een groeiende sector  waar job_desc: Mendix is a low code app development platform  First  what is low code  Low code is a visual approach to software development that enables you to abstract and automate every step of the application lifecycle  Gartner predicts that  by 2024  low code application development will be responsible for more than 65  of application development activity   Mendix is repeatedly ranked a Leader in analyst reports from Gartner and Forrester  In the 2021 Gartner  Magic Quadrant for Multiexperience Development Platforms  Mendix placed at the very top of the Leaders quadrant   Mendix  the global leader in enterprise low code  was created to promote collaboration between Business   IT teams  Thousands of forward thinking companies around the world like Ford Auto  Rabobank Netherlands  Zurich Insurance  and Red Bull  can unleash their best ideas faster with the help of the Mendix Platform   Mendix is a Siemens Business   Siemens is a Top 10 Global Software Company and a leader on Fast Company s Most Innovative Companies in the World  With the acquisition of Mendix in 2018  Siemens Digital Industries Software is driving transformation to enhance the digital enterprise where engineering  manufacturing and electronics meet the future of innovation  Mendix employees have the opportunity to work in a hyper growth environment with the support of Siemens  unbeatable market position and resources  As an intern  you will work mainly on two assignments  1  The development of a data monitoring dashboard to help businesses stay in control of data quality issues  Below are the use cases expected to be initially covered on the monitoring platform   Consistency in prediction scores across the Mendix systems Relationship Integrity between salesforce contacts and accounts comparing against a set of rules  Data consistency  comparing against a corresponding dataset  Missing Incomplete data or records Data integrity issues  checking that data meets certain business rules   2  Assist in making detail technical data documentation of data from source to destination  This includes all data moving from the different source systems  in transit  and to the data lake   Marketing data flowing from source through Marketo and Salesforce to the data lake  Salesforce data moving to Zuora and to the data lake Zuora data moving to SAP and to the data lake Other duties    Preferred Ability to Speak write English fluently  Dutch speaking is preferable  Ability to work under indirect supervision Flexible in a fast paced dynamic environment with shifting roles and responsibilities Fast and eager to learn new concepts Ability to multi task   work well under pressure Strong computer technical skills Excellent verbal and writing communication skills Working for job_desc: Data analyst planning and forecasting As Data analyst planning and forecasting you help companies make better forecasting  planning and inventory management decisions  based on quantitative analysis and models  You are a creative mind with a passion for planning  both the technology and the reality of business  You are keen to translate data science outcomes into business impact   Your role as Data analyst planning and forecasting  In your work  you deal with the three pillars of applied analytics  data engineering  model development and storytelling  You keep a sharp analytical eye on both the business challenges and the hard data science   Your activities are a mix between shorter customer projects  4 6 weeks   internal developments  and longer  interim  activities  3 6 months  at selected customers  This provides unique opportunities to learn about and work with the latest data science insights around forecasting  inventory management  and other aspects of planning  as well as great experiences being immersed in the reality of business   At EyeOn you will work with the latest techniques  solutions and insights in the field of planning and forecasting  As believers in the future where data is the core and most decisions are made by machines  we are constantly developing ourselves and the techniques and methods we work with  We challenge you to do the same   Your primary work location will be at our customer locations and our office in Aarle Rixtel  where our forecasting   planning knowledge center is located  We also have offices in Amsterdam  Antwerp  Geneva  Zürich  Dublin  Düsseldorf  and New York City   Responsibilities Translating planning challenges into data science solutions  In interim projects  helping customers with their challenges in any way needed  creating ad hoc analyses  providing insightful dashboards  developing their in house data science knowledge  etc  Contribute to the innovative power of EyeOn by running applied analytics lab projects  Raising the expertise of EyeOn colleagues in the area of applied analytics  Preferred requirements A completed university education and master degree in operations research  data science  econometrics  mathematics or similar  Relevant experience in or affinity with supply chain planning and forecasting processes  You enjoy translating complex practical problems into mathematical models  Experience with programming  preferably in Python  Numpy  Pandas  Scipy  Scikit learn   Experience with processing and analyzing data  eg  SQL  Hadoop  Spark  Kubernetes  is a plus  Knowledge of  and experience with typical data science techniques  eg  time series  regression  classification  clustering  math programming  simulation  etc  EU working permit  Working location  Eindhoven  EyeOn Data Science  In EyeOn Data Science we re the best at helping our customers do better supply chain planning through data science  We make sure we stay the best by working together as a team  and by learning new things from each other and through our customer projects   We re a young team with a passion for data science  using tools such as Dataiku  Python  pandas  numpy   Spark  PowerBI  Tableau  Jira  Bitbucket  and more  We are creative minds with a fascination for data  We believe in the digital transformation and a data driven future  Why work for EyeOn  Join a global team with experienced experts who are passionate about supply chain planning and data science  Co create solutions with creativity and innovation to solve tough business challenges for some of the world s largest and most successful companies  Work in a culture that blends the best entrepreneurial spirit with a healthy work life balance  Experience the freedom of deciding how you schedule your agenda  work and location in teams that operate with trust and autonomy  Create your own personal development program with the counsel of our experienced experts and support from EyeOn  Receive excellent employee benefits and perks  including bonus potential  Answers to your questions  Inge Loog is available to answer any questions you may have about this role  Contact Inge at inge loog eyeon nl  An individual assessment is part of our selection procedure

Do you have excellent attention to detail and accuracy  Do you like working in a team that makes a difference  Are you open for a new challenge or have you been out of a job for a while and would like to make a come back   Join the Managed Services team within Iperion   a Deloitte business and start a wonderful career in an international environment in the dynamic world of life sciences and IT  Job description 24 40 hrs  As a Data Process Expert  it is your job to update and maintain information in computer systems used by pharmaceutical companies  You will perform data entry activities  compare and verify data and be responsible for the predefined and correct interpretation of this information  It is an important role  as information in these systems must be correct and consistently maintained for internal and external purposes  You will perform data processing activities  compare and verify data and be responsible for the predefined and correct interpretation of this information   Personal blog  Three of our current Data Process Experts have shared their experiences in their personal blogs  Read how Aji Fatou Badjan and Vera Ogbeine look back at their 1 year anniversary and get to know the experiences of Natasja Troost Riksen and how being a Data Process Expert is anything but boring  What you offer Your personal skills  You do not need to be experienced  but you do need to be motivated  a team player  and you have an eye for detail  It is of utmost importance that you understand the relevance of the work you are performing and that the customer is your central point of focus  Accuracy and reliability come natural to you   Your technical skills  You can work and think at bachelor level and have good oral and written communication skills in English  Specific technical knowledge is not required  You have attention to detail  are able to follow processes and work in a structured way  But you are also a fast learner  show flexibility and are able to work under strict timelines  WHAT IPERION   a Deloitte business OFFERS  You share your expertise with about 60 other colleagues in Iperion s Managed Services department within the Life Science And Healthcare team that is part of Deloitte  We help pharmaceutical companies  regulators and med techs in establishing and maintaining data quality and offer data services for regulatory information management  labeling and change control   We offer you a unique challenge to grow in an innovative organization  You will work in a casual  stimulating working environment with like minded colleagues  This job is office based in Vlijmen  when that is allowed again  and we are able to offer you flexible part time working hours   CONTACT  Are you eager to find out more about this job opportunity  Feel free to contact our HR officer Tamara van Lieverlooy via   31  6 55 55 16 24 or humanresources iperion com   We would appreciate employment agencies not to respond to this vacancy

Full time   Amsterdam Hi  we are Mollie        Our mission is creating a greater playing field for everyone  By offering convenient  safe and worldwide payment solutions we remove barriers for companies of all sizes to compete on equal terms  Your opportunity  As Mollie s VP of Data you are responsible for evolving our data platform  tools  and mindset  This is an exceptional leadership opportunity where you will lead in defining our vision and strategy for data  covering topics like the technologies that power our data lakes  analytics  machine learning  while curating the quality and governance of our data  The role reports directly to Mollie s CTO and plays a key part in shaping Mollie s technology strategy and roadmap   You manage and grow the teams that build and improve our data platform  that in turn powers the business  This platform enables the different departments and product engineering teams throughout the business to unleash the power of data for decision making  by building capabilities such as AB testing   and create opportunities to use data to build products  Our usual customers are small and medium sized businesses  and we see a lot of opportunity to improve our product and processes through the use of data   In addition to managing the teams that build the data platform  you work with people across the business to educate  explore opportunities to use data in a way that advances Mollie s ambitions   What you ll be doing Own the topic of data at Mollie by clearly defining what success looks like  set ambitious goals and make sure you drive progress against those   Setting the long term vision and strategy for Mollie s data domain  You ll be the driving force behind the development and success of this key area  Bring our data platform to the next level  enabling easy access to machine learning for product teams  and better tools for the business  Inspire and lead a team of data scientists  data engineers and analysts  create processes and structures that drive career progression and collaboration  Scale and grow your teams with an eye on diverse skills that cover machine learning  analytics and engineering  and other skills needed to achieve the objectives  Foster and maintain Mollie s inclusive culture that is both collaborative and passionate  where creativity and engagement are highly valued  You are a trusted advisor and thought leader to the executive leadership team  Ensure each organisation gets the analytical support they need and contribute to the company strategy through high level insights and communications  You will own the development  engagement and performance of our data visualisation stack  Right now we are using Looker but we are always looking for ways to improve  Meet the data team Isabelle  Head of Data Edward Lead Analyst Ana  Data Scientist Engineer Willem  Data Science Lead

We re Creative Fabrica  a fast scaling tech start up from Amsterdam   Our mission is to change the way people consume digital assets   About the platform  We launched in 2016 as a marketplace for fonts with a subscription service  In the last 6 years we have been through tremendous growth  and we re just getting started   We have scaled to 30 million  monthly page views  viewing over 4 million listed products from 10000  active designers   Our focus is to create a platform for designers that enables them to offer exceptional high quality content  We make their products searchable in unique ways  This allows our customers to speed up their workflow  allowing them to focus on what they love most  Creating   How will you help us   The Head of Data Science   Analytics is the driving force behind the company s data quality  data analytics  data science and experimentation strategy and execution  In this role you will be responsible for attracting and retaining high caliber data analysts and data scientists focused on innovation and rapid iteration  You will report to the VP of Product   You and your team will be owning the data systems for collecting  storing and analyzing data  We are entering a phase of exponential growth and need to scale the tools  data lakes and pipelines to enable data driven product development and decision making at Creative Fabrica   You  along with your team  will dig into the data to uncover insights  identify opportunities for product improvements and new product development  define product metrics with goals  enable experiments and drive customer experience  engagement  and adoption of Creative Fabrica products  As you are building your team we also need you to be hands on and deliver on data needs   Responsibilities  Foster data driven culture of innovation  iteration  and ownership throughout all of Creative Fabrica Recruit  manage and lead a team of world class data analysts and data scientists to support our aggressive growth and deliver key data products and capabilities Be the subject matter expert for driving the product instrumentation  including web tracking tools like Google Analytics and Amplitude  and product data strategy Drive data consistency and quality within a common framework and taxonomy to drive continued improvements to data driven insights across the business Own both the long term technical data strategy and the day to day operations  including fostering innovation and implementing best practices Collaborate with cross functional teams to research  build   improve data analyses to identify opportunities for product improvements  new product features  product utilization and improve customer experience  engagement  and retention Lead the creation of new data driven approaches for the purpose of generating business insights through data analytics  information visualization  and addressing unanswered business issues in a proactive manner Leverage the momentum of the business to create career defining growth opportunities for your team Facilitate Creative Fabrica s development ensuring that data enables continued growth  including marketplace dynamics technologies Design data governance and security protocols Represent the data analytics and data science disciplines throughout the organization  You will have a powerful voice in the company and represent data analytics across different parts of the business  Attract and retain a diverse  high caliber  output oriented team Profile   Essential  Bachelor s degree  or higher  in Data Science  Mathematics  Computer Science  Physics or equivalent  8  years of experience leading and building out a Data Analytics   Data Science team Strong background on Data Engineering and Web tracking tooling  Experience building powerful yet easy to use and adopt data systems and tools supporting high volume and reliable interactive modeling  analysis  and experimentation Proven track record of strong stakeholder management  interacting with senior company leadership on complex issues  Required  Good verbal and written English communication skills Ability to lead and coach while creating a high performance culture  Let us take care of you  Competitive Compensation  We believe that hard work  skills and ambition should be fairly compensated  Flexibility  30 remote days per year  Need a change of scene  Take your laptop  pack a bag and work from the woods  your parents  place or the beach  The best tools and stylish kit  Laptop  Check  Collaboration tools  Check  Killer accessories  Check  Awesome Office  Based in a beautiful office in the centre  working here means delicious lunches in the garden  Friday beers at our local  and access to our own CF library  TGIF  Work Life balance is important   we work hard together  and we have fun together  On Fridays we turn on the speakers  and start celebrating the weekend  Is this you   Get in touch  We d love to speak to you   You can apply by clicking the  Apply now  button   Creative Fabrica is an equal opportunity employer  We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees

In Nederland doneren honderdduizenden mensen bloed bij Sanquin  de Nederlandse bloedbank en hét instituut voor kennis en innovatie op gebied van bloed  Die donaties worden getest en verwerkt  en vinden uiteindelijk hun weg naar patiënten wereldwijd  In die keten speelt Data service management een cruciale rol  Het Data services team verzorgt samen met zijn haar collega s de management informatie  die nodig is om data gedreven werken te faciliteren en onderbouwde besluitvorming mogelijk te maken  Zo zorgen jij en Sanquin ervoor dat patiënten 24 7 kunnen rekenen op veilig bloed   Hoe ziet je dag eruit   Als Data specialist bij Sanquin werkt je mee aan het onderhouden en uitbreiden van het Sanquin datawarehouse  Hierin staan de gegevens van de belangrijkste applicaties  die bij Sanquin gebruikt en is de basis voor een grote hoeveelheid BI overzichten  rapporten en dashboards m b t  de bedrijfsprocessen   De ene dag ben je bezig met het aanpassen van het datawarehouse  een andere dag ben je in gesprek met de business voor een nieuw BI overzicht  Ook neem je deel aan nieuwe projecten voor het ontsluiten van data uit nieuwe bronnen  Het beheer van toegang en autorisaties voor de gebruikers van Business Objects maakt deel uit van je werkzaamheden  Je zorgt er ook voor dat via schedules automatisch de ETL jobs voor het updaten van de diverse datastromen uitgevoerd worden  Waar lever jij meerwaarde  Onderhouden  uitbreiden  optimaliseren en documenteren van het bestaande Business Intelligence platform op basis van SAP Business Objects  Uitbreiding van het datawarehouse door het verder ontsluiten van de bedrijfsapplicaties en andere nieuwe bronsystemen  Ontwikkeling van Universes en Web Intelligence overzichten d m v  Business Objects tools  Het ondersteunen in het gebruik en het verder opzetten en uitbouwen van de diverse rapportages en overige relevante stuurinformatie voor het management  in het bijzonder die van de Bloedbank divisie  Het optimaliseren van business intelligence processen en de inrichting van Business Objects om het gebruik  de effectiviteit en de efficiëntie daarvan verder te verbeteren  Sparringpartner voor MT bij gebruik van BI en ontwikkeling van nieuwe toepassingen daarvan  Whats in it for you   Je wordt een nog steviger en veelzijdiger Data Specialist  De veelheid aan activiteiten in de complexe organisatie van Sanquin maken Business Intelligence uitdagend  In beginsel is jouw aandachtsgebied de Bloedbank organisatie  maar in de toekomst word je voor ingezet voor alle bedrijfsonderdelen  Er spelen grote veranderprogramma s waar jij vanuit het team Business Intelligence ook een bijdrage aan levert en een adviesrol in hebt  Je komt dus niet in een gespreid bedje terecht en krijgt volop kans om te helpen bouwen en inrichten   Marktconform salaris  eindejaarsuitkering  13e maand bij volledig kalenderjaar  Een ruim aanbod van goede secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden zoals 27 verlofdagen  o b v  fulltime dienstverband   reiskostenvergoeding  een eigen ontwikkelbudget  uitgebreid opleidingspakket en een pensioenregeling bij Pensioenfonds Zorg   Welzijn  Met verve vervul jij jouw rol als mensen hun bankzaken regelen verandert razendsnel  Veel klanten van ING regelen hun bankzaken via internet of via de mobiele App  Dat heeft ook gevolgen voor de dienstverlening  ING heeft de interne organisatie  Functiebeschrijving Bij Retail Contact Center worden alle klantcontacten door Customer Loyalty Teams  CLT s  behandeld  We zijn 24 7 voor onze klanten aanspreekbaar  Op jaarbasis zijn er rond 4 miljoen telefonische en chat klantcontacten  waarbij het voor ons een gegeven is dat de manier waarop onze klanten contact met ons willen hebben de komende jaren ingrijpend zal veranderen  Het RCC kent 2 zogeheten Supercircles waarbinnen vergelijkbare klantactiviteiten zijn gebundeld  Daarnaast wordt er nauw samengewerkt met 2 externe partners die een groot deel van de telefonische contacten afhandelen  Het is cruciaal dat er binnen het RCC gestuurd wordt op bereikbaar zijn voor onze klanten in combinatie met een efficiënte en verkoopgerichte bedrijfsvoering  zowel telefonisch intakes van campagnes en andere informatiebronnen binnen ING  Naast Workforce management heeft de afdeling op basis van beschikbare kennis en kunde een adviserende  innoverende en kader stellende taak As a Data Scientist  you are able to understand specific questions from our customers and answer them with data driven analyses  In this role  you are responsible for gathering the right information  formulating working hypotheses and testing these in order to solve problems step by step  In addition  you are able to communicate the analysical steps  outcomes and impact in a clear way to both team members and  external  stakeholders  Similarly  you will be responsible for implementing and possibly automating these steps and their integration into our clients  data systems   Responsibilities Understanding and solving challenging business issues using data in a variety of customer segments  Implementing and integrating solutions and applications in various system landscapes  Maintaining contacts with stakeholders and informing them adequately and transparently about outcomes  progress or setbacks  Training and coaching business consultants and junior team members  Building and maintaining a relevant network at existing and new customers  Valcon core values Can do Together Curiosity Integrity Joy We offer An energetic  ambitious and international environment with a great working atmosphere  An environment with significant autonomy and responsibility  A steep learning curve and structured coaching from your own mentor  A thriving community  active in both business and social events  Market relevant employment package  salary  benefits fund  bonus  lease car or mobility allowance and laptop   Apply today  Experience A completed technical university degree or PhD  Minimum of 2 years work experience as a Data Scientist  or as a Business Consultant with experience in data related issues Strong team player with good communication skills  Curious and self critical with strong analytical skills  Experience with analysis and programming of business issues and solutions  in e g  Python  R  C C    SQL   You are fluent in Dutch and English Location The Netherlands

scientist  Je werkt naast je master gemiddeld 20 uur per week  waarbij je 3 verschillende projecten van elk 8 maanden doet bij verschillende Pon bedrijven  Het laatste project is parallel met het afstuderen  wat optioneel ook bij Pon kan  Aangezien elk project bij een ander Pon bedrijf zal zijn  krijg je een grote diversiteit aan opdrachten  uitdagingen en innovatieve projecten  Het doel van de projecten is om de bedrijven  maar ook jezelf  meer data gedreven te maken en daarmee een effectief verschil te maken binnen Pon  Zo kan je bijvoorbeeld net als Tim bij Bike Mobility Service een opdracht doen  De eerste acht maanden werk ik voor Bike Mobility Services  BMS  aan verschillende projecten voor de bedrijven die onder BMS vallen  Voor Lease a Bike heb ik onderzoek gedaan naar de klantenconversie  vroegtijdig beëindigde leasecontracten en de fietsreparaties  En voor BusinessBike volgt er nog een klantsegmentatie en een sales funnel conversie analyse   Het leukste binnen het Data Science Traineeship is dat je met jouw expertise iets nieuws te bieden hebt voor een Pon bedrijf  Doordat de bedrijven vaak nog niet optimaal gebruikmaken van de beschikbare data krijg ik de kans mee te denken aan langdurige oplossingen die veel waarde kunnen toevoegen  Dat je het vertrouwen en de kans krijgt om plannen te maken en uit te voeren zorgt voor een leuke en leerzame ervaring   Wil je een nog betere indruk van hoe het is om te werken bij het Pon  Kijk dan ook de onderstaande video  https   www youtube com watch v rnZOFE2nRh0 ab channel KevinHaver Wat vragen we van jou  In het Data Science Traineeship krijg je de mogelijkheid om je eigen toekomst vorm te geven  Dit vraagt om assertiviteit  zelfstandigheid  creativiteit en ondernemerschap  Daarnaast beschik je over de volgende eigenschappen  Je hebt een WO bachelordiploma met wiskundige achtergrond  zoals Business Analytics  Econometrie  Artificial Intelligence  Data Science of een andere bèta opleiding  Je hebt de ruimte om naast je master gemiddeld 20 uur per week te werken  Hierin zijn we flexibel als er een periode is wanneer je bijvoorbeeld 40 uur op je studie aanwezig moet zijn  Je bent enthousiast  sociaal en weet van aanpakken  Je bent analytisch en je houdt ervan om complexe problemen op te lossen  Je bent in staat om inzichten duidelijk te communiceren en presenteren  Je hebt ervaring met Python Java R of vergelijkbare programmeertalen  Je hebt ervaring met data science technieken zoals machine learning en NLP  Wat bieden wij  Tijdens je traineeship sta je er uiteraard niet alleen voor  Je begint het traineeship met een onboarding programma waarbij een data scientist van het Datalab je wegwijs maakt in de wereld van Pon  de manier van werken en de programma s die je gaat gebruiken  Na de onboarding blijf je door het Datalab begeleid worden  Je begeleider zal minimaal 4 uur per week beschikbaar zijn om je te coachen  feedback te geven en samen een ontwikkelplan te maken met persoonlijke doelstellingen  Daarnaast zul je ook technische begeleiding krijgen en kennissessies bijwonen waarin data scientists ervaringen en inzichten met elkaar delen  Op deze manier word je tijdens het hele traject gepast begeleid  en behoud je nog steeds de vrijheid om zelf het vakgebied te ontdekken Na je traineeship  Tijdens je laatste project zal je samen met ons kijken naar verschillende uitstroommogelijkheden binnen Pon  Aan het eind van het traineeship heb je genoeg kennis opgedaan om als volwaardige data scientist te starten bij een Pon bedrijf zoals Gazelle  Audi of Focus  Misschien kun je zelfs je eigen data science team gaan opzetten binnen één van deze bedrijven  of bij een Pon bedrijf in het buitenland gaan werken  Het sollicitatieproces bestaat uit 3 rondes  Je stuurt ons je CV en motivatiebrief  Je hebt een eerste kennismaking met twee  senior  data scientists  Je hebt een tweede gesprek waarin je ook een case presenteert  Contactinformatie  We hebben je al veel verteld over de functie van data scientist  Wil je graag meer inhoudelijke informatie  Dat kan  Neem contact op met Ellen Mik via ellen mik pon com  Graag werven en selecteren we onze nieuwe About us  Beat is one of the most exciting companies to ever come out of the ride hailing space  One city at a time  all across the globe we make transportation affordable  convenient  and safe for everyone  We also help hundreds of thousands of people earn extra income as drivers   Today we are the fastest growing ride hailing service in Latin America  But serving millions of rides every day pales in comparison to what lies ahead  Our plans for expansion are limitless  Our stellar engineering team operates across a number of European capitals where  right now  some of the world s most ambitious and talented engineers are changing how cities will move in the future   Beat is currently available in Greece  Peru  Chile  Colombia  Mexico and Argentina   About the role  We re accepting these challenges by applying data  algorithms and machine learning to problems in logistics  routes  personalization  search  pricing  experimentation and more  Our Data team is at the heart of this effort and is an essential ingredient in Beat s aggressive growth plan and vision for the future   As a Data Analyst in Pricing  you will take on some of our biggest marketplace challenges such as optimising dynamic pricing models  discovering opportunities for new product features  understanding price elasticity  or evaluating the impact of product changes on our passengers and drivers  Your work will impact the entire marketplace  so you ll have the opportunity to make an immediate difference  Your day to day will involve close collaboration with stakeholders across product  operations  machine learning  data engineering  and technology   What you ll do day in day out  Contribute to solving challenging two sided marketplace problems using data solutions  Understand user behavior with regards to pricing and help shape our pricing strategy  Own end to end data analysis including business interpretations and formulation of next steps  Design and implement frameworks to measure price elasticity of passengers at scale  Evaluate price changes in a controlled manner  either via offline or online experiments  Work together with the product and analytics teams to identify and deliver high impact product improvements and optimizations  Keep yourself updated with advances in the fields related to ride hailing and micro mobility  Work closely with other data members of the team  build a strong data driven culture in the domain and ensure that we have the right knowledge and tools to solve problems  What you need to have  Educational background in quantitative discipline or equivalent experience  At least 3 years of hands on experience in analytics in a fast paced environment  Knowledge of SQL  Python R  and data visualisation tools such as Tableau  Exemplary communication skills  ability to work with cross functional teams  including technical and non technical team members  Strong commercial awareness  ability to clarify ambiguity and balance priorities  Interest in experimentation  designing experiments  and using causal inference methods to draw conclusions  Deep belief in data and ability to rally people behind your findings recommendations  Nice to have  Experience with pricing analytics  What s in it for you  Competitive full time salary Private Health Coverage on the Company s group program  Breakfast  high quality daily lunch on a very low cost  fruit and snacks all day long Flexible working hours  top Line tools  Spanish Lessons Working in a hyper growth environment  you will enjoy numerous learning and career development opportunities A great opportunity to grow and work with the most amazing people in the industry  Being part of an environment that offers challenging goals  autonomy and mentoring  which creates incredible opportunities  both for you and the company  As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce  Beat is committed to Equal Employment Opportunity without regard for race  color  national origin  ethnicity  gender  disability  sexual orientation  gender identity  or religion

skills: marketing, excel, accounting, python, sql, r
job_desc: About Apeiron Insight Apeiron Insight is a data driven research   analytics company  providing insights   data products to investment companies for them to make better informed  investment  decisions  The amount of data is growing exponentially and it is becoming more difficult to distinguish signal from the noise  We deliver actionable intelligence by leveraging the power of predictive modelling   Machine Learning  Apeiron Insight is growing fast and we are hiring for a number of roles in multiple disciplines  Your role at Apeiron Insight We are looking for an Data Research Analyst to assist in leading a data driven research approach to covering companies the telecoms sectors  You will be responsible for generating and publishing investment research  The responsibilities for this role include using proprietary data sets to build financial and statistical models  perform data analysis  write reports  update marketing materials  and service client requests  The individual should be proficient with Excel  mathematical modeling  and have a basic understanding of financial statements and accounting  Experience with Python  SQL  or R is highly preferred  The individual should also be an effective written and verbal communicator  Additionally  the candidate must be self motivated  detail oriented  and a creative thinker who has interest   curiosity in the intersection of  alternative data   investment research  and financial markets  Responsibilities Development and deployment of predictive models for estimation and prediction of corporate performance across the telecommunation sector  Identify and execute creative ways to answer key industry questions using our proprietary data and insights  Gather and analyze data from a variety of internal and external resources  including  but not limited to  proprietary datasets  company documents and materials  SEC regulatory filings such as annual reports and 10Ks  industry publications  and online data services  Write  edit  and publish equity research reports incorporating insights derived from financial and statistical models  Vet new and unique data sets for relevancy to continually improve and broaden our scope and accuracy  Perform ad hoc analyses in response to client requests  Support the sales process by developing analyses for sales pitches and press releases  What are we looking for  Functional understanding of data analysis using Python  SQL or R is a must  Ability to identify and work with strategic data partners  Responsible for forecasting KPIs and identifying key business industry trends based on use of alternative data  Experience working with and analyzing large data sets and in developing actionable intelligence from the data  Self starter who works well in a fast paced environment  Team player  happy to work in closed proximity with the Data Engineering   the Management team  You are currently living in the Netherlands and are able to fluently communicate in English  verbally and in writing   Command of the Dutch language is a plus  Enjoy working in a cool   stylish office  overlooking the Hague  with excellent facilities  We also really appreciate  Strong mathematical and statistical background  An intuitive understanding of business problems  What to expect  We believe in commitment  your permanent contract will be waiting for you  Highly competitive salary tailored to your qualities   experience  Bonus scheme  8  holiday payment  25 vacation days based on a 40 hour working week  Personal education study budget  An informal working environment with innovative colleagues who strive for the very best  Based in Rijswijk  of course in  hybrid mode   working from home and office as best fits the nature of the work  If you think this position fits you well  we sincerely hope to hear from you  If so  please submit your resume and motivation letter

Wat wij bieden Een groep gepassioneerde vakgenoten met brede kennis en ervaring  De focus op het werken in teamverband bij gerenommeerde klanten  Een omgeving waarin ondernemerschap en eigen initiatief worden gestimuleerd  Een cultuur waar collegialiteit  kennisdeling en samenwerking centraal staan  Veel mogelijkheden voor opleiding  ontwikkeling en doorgroei  Een budget om arbeidsvoorwaarden aan te passen aan jouw wensen  Flexibiliteit en oog voor jou als persoon  Wat jij meeneemt minimaal een afgeronde HBO opleiding  ervaring met web technologie  specifiek Javascript en bijbehorende frameworks  ervaring met het werken aan informatiemodellen  kennis van SQL  kennis van RDF  OWL  SKOS  SHACL  RML  Turtle en SPARQL  De uitdaging Door de toenemende vlucht aan digitalisering hebben organisaties te maken met een exponentiele groei aan data  De betekenis van die data is in veel gevallen niet eenduidig vastgelegd  met grote gevolgen voor de efficiëntie van processen en betrouwbaarheid van informatie  Samen met collega s speel jij een belangrijke rol bij een van de grootste IT uitdagingen van zowel vandaag als morgen  het bij elkaar brengen en harmoniseren van de vele verschillende soorten data binnen die binnen een organisatie aanwezig zijn  Impact maken en waarde toevoegen voor de klant  dat is waar je het voor doet   Dit is jouw topbaan Als Semantisch Data Modelleur geniet je er van om complexe vraagstukken op te lossen met betrekking tot het toegankelijk krijgen en visualiseren van zeer diverse type datasets  Deze datasets kunnen zowel groot zijn in omvang  als verscheiden in aantallen  betekenis en structuur  Web technologie en Linked Data spelen daarbij een belangrijke rol  In de functie van Semantisch Data Modelleur werk je aan het structureren  modelleren  visualiseren en transformeren van de data  en breng jij ook het technische platform tot stand  Hands on werk wissel je geregeld af met consultancy  je blijft in nauw contact staan met de business  Dit kan variëren van behoeften uitvragen tot adviseren  In het algemeen dus een diverse functie waarin je binnen elke fase van een project actief kunt zijn   Dit ben jij Een vakman met passie voor zijn werk  Iemand die gaat voor kwaliteit en klanttevredenheid  Positief ingesteld en niet bang om fouten te maken  Communicatief vaardig  lef  proactief  resultaatgericht en een sterk analytisch vermogen typeren jou  Je vindt ontwikkeling belangrijk en kijkt daarin verder dan alleen jezelf  Een collegiale teamspeler  die goed zelfstandig kan werken indien nodig   Waar ga je aan de slag Je komt te werken in een unit met tientallen betrokken en ervaren collega s  Professionaliteit en gezelligheid gaan hand in hand  Naast Semantisch Modelleren en Linked Data vind je binnen deze groep ook kennis van Business Intelligence en Data Migratie  Zowel sociaal als vakinhoudelijk is er veel onderling contact  Samen met collega s help jij klanten in diverse branches om data met de juiste context te kunnen delen  combineren en integreren om tot betekenisvolle informatie te komen   HBO  Minimaal 2 jaar relevante werkervaring

skills: marketing, marketo, sap, sql, r, python
job_desc: Mendix is a low code app development platform  First  what is low code  Low code is a visual approach to software development that enables you to abstract and automate every step of the application lifecycle  Gartner predicts that  by 2024  low code application development will be responsible for more than 65  of application development activity   Mendix is repeatedly ranked a Leader in analyst reports from Gartner and Forrester  In the 2021 Gartner  Magic Quadrant for Multiexperience Development Platforms  Mendix placed at the very top of the Leaders quadrant   Mendix  the global leader in enterprise low code  was created to promote collaboration between Business   IT teams  Thousands of forward thinking companies around the world like Ford Auto  Rabobank Netherlands  Zurich Insurance  and Red Bull  can unleash their best ideas faster with the help of the Mendix Platform   Mendix is a Siemens Business   Siemens is a Top 10 Global Software Company and a leader on Fast Company s Most Innovative Companies in the World  With the acquisition of Mendix in 2018  Siemens Digital Industries Software is driving transformation to enhance the digital enterprise where engineering  manufacturing and electronics meet the future of innovation  Mendix employees have the opportunity to work in a hyper growth environment with the support of Siemens  unbeatable market position and resources  As an intern  you will work mainly on two assignments  1  The development of a data monitoring dashboard to help businesses stay in control of data quality issues  Below are the use cases expected to be initially covered on the monitoring platform   Consistency in prediction scores across the Mendix systems Relationship Integrity between salesforce contacts and accounts Consistency between user profile data Completeness of accounts records across the different Mendix systems Reconciliation of Mendix and Siemens contracts Type of data issues include  Data accuracy  comparing against a set of rules  Data consistency  comparing against a corresponding dataset  Missing Incomplete data or records Data integrity issues  checking that data meets certain business rules   2  Assist in making detail technical data documentation of data from source to destination  This includes all data moving from the different source systems  in transit  and to the data lake As data analyst you work on data collection  data mining  preprocessing and analysis  During this work  you will tackle technical mathematical and statistical problems  You are contributing to  and part of the Advanced Analytics team  The problem where you work on challenge you to learn the production processes  During this learning period  you investigate how processes can be improved in a data driven manner  When working as a data analyst you take the responsibility to improve the central data warehouse and are responsible for the analytical tools   reports you created   Profile BSc  BEng  MSc or PhD in Data Science  in Engineering or any quantitative or engineering field  econometrics  computer science  etc   Eager to learn about the manufacturing processes and systems Entrepreneurial spirit and drive to succeedCompetitive attitude and the need to constantly keep improving yourself Strong communication skills Some of our projects for Data analysts Advanced analytics is creating a data science platform within Prodrive Technologies which aids and supplements our colleagues in any way possible  For example  by giving them real time insights in various processes  automating time consuming tasks and involving everyone in our data driven vision  Products manufactured by Prodrive Technologies range from smart thermostats and automotive wallboxes to large compute cabinets and gradient amplifiers  To ensure high quality production  all these products have a final  visual inspection step where each product is inspected before it is packed and shipped to customers  Inspections including presence and anomaly detection are automated using the Keras and Tensorflow deep learning libraries where the classification and autoencoders models are developed and trained in house  To improve the factory efficiency even more  these techniques will also be applied to factory data such as cycle times and process parameters for the purpose of diagnostics and predictive analysis  The Prodrive Technologies Mindset Responsibility You don t just go to work  you feel responsible for your project Flexible You decide when  where and how much you want to work Manufacturing You like to think about manufacturability when designing Initiative You don t sit and wait  you have a hands on mentality What we offer Perfect environment for people willing to take full responsibility in a project Unlimited growth opportunities and freedom in taking different roles in different projects Young and dynamic culture Unlimited personal budget for training courses  classes or studies We are open 24 7 and provide lunch  dinner and a company gym We keep management positions to a minimum  so there is virtually no hierarchy Create your future with your own personal development plan Tools and equipment such as an iPhone  iPad and laptop The flexibility to work wherever and how much you want Salary that grows with your performance Opportunity to become a shareholder and entrepreneur in the company Travel allowance based on the days you are actually at Prodrive 31 Holidays Money for retirement Distribution of profits Application steps We ll take a look ask you difficult questions about yourself  Afterwards  others will ask you some more difficult questions about your expertise  We will immediately decide if we will make you an offer after the interviews  When there s enough time left  we will discuss employment conditions directly after the interviews  If you survived everything  only your signature stands between you and being a job_desc: Data AnalistAmsterdam health   technology institute  ahti  is op zoek naar een Data Analist Ahti werkt op het snijvlak van zorg en technologie  We zetten data om in bruikbare inzichten waarmee we complexe problemen kunnen verduidelijken en kunnen adviseren over beter beleid en passende zorg  Als Data Analist zal jij hierin een belangrijke rol gaan spelen Over ahtiDe missie van ahti is om gezondheid en gezondheidszorg te bevorderen  Dit doen wij door technologie  medische kennis en mensen met elkaar te verbinden op het gebied van innovatie   ondernemerschap Ons uiteindelijke doel is het creëren van een betere kwaliteit van zorg  hogere patiënttevredenheid en kostenefficiëncy  triple aim   Samen met en voor beleidsmakers  zorgbetalers  zorgaanbieders en ondernemers werken we aan slimme oplossingen in het altijd uitdagende zorgveld Het datateam van ahti is verantwoordelijk voor de uitvoering van een breed scala projecten waarbij er vaak gebruik gemaakt wordt van CBS microdata  Denk hierbij aan het oplossen van de wachttijden in de ouderenzorg waarbij samengewerkt wordt met zowel wiskundigen als clinici of het ontwerpen van een interactief dashboard waarmee de verspreiding van het COVID 19 virus wordt gevisualiseerd  Deze microdata heeft een zeer complexe structuur en mag vanwege de wet op privacy niet zomaar openbaar gemaakt worden  Als data analist heb je een belangrijke rol om dit in goede banen te leiden Jouw rolJouw rol in het ahti team is het toepassen van jouw programmeerkennis  R  Stata  SPSS  en creativiteit op het gebied van datamanagement en het analyseren van complexe data op maatschappelijke relevante thema s  De projecten worden vrijwel altijd samen met externe partijen uitgevoerd  zoals gemeentes  kennisinstellingen  zorginstellingen en andere organisaties in de zorgsector Onze data activiteiten worden nog volop ontwikkeld  waardoor er veel ruimte is voor jouw ideeën  Naast het verder doorontwikkelen van onze data infrastructuur  het werken binnen bestaande opdrachten zal je ook helpen bij het ontwikkelen van nieuwe business ideeën Kort gezegd  jij bent dé dataexpert op onze zorggerelateerde projecten  in nauwe samenwerking job_title: Sr Analyst/Consultant, Real World Data Solutions
job_desc: At Certara  we accelerate medicines to patients by partnering with life science innovators  In the past 6 years  over 90  of companies that received new drug approvals by the FDA used our software or services  Our integrated and proprietary end to end platform with biosimulation  regulatory science  and market access solutions combined with our strong team of scientists and subject matter experts enable our clients to have  informed decision making   reduced clinical trial burden higher R D productivity improved patient outcomes   increased patient access to medicines accelerated regulatory approval Certara is a global team that fosters and nurtures a diverse and inclusive culture  We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer  The collective sum of our individual differences  life experiences  knowledge  innovation  self expression  and unique capabilities and talent represents a significant part of our culture  our reputation and our achievement  Together with our partners  we use biosimulation and technology enabled services to transform drug discovery and development across all therapeutic areas and innovative therapies  Job Overview  This is a great opportunity for an early career Epidemiologist Pharmaco Epidemiologist Public Health professional to join a team of highly skilled epidemiologists  statisticians  health economists and consultants  The successful candidate will work closely with other senior scientific staff within the company  This position will allow the Senior Analyst  Epidemiologist to deepen his her skills by writing protocols for observational studies using a variety of healthcare databases  primary and secondary data collection  as well as providing scientific and other technical input during conception  conduct and delivery of various research projects  Main tasks   responsibilities Support RWDS project teams and be accountable to the project manager director for those projects Summarize and synthesize a wide range of medical and statistical information  including disease specific and pharmaceutical product research Develop an understanding of Regulatory HTA requirements for RWE  at least in the European and or North American context Support development of study documents  eg  protocols  analysis plans  reports  posters  manuscripts  under guidance from scientific team members and project manager s Liaise and manage processes with ethics committees  application committees and other relevant stakeholders to support acquisition of data for studies Interpret and communicate the results of clinical observational studies  health economic models  cost effectiveness and budget impact  and statistical analyses Undertake primary and secondary research initiatives including the retrieval and analysis of data  competitive product pipeline information  epidemiology trends  etc  according to needs of the project Participates in production of reports  presentations and publications  Critically analyzes data  presents results and provides internal data analysis  both qualitative and quantitative  and provides strategic thinking with respect to interpretation of results Interact with and foster relationships with existing network of scientific clinical payer experts and data providers Liaise with other consultants assigned to the project to ensure quality delivery of the project Support senior personnel with activities required for business development from time to time Align with and work within the framework of SOPs for data governance with respect to projects led Required Qualifications   Experience Minimum of Master s Degree in Epidemiology  Public Health  Medicine or other related field At least 2 years relevant post graduate work experience preferred Required Skills Professional proficiency in English  written and spoken Experience designing writing protocol for database or other observational studies Ability to work both independently and as part of the team Ability to effectively prioritize and manage multiple tasks and projects OTHER INFORMATION  This position can be office based or work from home in the UK  EU  Canada or USA  Number of Employees Supervised  None Percentage of Travel Required  0 10  travel Certara bases all employment related decision on merit  taking into consideration qualifications  skills  achievement  and performance  We treat all applicants and employees without regard to personal characteristics such as race  color  ethnicity  religion  sex  sexual orientation  age  nationality  marital status  pregnancy  physical or mental condition  genetic information  military service  or other characteristic protected by law   LI HM  LI Remote 2199

werkvloer durf jij dan ook het initiatief te nemen om deze ideeën uit te voeren  Als zo n idee dan toch even anders uitpakt dan verwacht  is dat helemaal niet erg  Daar leren we allemaal weer van  Jij weet data op een creatieve manier begrijpelijk te maken voor onze klant en voor jouw eigen collega s  In de uitkomsten van jouw data analyse zie jij dan ook kansen waar je naar handelt  Daarnaast heb job_title: Data Science - Product Analytics and Inference
skills: ai, apache, spark, saas, network, marketing, scala, python, r, hadoop, sql, excel
job_desc: At Databricks  we are obsessed with enabling data teams to solve the world s toughest problems  from security threat detection to cancer drug development  We do this by building and running the world s best data and AI infrastructure platform  so our customers can focus on the high value challenges that are central to their own missions   Founded in 2013 by the original creators of Apache Spark  Databricks has grown from a tiny corner office in Berkeley  California to a global organization with over 1000 employees  Thousands of organizations  from small to Fortune 100  trust Databricks with their mission critical workloads  making us one of the fastest growing SaaS companies in the world   Our engineering teams build highly technical products that fulfill real  important needs in the world  We constantly push the boundaries of data and AI technology  while simultaneously operating with the resilience  security and scale that is critical to making customers successful on our platform   We develop and operate one of the largest scale software platforms  The fleet consists of millions of virtual machines  generating terabytes of logs and processing exabytes of data per day  At our scale  we regularly observe cloud hardware  network  and operating system faults  and our software must gracefully shield our customers from any of the above   As a Data Scientist on the Data Team  you will help build a data driven culture within Databricks by helping solve product and business challenges  The Data team also functions as a in house  production  customer  that dogfoods Databricks and drives the future direction of the products   The impact you will have  Shape the direction of some of our key data science areas for 2020   usage forecasting  product analytics  user behavior and funnel analysis  Work closely with Product Management  Sales  Customer Success and other stakeholders to understand product usage patterns and trends and to make data services firms in navigating a clear and strategic path through the complex and fragmented global regulatory space  Our solutions and services help firms meet regulatory deadlines while optimizing compliance data  operations  and technology  CSS covers a full range of global compliance disciplines spanning fund reporting  transaction reporting  investment monitoring  compliance management  compliance services and managed services with a complementary  centralized approach to the strategic management of regulatory data called RBOR  Regulatory Book of Record   For more information on CSS  please visit  www cssregtech com  About the role CSS is looking for an experienced Data Analyst who is passionate about building software products and services that solve and simplify customer business problems  The ideal candidate will currently be working in the RegTech   FinTech space as a product or business analyst  or indeed be working in the investment industry for an investment management firm or third party fund administrator   service provider as a business analyst with direct exposure and interaction with financial market data with respect to the global asset management industry  The role will specifically appeal to a person that has high attention to detail and enjoys working in a fast paced strategic environment with direct exposure to the market  clients  prospects  sales   marketing  on one side  and will work very closely with the internal delivery teams  implementation  on the other  About the team The successful candidate will join a dynamic environment working with cross functional teams  specifically Professional Services  to evaluate  triage  and make recommendations for remediation of financial market data requirements and configuration across client portfolios  Skills and competencies  the ideal candidate will have  The following are key facets of the duties and responsibilities connected to this role  Collaborate on the team effort to gather and document data requirements for our Investment Monitoring platform  including client data validation  remediation recommendations  and configuration seeking clearly defined acceptance criteria  Gain a deep understanding of customer experience working closely with the client implementation and services teams to identifying and filling data gaps  and generate new ideas that grow market share  improve customer experience and drive growth  Assist the product management team maintain the relevant product feature backlog and roadmap  as well as feeding into the process of prioritization of tickets for each product sprint based on service team  market  and customer impact Requisite ability and initiative to  o Perform product data analytics related to filing workflows using large volume data feeds from upstream financial systems o Perform analysis related to business user workflow requirements and calculations to determine gaps between product solution and regulatory requirements o Translate regulatory technical standard requirements provided by regulator competent authorities or in house regulatory guidance team into functional requirements that will be used by our system architects and developers Along with the product owner managers  act as a product evangelist to build awareness and understanding of the product within the CSS Professional Services and the market space that Investment Monitoring serves  Represent the company by visiting customers to solicit feedback on company products and services  Feed into the process where we develop clear strategic vision for our product  Assist with product demonstrations and presentations to internal and external audiences   including supporting sales as a product SME  Requirements Strong financial data analysis capabilities  Data management  Data Sourcing  ETL  Data Schema  model  and Data Field mapping  Strong analytical and data requirement documentation skills  Experience with data modelling and data mapping Experience with security master or data warehouse projects  and or experience of financial reporting projects  Ability to quickly learn and deliver with limited oversight Very high attention to detail Ability to work with multiple internal parties  Sales  Product  Dev  Support  etc   to prioritize activities and execute implementation Desired Skills Client facing implementation and project execution Financial Regulation expertise knowledge Knowledge of sensitive industries  shareholder disclosure  exchange position limit guidelines Fund administrator system knowledge  client setup and maintenance  Knowledge of Bloomberg Project management tools  JIRA  Microsoft Project  Salesforce  SharePoint  System implementation experience For immediate consideration  send your CV Resume to  careers cssregtech com Please include the job title in the subject line of your e mail  CSS is an equal opportunity employer

Technologie en IT Boxtel 38   38 uur What do you do as a Data Analyst   As a Data Analyst you will play a big part in our Vion Business Analytics Competence Center  VBACC   Vion aims to become a data driven organization  The further development of a Vion wide Azure data platform is a key step in doing so  You will act as the bridge between the business stakeholders and the development team  Data engineers  Data modelers  Front end specialists  You will work in an Agile environment where you discuss requirements with business stakeholders  translate them into solution designs  plan the deliverables  and work as part of the development team towards a successful result  You will perform exploratory data analysis  identify and perform data quality checks  and are able to communicate findings clearly to the relevant stakeholders in the organization  Top 100 food company Every day 100 million consumers worldwide eat a meal with a little bit of Vion  This quantity comes with a big responsibility  At Vion we work passionately every day on the global food challenge  feeding 9 billion people in 2050  How can you contribute to this  The main responsibilities of the role can be described as follows  create the bridge between the business stakeholders and the development team  you gather requirements in the business for dashboards   reports and translate them into appropriate solution designs  you provide technical support to developers in the business and plan the deliverables  you will standardize  optimize and safeguard the Vion processes and dashboard functionalities like designs  scripting  presentation choices  test findings  availability and authorizations in collaboration with the other BI team members  the BI Product Owners  the MDM team and the department IM T  you will contribute to and guide the reporting questions and projects based on your BI knowledge and business affinity  you give solicited and unsolicited advice to the BI Product Owners and Management in the field of BI process improvements and data quality  you perform exploratory data analysis  you will identify and perform data validation and communicate the findings to the relevant stakeholders to improve business processes What do we expect from you  you have a Master s degree in IT or technical subject  you have a minimum 3 years of experience with business analysis and data analysis  you have experience with the Agile and Scrum way of working and with Data warehousing and Business intelligence projects  knowledge of SQL  Python  Microsoft Azure  data visualization tools  strong communication skills both verbal and written and fluent in Dutch and English  strong analytical skills  you are able to structure and solve both conceptual and concrete problems  pro active  pragmatic  customer oriented  hands on mentality with regards to data  team player with good social skills  What can you expect from us  In our company you will have an attractive  versatile and permanent position  with proven suitability  within a leading international food company  with around 12 400 employees worldwide  innovative market concepts and clear core values  You will be able to influence and shape Vion s digital transition  We offer excellent working conditions and an inspiring environment to work in and an enthusiastic team  Are you interested   In case you think you are the right candidate to become our new colleague  or would you like to have more information about this position  Share your talents with us by sending your application letter and resume via the apply de verandering in de juiste richting mogelijk te maken en eMobility e asy te maken voor onze klanten  Wat je doet  Organiseer en analyseer gegevens en maak rapporten om  Geef het management inzicht in prestatie indicatoren  Geef inzicht in datakwaliteit en verbeteractiviteiten  Impactanalyses  bijv  getroffen klantgroepen  van voorgestelde wijzigingen uit te voeren  Het adviseren van de business over de relevantie van datakwaliteit  hoe te verbeteren en gebruik te maken van de gegenereerde data  Identificeren van procesverbeteringen op basis van data analyse  Het opzetten en onderhouden van een meetsysteem om gecreëerde waarde als gevolg van verandering te valideren  Opzetten en onderhouden van een meetsysteem om continu de bedrijfsgereedheid van eindgebruikers te meten  Voer ad hoc analyses uit in het geval van zakelijke kansen of problemen  Uw team  Het team van Eneco eMobility opereert internationaal en bestaat uit 175 medewerkers verspreid over drie landen  In Team Change Management werken 6 collega s in Nederland en 3 collega s in Duitsland  Functie eisen Wij hebben zeer gemotiveerde mensen in dienst die werken aan een bijzonder goed product  Daarom is niet iedereen fit  Controleer of je jezelf herkent in deze kenmerken   Je houdt ervan om de core business van eMobility te begrijpen en na te denken over hoe data inzichten de resultaten kunnen verhogen  Je bent gewend om de business proactief te adviseren over het maken van managementrapportages  Datakwaliteit is belangrijk voor u  Het opleiden van het bedrijf over het belang en het onderzoeken van de datakwaliteit is een typisch iets dat je op een vrijdagmiddag zou doen  Je bent 40 uur per week beschikbaar  Je spreekt  over de grens   Engels toch  Ook Duits  Perfect   Je hebt ervaring met PowerBI  Wij kiezen voor hybride werk  Dat betekent dat je twee dagen op kantoor  bij voorkeur Rotterdam  werkt  de plek waar je je collega s ontmoet  De andere dagen werk je vanuit huis  Zo flexibel  Uiteraard zorgen wij voor de juiste faciliteiten voor uw thuiswerkplek  We offer you  All terms and conditions of employment are well arranged  Nevertheless  we think it is also crucial to have additional focus on keeping energized as this can be expected from a charging company  The pace is high and eMobility is moving fast  Aspects as fun  personal development  appreciation  mental and physical fitness are equally or even more important than speed

Position  Data Analyst   Product Location  Amsterdam About CSS CSS is a trusted global RegTech partner that uniquely brings together innovative technology  driven solutions to support financial services firms in navigating a clear and strategic path through the complex and fragmented global regulatory space  Our solutions and services help firms meet regulatory deadlines while optimizing compliance data  operations  and technology  CSS covers a full range of global compliance disciplines spanning fund reporting  transaction reporting  investment monitoring  compliance management  compliance services and managed services with a complementary  centralized approach to the strategic management of regulatory data called RBOR  Regulatory Book of Record   For more information on CSS  please visit  www cssregtech com  About the role CSS is looking for an experienced Data Analyst who is passionate about building software products and services that solve and simplify customer business problems  The ideal candidate will currently be working in the RegTech   FinTech space as a product or business analyst  or indeed be working in the investment industry for an investment management firm or third party fund administrator   service provider as a business analyst with direct exposure and interaction with financial market data with respect to the global asset management industry  The role will specifically appeal to a person that has high attention to detail and enjoys working in a fast paced strategic environment with direct exposure to the market  clients  prospects  sales   marketing  on one side  and will work very closely with the internal delivery teams  implementation  on the other  About the team The successful candidate will join a dynamic environment working with cross functional teams  specifically Professional Services  to evaluate  triage  and make recommendations for remediation of financial market data requirements and configuration across client portfolios  Skills and competencies  the ideal candidate will have  The following are key facets of the duties and responsibilities connected to this role  Collaborate on the team effort to gather and document data requirements for our Investment Monitoring platform  including client data validation  remediation recommendations  and configuration seeking clearly defined acceptance criteria  Gain a deep understanding of customer experience working closely with the client implementation and services teams to identifying and filling data gaps  and generate new ideas that grow market share  improve customer experience and drive growth  Assist the product management team maintain the relevant product feature backlog and roadmap  as well as feeding into the process of prioritization of tickets for each product sprint based on service team  market  and customer impact Requisite ability and initiative to  o Perform product data analytics related to filing workflows using large volume data feeds from upstream financial systems o Perform analysis related to business user workflow requirements and calculations to determine gaps between product solution and regulatory requirements o Translate regulatory technical standard requirements provided by regulator competent authorities or in house regulatory guidance team into functional requirements that will be used by our system architects and developers Along with the product owner managers  act as a product evangelist to build awareness and understanding of the product within the CSS Professional Services and the market space that Investment Monitoring serves  Represent the company by visiting customers to solicit feedback on company products and services  Feed into the process where we develop clear strategic vision for our product  Assist with product demonstrations and presentations to internal and external audiences   including supporting sales as a product SME  Requirements Strong financial data analysis capabilities  Data management  Data Sourcing  ETL  Data Schema  model  and Data Field mapping  Strong analytical and data requirement documentation skills  Experience with data modelling and data mapping Experience with security master or data warehouse projects  and or experience of financial reporting projects  Ability to quickly learn and deliver with limited oversight Very high attention to detail Ability to work with multiple internal parties  Sales  Product  Dev  Support  etc   to prioritize activities and execute implementation Desired Skills Client facing implementation and project execution Financial Regulation expertise knowledge Knowledge of sensitive industries  shareholder disclosure  exchange position limit guidelines Fund administrator system knowledge  client setup and maintenance  Knowledge of Bloomberg Project management tools  JIRA  Microsoft Project  Salesforce  SharePoint  System implementation experience For immediate consideration  send your CV Resume to  careers cssregtech com Please include the job title in the subject line of your e mail  CSS is an equal opportunity employer

einddoel is om ervoor te zorgen dat alle stamdata compleet is  zodat bij PLUS alle processen van bijvoorbeeld Forecasting   Replenishment en verkoop en facturatie foutloos verlopen  Jouw taken in het
