Wil jij in een snelgroeiende organisatie werken en heb jij een passie voor privacy  Dan ben jij misschien wel onze nieuwe bedrijfsjurist data privacy  Wat doet een bedrijfsjurist data privacy bij CentralpointCentralpoint is een commerciële en snelgroeiende organisatie  waardoor je als bedrijfsjurist continu wordt geconfronteerd met juridische vraagstukken die nieuw voor je zijn  We zijn op zoek naar een gedreven  pragmatische en vooruitstrevende bedrijfsjurist die ons gaat ondersteunen bij de spannende reis die voor ons ligt  Als bedrijfsjurist data privacy maak je deel uit van de juridische afdeling van Centralpoint  De afdeling geeft advies over een breed scala aan juridische kwesties  waaronder corporate affairs  commerciële contracten en privacy  Jouw focus ligt op privacy en je werkt nauw samen met al onze business units en groepsfuncties  Je bent een teamspeler met een proactieve en klantgerichte instelling die voortgang borgt en goed communiceert  Je kunt juridisch advies vertalen in acties die bedrijfswaarde opleveren en positieve verandering stimuleren  Waar draag je aan bij   In deze rol bied je juridische expertise op het gebied van gegevensbescherming en privacy  begeleiding en directe ondersteuning voor de operationele uitvoering  inclusief bijvoorbeeld het bijhouden van ons verwerkingsregister  documentatie van de privacy rechtelijke grondslag  het uitvoeren van data privacy impact assessments  het bijwerken van het integriteitsbeleid en het uitvoeren van transfer impact assessments    Je biedt gedegen  praktische begeleiding en oplossingen en werkt hierin nauw samen met je collega s Je onderhoudt  creëert en implementeert zaken op het gebied van gegevensbescherming en beveiliging Je voert trainingen en bewustwordingsactiviteiten uit en bent verantwoordelijk voor onze beoordeling van nieuws over privacy Je zoekt continu naar verbetering van de juridische werkprocessen en zorgt er ook daadwerkelijk voor dat de verbeterslag wordt doorgevoerd Je weet je standpunt duidelijk te verwoorden  daarbij houd je de commerciële belangen van ons bedrijf altijd in het oog en stel je continu controlevragen om te toetsen of jouw  juridische  aannames aansluiten op de  praktische  werkelijkheid Het team De Legal afdeling is verantwoordelijk voor het reviewen  adviseren en ondersteunen van alle juridische aangelegenheden  Jij bent onderdeel van de Legal afdeling binnen Centralpoint  deze afdeling opereert vanuit Nijmegen en werkt vanuit daar samen met alle medewerkers en partners van onze locaties in Aarschot  BE   Wijchen en Nijmegen  Je zal deels in Nijmegen werken en deels remote  Omdat Centralpoint deel uitmaakt van de Dustin Group  krijg je ook de kans om samen te werken met collega s van het Nordic Legal Team  gevestigd in Zweden  Noorwegen  Denemarken en Finland  Wat neem je mee  We zoeken iemand die procesgericht is  die het leuk vindt om nauw samen te werken met collega s en pragmatisch kan werken  Wat we verder belangrijk vinden is  Je hebt een juridische hbo of wo opleiding afgerond  zoals hbo rechten of een master in de rechten Je hebt minimaal 2 3 jaar juridische werkervaring bij een advocatenkantoor of Overview   Job Description   We are looking for a Data Operations Analyst to join our expanding Operations Analysis team  With your strong analytical skills and an eye for detail  you will be responsible for collecting  documenting  and analysing internal and external sources of data  You will identify new analytics trends  opportunities to drive innovation and new data sources  next to the development of analytical models and insightful business reports and dashboards You will be based at our European headquarters in Amersfoort and will report to the Senior Operations Analyst  You will be working together with all operations related departments  such as Engineering  IT  Quality  Maintenance  and Manufacturing  Key Responsibilities Creating and automating KPIs  metrics and reports for all Operations related departments Develop and maintain reports in Power BI to provide new insights to drive business decisions Working closely with Software developers in the development and deployment of HANA views  SQL tables  setting up APIs and other dataflows by defining requirements and testing Initiating quality data improvements in the use of webapps  SAP and other software tools by identifying outliers in the data and analysing trends Conducting research and investigating existing business processes to identify bottlenecks and make them visible in data representation tools  like PowerBI  Excel  Visio and others  Communicating findings in an effective and efficient manner to customers and users  Develop and implement improvement proposals using data driven frameworks Advocate for use of data driven methodologies Participate in interdepartmental process improvements and projects as Subject Matter Expert for data analysis Requirements  Bachelor s degree  Operations research or Analytics  1 3 years of experience with data analysis Strong affinity with Operations Excellent reporting and analytical skills using Excel Knowledge of database software power BI is preferred Knowledge of ERP software  SAP is preferred Excellent oral and written communication skills in English Flexible and able to multi task Currently living in The Netherlands and entitled to work within the EU We Offer  A hybrid workplace  where you can work partially from home  except for operational vacancies  A diverse and international company culture  with over 35 different nationalities Opportunities for professional and personal development as we believe in continuous learning Onsite group exercise classes and health activities Community outreach and volunteer opportunities Reimbursement of relocation expenses Naturally  we offer a good remuneration package including pension and 27 vacations days At Applied Medical  we are committed to make a meaningful  positive difference  each and every day  Within our European headquarters in Amersfoort  NL   we develop  manufacture and support the implementation of our advanced medical devices across Europe and the MENA region  Applied s team members enjoy working in an environmentally friendly and international environment  in which people of diverse backgrounds are valued  challenged  and acknowledged  We support our team members by giving them opportunities of ongoing learning and education  possibilities to take part in community volunteering activities and a variety of onsite exercise classes and health activities  If you are passionate about working in an organization that allows you to make decisions based upon what is right for the patient  customer  community and environment  Applied Medical is the place for you  Interested  Would you like to be part of our expanding team  If the answer is yes  we d love to get to know you and look forward to hearing from you  For more information regarding our hiring process  click here  If you have any questions  feel free to contact us via recruitment eu appliedmedical com or  31  0 33 7548713 Not the right job for you  Take a look at our other vacancies and follow us on LinkedIn  As a healthcare company  it s of the utmost importance to keep our teams safe and healthy in this ever changing COVID 19 environment  We highly encourage our team members to get vaccinated to help protect each other  our families  our customers  and our visitors  as we work together to help end the pandemic

Publish Date  Mar 20  2022 Location  Amsterdam  Amsterdam  NL Netherlands Company  Atos  Are you an experienced SAP MDG Consultant who is fluent in Dutch and English Languages  If so we have just the role for you   Within Atos Netherlands we are currently expanding our SAP Practice and are looking for an experienced SAP MDG Consultant to join our team  You have a deep knowledge of business processes and are able to support our commercial staff with presales activities  As a professional  you bring along a vibrant SAP network and you have a feeling for commercial opportunities   Of course  we don t need to tell you what an SAP MDG Consultant does  but we can tell you about SAP the Atos way   Being a SAP MDG Consultant at Atos is a challenging role that will vary with each different project  but fundamentally you will be involved in the presales  design  specification  build  test  and launch phases of the required SAP solution at each client  Some recent projects included  Improving sales and operations planning at a top pharmaceutical  using SAP IBP  Realigning logistic and maintenance processes at a government organization   Setting up an automated warehouse for spare airplane parts for a major airline  using SAP EWM  Developing analytics for reporting on corporate social responsibility of a large multinational   Translating desired organizational results into financial and operational resource requirements at a leading manufacturing organization   Realization of Carve Outs of international companies  Transformations from ECC environments to S 4 for a range of companies  Worldwide SAP rollouts for several leading international companies  Developing interfaces for a well known Dutch brewery The team and Atos  Just like you  our SAP consultants all possess just the right blend of technical expertise and eye for business  combined with a passion to deliver world class solutions to our customers  Together we are a team and therefore value each members  input  Your ideas and vision as an Atos SAP professional will help to shape the future of our SAP Practice  Join our winning team of over 700 SAP professionals in our region   Our company culture is down to earth  open  professional and inquisitive  It s easy to see that we love to learn  and that we love to share knowledge  For that reason  we continually invest in our employees  knowledge  In fact  our senior and junior SAP consultants enjoy mutual coaching and hereby both broaden each other s knowledge and horizons  Not only that  but we also pay it forward  Atos stimulates IT knowledge at HBO s and universities through local IT projects  Our consultants can work together with students on exciting projects in robotics  supply chain  image recognition and more   And did you know that Atos is the Olympic Games  IT partner  As a consultant you can be there  And that s just one of our international opportunities  at Atos we encourage our employees to take on international projects if they so desire    Atos heeft niet alleen specifieke SAP kennis  maar werkt ook nauw samen met de andere afdelingen  Hierdoor brengen ze enorm veel kennis  ervaring en mogelijkheden mee naar de klant  Ook doordat het SAP netwerk over verschillende landen rijkt kun je met internationale collega s samenwerken en zo veel gevarieerde en leuke projecten doen    Who are you   As an experienced SAP MDG Consultant you know your skills and we don t need to bore you with a lengthy list of requirements  In a nutshell   The data management consultant will define strategies  develop and deliver solutions that enable the collection  processing and management of information from one or more sources  and the subsequent delivery of information to audiences in support of key business processes  This position provides leadership and oversight of the Data Governance objectives and policies  procedures  You are expected to have   Hands on experience leading data definitions development  data quality improvements  data model updates and collaborating with multi functional teams comprised of client groups  project teams and IT organizations   Hands on experience Identifying  assessing and solving complex business problems for areas of responsibility  where analysis of situations or data requires an in depth evaluation of variable factors   Experience collaborating data with owners and users analysts across the customer operations to modify or implement new repeatable and reliable businesses processes to improve and sustain effective  data governance resulting in improved quality and consistency of data used to drive key business decisions   Experience working closely with Data Architects to ensure changes are appropriately synchronized with the metadata strategy and logical data model   Experience in working across business technology teams to ensure alignment between business solution definition   systems architecture for the organization   Experience working with SAP FI CO  MM  SD  PP or PM and Master Data  required  Experience in S 4 environment is highly appreciated   3 years of experience in Master data management with expertise in implementing SAP Master Data Governance  MDG    Experience in complex  international  SAP environments supporting multiple components preferred   What we offer you  A good salary and attractive extra legal benefits  like an end of year allowance and a pension scheme   A casual working atmosphere with results focused colleagues and a committed manager  29 days annual leave plus bank holidays  A lease car or mobility budget  Flexible working comes in many forms at Atos  From part time working arrangements to flexibility in where you work  when you work  and how you work  The opportunity to work on complex projects for attractive clients where you can develop yourself  Excellent  international  career opportunities  Comprehensive training and development programs  At Atos  our ambition is to be a diverse and inclusive company where people are truly free to be themselves  They can thrive  achieve their personal goals and innovate without limitations  We welcome everyone to apply   Family friendly  flexible working arrangements will be considered across all roles

job_desc: The Bertelsmann Future Leaders Graduate Program enables you to take on responsibility in your career  As a data science trainee  you will enjoy infinite Big Data opportunities within an 18 month rotational program  If you have a curious mind  a knack for problem solving and profound knowledge of machine learning methods  join our graduate program to kickstart your career  Your Benefits International work experience Building an international network Individual career coaching Targeted training As a Data Science Trainee you will For 18 months  work with international teams throughout Bertelsmann divisions worldwide Crack complex data challenges arising in our media  services and education businesses Add your knowledge and experience by designing new data products Learn from renowned data scientists and explore new use cases for Machine Learning and AI Leverage new data sources and integrate traditional structured data with raw data What you ll need to bring  Master s or doctoral degree in data science  computer science  statistics  engineering  applied mathematics  physics or a similar subject Advanced knowledge of data science and machine learning methods Solid coding skills in Python and or R  SAS  Scala  Spark  C C   and or Java are a plus Knowledge of database concepts and design as well as related tools such as SQL  NoSQL and Hive Problem solving mindset with strong relationship building  collaborative and communication skills Data driven with determination  Make your move  Join our graduate program  Application deadline  April 3  2022 We welcome applications from people who contribute to the diversity of our company  Contact We look forward to receiving your application  Should you have any questions about the Graduate Program or the application process  please get in touch  Steffi Heldberg  s heldberg at bertelsmann de  or Kai Uwe Krotoschak  k krotoschak at bertelsmann de  are happy to help  www futureleaders data com Your future employer Bertelsmann is a media  services and education company that operates in about 50 countries around the world  It includes the broadcaster RTL Group  the trade book publisher Penguin Random House  the music company BMG  the service provider Arvato  the Bertelsmann Printing Group  the Bertelsmann Education Group and Bertelsmann Investments  an international network of funds  The company has around 130 000 employees and generated revenues of  17 3 billion in the 2020 financial year  Bertelsmann stands for creativity and entrepreneurship  This combination promotes first class media content and innovative service solutions that inspire customers around the world  Bertelsmann aspires to achieve climate neutrality by 2030  Disclosure requirements pertaining to the collection of your personal data  Responsible for processing the information provided in your application  Bertelsmann SE   Co  KGaA  Carl Bertelsmann Str  270  33311 Gu tersloh   Bertelsmann    who may also assign this task to third party service providers  Bertelsmann will process your data as provided for by Section 26 1  sentence 1 of the German Federal Data Protection Act  BDSG new  for the purpose of conducting the application and selection process for the Bertelsmann Future Leaders Program   based on reviewing your curriculum vitae  a position based selection test  a first round of interviews  and an assessment day  Following from your declaration of consent pursuant to Section 26 2  of the German Federal Data Protection Act  BDSG new   selected representatives of other group alliance members will take part in the staffing decision and interviews  Based on Article 49 1  a of the General Data Protection Regulation  GDPR   your personal data will be transmitted to recipients in third countries  non EU member states   In the a sence of an adequacy decision or suitable guarantees for ensuring an appropriate level of data protection for the processing of your data by these countries and their service providers the respective companies will treat your data confidentially  At the above address you can revoke your authorization for the use of your data at any time with immediate effect  contact Bertelsmann s data protection officer  or request a copy of these undertakings  For further information on data protection for the Bertelsmann Future Leaders Program  see www DSM   Bright Science  Brighter Living   Royal DSM is a global  purpose led  science based company active in Nutrition  Health and Sustainable Living  DSM s purpose is to create brighter lives for all  DSM addresses with its products and solutions some of the world s biggest challenges while simultaneously creating economic  environmental and societal value for all its stakeholders   customers About Booking com  At Booking com  data drives our decisions  Technology is at our core  And innovation is everywhere  But our company is more than datasets  lines of code or A B tests  We re the thrill of the first night in a new place  The excitement of the next morning  The friends you make  The journeys you take  The sights you see  And the food you sample  Through our products  partners and people  we make it easier for everyone to experience the world   With over 1 6 million room nights booked every day  accommodation represents the largest share of our business to date  Our mission is to deliver the best customer experience and the most varied selection of properties   At Booking com we combine the best traits of a start up with the resources of planet Earth s  1 accommodation website  We are working towards creating the ultimate travel experience  building and improving great products for both travelers and the accommodation partners   About the Accommodations Business Unit  We are responsible for the design   delivery of services and products to offer customers the best selection of properties and rooms  Our products   services are available on the Web  Mobile and API platforms  and span over all aspects of Booking com accommodation business   from getting inventory from partners to displaying rooms to our customers  Our focus area is to provide customers with the best selection of properties   rooms by understanding customer intent  getting more relevant properties and rooms  and using existing inventory as effectively as possible   B Responsible  As a Data Analyst you ll work within an analytics team  and with stakeholders throughout the company  to support data driven decision making  You ll spend your time translating business problems into data problems that you then solve with your expertise in wrangling data  running appropriate analyses  and communicating complex ideas to a range of stakeholders  You ll help us to unlock the power of our data by designing and maintaining key reports  metrics and workflows to ensure the right information is available to the right people at the right time  Your focus will always be on business impact  with a strong bias towards pragmatism over perfection   Important aspects of the job include  Work independently on data collection and preparation  Use past experience  and seek for help in complex scenarios  to translate business problems into data stories Maintain and drive key reports  metrics and workflows running within your scope  Be able to communicate results and outcomes clearly to stakeholders based on your knowledge and experience  Communicate effectively  collaboratively and challenge constructively to create rapport and establish trust  Actively participate in business and or analytics team activities and suggest ways of achieving objectives  standup  planning meeting  retrospectives  Network and proactively connect with craft peers beyond the team scope Use previous knowledge and experience on data analysis and visualization to answer business questions in the most efficient way Be familiar with the larger data ecosystem at Booking and how it relates to your data and the work you do  Collaborate and be open to giving and receiving feedback with peers and direct stakeholders  Be flexible in adopting and proposing new approaches and expanding your technical competencies when a more efficient way presents itself  Get significant deep knowledge about the operational  tactical and strategic workings of the department  Maintain a main focus on business and technical opportunities  We have found that people who match the following requirements are the ones who fit us best  Driven and results oriented personality Open to feedback and always looking for ways to improve your own performance Able to understand details while keeping an eye on the bigger picture Analytical and curious mindset Strong interpersonal skills Open and friendly attitude Strong knowledge and experience on data analysis  Experience in data management  data visualization and quality  Knowledge and experience using data analysis and visualization tools  e g  tableau  data studio  powerbi  mixpanel  etc  Knowledge and experience with at least one data analysis language  SQL at least  Python or similar is a bonus  Is flexible in adopting and proposing new approaches and expanding their technical competencies when a more efficient way presents itself  Experience in  or awareness of  an experimentation culture Awareness of statistical models used within their scope B Offered Headquarters located in one of the most vibrant cities in Europe  Amsterdam Contributing to a high scale  complex  world renowned product and seeing real time impact of your work on millions of travellers worldwide Working in a fast paced and performance driven culture Opportunity to utilize technical expertise  leadership capabilities and entrepreneurial spirit Promote and drive impactful and innovative engineering solutions Technical  behavioural and interpersonal competence advancement via on the job opportunities  experimental projects  hackathons  conferences and active This is going to be your job Within APG AM Operations the Master Data Management Team  MDM Team   sources  enriches  assures  and publishes Master Data via the MDM platform to ensure delivery of ready to use data to customers throughout APG AM  The MDM team continuously improves their processes to make them as efficient as possible and strives to be a leader in automation and the leveraging of the global company footprint  The team consists out of multiple data domains and is multi international  For one of the domains we are hiring a Data Service Officer  Your main responsibilities  Roll out of the business service model for our data vendors  Deliverables are providing a service report  highlighting the services delivered to APG AM in the past period   discussing this report with the vendor and if necessary  defining follow up actions  Part of the monitoring of the services of a data vendor is also translating the contract to the drivers that impact the monthly invoice  For each contract these cost drivers  aka key usage indicators  need to be established and reported internally  Responsible for the entire data vendor contract administration of the Operations department  not limited to the legal agreements but mainly focusing on related docs  such as policy docs  price schedules  service descriptions  service reports  Yearly review of existing contracts  defining the compliance and cost drivers and establish whether the actual usage of the data is in line with the terms and conditions  Set up of a cost model which makes the costs more transparent as part of management reporting  This is what you offer Have some affinity with the set up of financial models including an initial analysis of the different variables of the model as well a first build of a financial model  e g  in excel   Have sufficient basic consultancy skills  such as analyzing a problem  defining alternatives  preparing presentations  drafting memos etc  The candidate will be involved in multiple meetings with external parties and therefore should have relevant skills to attend service meetings with global service providers  Profile requirements Relevant HBO or academic study  A minimum of 2 5 years of relevant working experience is required  Knowledge of programming languages such as VBA  R or Python is a pre  Have a background in economics or international business  Important hereby is to have good insight in the functioning of the financial and money markets with a basic understanding of the different financial products as well as the related institutions and financial process  Be able to work in different teams  but at the same time show ample maturity to follow up on his own deliverables and involve support when needed  Good communication skills  Language skills  English  excellent  Proactive  result driven  analytical  team player  hands on  client and service oriented  Working under daily time pressure in a dynamic and changing environment is not a problem for you This is where you ll work We offer you a competitive maximum salary of   5 635 based on a 40 hours working week and attractive terms of employment with a focus on flexibility  A guaranteed year end bonus of 8 33  Ample attention to your vitality and personal development Hybrid working  at home and in one of our superb offices And of course a well organized pension  For pension provider APG  pensions are about people  life and how we live together  Through careful asset management  pension administration  communication and advice  APG wants to help build a decent future in which we share our well being and prosperity honestly and sustainably  For present and future generations  For today  tomorrow and beyond  APG is committed to serving 4 7 million people in the Netherlands  That explains the importance we attach to reflecting Dutch society  To that end  APG strives for an inclusive work environment in which everyone can be themselves and their unique qualities are embraced  Choosing APG means choosing a job in which you contribute to a bright future  Don t delay  apply today

Wat ga je doen Master Data Management is het essentiële proces van het managen  centraliseren  ordenen  categoriseren  lokaliseren  synchroniseren en verrijken van Masterdata voor de hele organisatie  Binnen Detailresult zijn wij bezig alle artikel   locatie en leveranciersdata te centreren in een nieuw Master Data systeem  Het migratie proces om te komen van decentrale data naar centrale data is opgebouwd uit meerdere fases om het bedrijfsproces niet te storen  Binnen het multi disciplinaire projectteam dat het migratieproces begeleid is een vacature ontstaan voor een Projectmedewerker Data Management met business analyse vaardigheden  Je bent samen met de projectleider de schakel tussen de business en het ontwikkelteam  Je identificeert  analyseert en specificeert de vereisten van het software test op de business vereisten  Tevens ben je in staat om de ontwikkelde software onderdelen te introduceren in de business  de medewerkers te trainen en ben je de eerste maanden na de livegang het aanspreekpunt voor vragen  Je schrijft in de organisatie handleidingen voor nieuwe software  applicaties en werkwijzen  Deze handleidingen zijn de leidraad voor de afdeling databeheer en maar gezellig als je meegaat  Daarnaast ontvang je goede primaire en secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden  zoals  Afhankelijk van ervaring een salaris tussen de   2  776   en   3 967   per maand excl  8 Als Consultant Data Analytics ben je verantwoordelijk voor het analyseren van HR data  bijvoorbeeld op het gebied van verzuim  arbeidsongeschiktheid en vitaliteit van medewerkers  Met jouw analyses adviseer je samen met onze experts over werkgeversrisico s en kansen op HR gebied en help je de juiste keuzes te maken  Je werkt actief samen met meerdere teams binnen Corporate Wellness  Jij brengt mee HBO of WO werk  en denkniveau Affiniteit met Vitaliteit onder werknemers Overtuigingskracht Je vindt bij ons Werken voor de grootste bedrijven Een zelfstandige rol waarin jij jouw ervaring optimaal aan het werk kan zetten Goede voorwaarden en baas over je eigen tijd Wat ga je doen  Je analyseert wat de trends en ontwikkelingen zijn rondom vitaliteit en veerkracht en kan zo goed signaleren waar de kansen liggen voor de klant  Concreet betekent dit bijvoorbeeld dat je bijdraagt in de advisering van klanten door middel van goede benchmarks en rapporten  zodat zij in staat worden gesteld de juiste beslissingen te nemen  Maar ook dat je voorspellende modellen maakt waarmee klanten inzicht krijgen in de impact van hun keuzes  Daarnaast breng je de impact van verzuim en arbeidsongeschiktheid voor werkgevers in kaart en adviseer je over de impact van te maken financieringskeuzes  Taken en verantwoordelijkheden Je adviseert klanten over de financiële impact van keuzes in vitaliteit  veerkracht  verzuim en arbeidsongeschiktheid  Je verzamelt data uit zowel interne als externe bronnen  UWV  CPB  CBS  en zet deze om naar bruikbare inzichten voor de klant Op basis van data signaleer je impactvolle HR trends voor werkgevers Je bengt structuur aan in data en zorgt ervoor dat inzichten toegankelijk zijn voor klanten en sales Je weet de impact van HR onderwerpen als medewerkersprestaties  personeelsverloop en verzuim inzichtelijk te maken Waar kom je te werken  De afdeling Corporate Wellness Werknemers zijn cruciaal voor continuïteit en winstgevendheid  Door veranderende wetgeving en maatschappelijke ontwikkelingen komt de verantwoordelijkheid van het welzijn en gezondheid voor personeel steeds meer bij de werkgever te liggen  Aon Corporate Wellness werkt vanuit de visie dat investeren in inzetbaarheid en gezondheid bijdraagt aan grotere motivatie en hogere productiviteit van werknemers  lagere verzekerings  en verzuimkosten en beperking van uw risico s   Linking employee wellness to corporate success   De dienstverlening is verdeeld in de thema s Duurzame Inzetbaarheid  Verzuim  Zorg en Gezondheid en WGA en Ongevallen en Veiligheid  Graag wijzen wij je op onze Corporate Story  http   www aon com netherlands employee risk management corporate wellness jsp Over Aon Aon is in the business of better decisions  Wij zorgen ervoor dat onze klanten beter geïnformeerd en geadviseerd worden  om de levens van mensen over de hele wereld te beschermen en te verbeteren Hiermee helpen we onze klanten bij het laten groeien van hun organisatie  Dit doen wij met 2400 collega s in Nederland en in samenwerking met 50 000 collega s in meer dan 120 landen  Wat neem je mee  Minimaal HBO of WO werk  en denkniveauAffiniteit met veerkracht en vitaliteit van medewerkersVakkennis van Wia en sociale wet  en regelgevingJe combineert data inzichten met communicatieve skills op basis waarvan je klanten weet te overtuigen Wat bieden wij jou  Een gevarieerde en uitdagende fulltime baan waarin je jouw ondernemerschap en creativiteit kunt laten zien  Onze werksfeer is informeel  Er is op volop ruimte voor eigen initiatief  studie en persoonlijke ontwikkeling  De beloning die wij er tegenover stellen is zeker marktconform  De uiteindelijke inschaling en hoogte van je salaris zijn afhankelijk van opleiding  kennis en ervaring  Omdat wij bij Aon inzien dat niemand hetzelfde is bieden we naast het vaste bruto maand salaris ook een flexibele salariscomponent dat 19  van je salaris bedraagt  Dit kun je gebruiken voor een verscheidenheid aan doeleinden  o a   als bruto uitbetaling  extra vakantiedagen  extra pensioen of als aanvulling op het inzetbaarheidsbudget  Daarnaast bieden we het volgende  Een aantrekkelijke bonusregelingEen premievrij pensioenEen Publish Date  Mar 20  2022 Location  Amsterdam  Amsterdam  NL Netherlands Company  Atos  Are you an experienced SAP MDG Consultant who is fluent in Dutch and English Languages  If so we have just the role for you   Within Atos Netherlands we are currently expanding our SAP Practice and are looking for an experienced SAP MDG Consultant to join our team  You have a deep knowledge of business processes and are able to support our commercial staff with presales activities  As a professional  you bring along a vibrant SAP network and you have a feeling for commercial opportunities   Of course  we don t need to tell you what an SAP MDG Consultant does  but we can tell you about SAP the Atos way   Being a SAP MDG Consultant at Atos is a challenging role that will vary with each different project  but fundamentally you will be involved in the presales  design  specification  build  test  and launch phases of the required SAP solution at each client  Some recent projects included  Improving sales and operations planning at a top pharmaceutical  using SAP IBP  Realigning logistic and maintenance processes at a government organization   Setting up an automated warehouse for spare airplane parts for a major airline  using SAP EWM  Developing analytics for reporting on corporate social responsibility of a large multinational   Translating desired organizational results into financial and operational resource requirements at a leading manufacturing organization   Realization of Carve Outs of international companies  Transformations from ECC environments to S 4 for a range of companies  Worldwide SAP rollouts for several leading international companies  Developing interfaces for a well known Dutch brewery The team and Atos  Just like you  our SAP consultants all possess just the right blend of technical expertise and eye for business  combined with a passion to deliver world class solutions to our customers  Together we are a team and therefore value each members  input  Your ideas and vision as an Atos SAP professional will help to shape the future of our SAP Practice  Join our winning team of over 700 SAP professionals in our region   Our company culture is down to earth  open  professional and inquisitive  It s easy to see that we love to learn  and that we love to share knowledge  For that reason  we continually invest in our employees  knowledge  In fact  our senior and junior SAP consultants enjoy mutual coaching and hereby both broaden each other s knowledge and horizons  Not only that  but we also pay it forward  Atos stimulates IT knowledge at HBO s and universities through local IT projects  Our consultants can work together with students on exciting projects in robotics  supply chain  image recognition and more   And did you know that Atos is the Olympic Games  IT partner  As a consultant you can be there  And that s just one of our international opportunities  at Atos we encourage our employees to take on international projects if they so desire    Atos heeft niet alleen specifieke SAP kennis  maar werkt ook nauw samen met de andere afdelingen  Hierdoor brengen ze enorm veel kennis  ervaring en mogelijkheden mee naar de klant  Ook doordat het SAP netwerk over verschillende landen rijkt kun je met internationale collega s samenwerken en zo veel gevarieerde en leuke projecten doen    Who are you   As an experienced SAP MDG Consultant you know your skills and we don t need to bore you with a lengthy list of requirements  In a nutshell   The data management consultant will define strategies  develop and deliver solutions that enable the collection  processing and management of information from one or more sources  and the subsequent delivery of information to audiences in support of key business processes  This position provides leadership and oversight of the Data Governance objectives and policies  procedures  You are expected to have   Hands on experience leading data definitions development  data quality improvements  data model updates and collaborating with multi functional teams comprised of client groups  project teams and IT organizations   Hands on experience Identifying  assessing and solving complex business problems for areas of responsibility  where analysis of situations or data requires an in depth evaluation of variable factors   Experience collaborating data with owners and users analysts across the customer operations to modify or implement new repeatable and reliable businesses processes to improve and sustain effective  data governance resulting in improved quality and consistency of data used to drive key business decisions   Experience working closely with Data Architects to ensure changes are appropriately synchronized with the metadata strategy and logical data model   Experience in working across business technology teams to ensure alignment between business solution definition   systems architecture for the organization   Experience working with SAP FI CO  MM  SD  PP or PM and Master Data  required  Experience in S 4 environment is highly appreciated   3 years of experience in Master data management with expertise in implementing SAP Master Data Governance  MDG    Experience in complex  international  SAP environments supporting multiple components preferred   What we offer you  A good salary and attractive extra legal benefits  like an end of year allowance and a pension scheme   A casual working atmosphere with results focused colleagues and a committed manager  29 days annual leave plus bank holidays  A lease car or mobility budget  Flexible working comes in many forms at Atos  From part time working arrangements to flexibility in where you work  when you work  and how you work  The opportunity to work on complex projects for attractive clients where you can develop yourself  Excellent  international  career opportunities  Comprehensive training and development programs  At Atos  our ambition is to be a diverse and inclusive company where people are truly free to be themselves  They can thrive  achieve their personal goals and innovate without limitations  We welcome everyone to apply   Family friendly  flexible working arrangements will be considered across all roles

Zenz Technologies Amsterdam What is required  Academic degree  preferably beta Interested in software and technical knowledge Analytical and communicating skills Proficient command of the English language  preferably Dutch Goal oriented and driven What will you get   3 000    3 500 gross p m  starters salary  Profit sharing scheme 40 hour workweek 25 vacation days Opportunities to follow external trainings and courses Phone  laptop and flexible working  from home  possible As a Consultant Data Science at Zenz Technologies  you work together with clients to give them optimal insight in their data  You do this partly by means of extensive implementation projects  and partly by delivering support once the software has been implemented  Clients are often airlines and train companies  and you work closely together to fully understand their business needs and wishes   As Zenz aims to maintain long term relationships with their clients  it is essential to ensure the client receives high quality support  You do this by building a strong relationship with the clients  stakeholder s  as well as the application users  You can assist clients where needed because you are easily approachable and have extensive knowledge of the software  You understand the coding behind the software and are able to translate the clients wishes into clean code  Besides this  you also host business visits or digital meetings to show the users the software s features  You are the first point of contact for the clients under your responsibility  and the full implementation team or technical colleagues  Therefore  it is important to have business  customer and programming skills  Firsthand experience A train company wants to analyze the load factor of its trains  to maximize the number of tickets sold  and prevent wasted empty seats  How do you help them  Together with the client  you discuss the business need and technical impact  On average a train can be quite empty on a route  but if there is one segment on the route that is already sold out  no one can buy a ticket from the start to the end anymore  Together  you decide that it is more interesting to look at the  maximum load factor   to report per train the load factor of the segment with the highest load factor  With the internal Zenz team you discuss the technical impact  because this customised solution should of course still perform very fast  Depending on your experience and personal preference  you will program the feature or outsource this to a Software Engineer colleague  You keep the client updated on the progress  and will demonstrate the feature once it is unrolled

DSM   Bright Science  Brighter Living   Royal DSM is a global  purpose led  science based company active in Nutrition  Health and Sustainable Living  DSM s purpose is to create brighter lives for all  DSM addresses with its products and solutions some of the world s biggest challenges while simultaneously creating economic  environmental and societal value for all its stakeholders   customers  employees  shareholders  and society at large  DSM delivers innovative solutions for human nutrition  animal nutrition  personal care and aroma  medical devices  green products and applications  and new mobility and connectivity  DSM and its associated companies deliver annual net sales of about  10 billion with approximately 23 000 employees  The company was founded in 1902 and is listed on Euronext Amsterdam  More information can be found at www dsm com At DSM we are striving to make zero touch sales orders possible for our customers  In an industrial setting this is ground breaking  and  in this role  you have an opportunity to be part of this shift To make this goal happen  we need your ability to help create perfect supply chain processes and build perfect IT systems to support those processes  You ll join the Improve Supply Chain Team with a focus on Masterd  and support global business applications for business group DSM Food and Beverage  including end users and managers at various levels in the different Business Units and Regions  To make important next steps in our IT systems you will interact with Group Digital Services Department as well as external software providers Are you experienced in reporting and master data management and do you want to improve our supply chain  Maybe this is a great opportunity for you Key responsibilities Support improvement projects and integration projects in case of acquisitions e g  by gathering requirements  process improvement  writing user stories and test scripts  testing  project implementation and user support  Ensure that the supported business processes and business applications including IT tools are running well  in cooperation with relevant DSM Corporate departments such as Global Digital Services  GDS  as well as 3rd party software suppliers  Ensure standardization and harmonization globally  on Business Group level of processes and tools  Coach  train  coordinate and evaluate the relevant group of Regional Key Users  Act as filter between RKU s and 2nd line support teams  either at corporate or external suppliers We Bring The possibility to work autonomously and with a team in finding the right solutions  The freedom to be creative and proactive  A hybrid workplace  50  office   50  working from home  that offers flexibility to employees across the business  We offer you the possibility to grow and develop yourself professionally and personally  A team of diverse employees who aren t afraid to think outside of the box  A truly global and collaborative team that cares about the experience of our employees You Bring At least 5 years of experience in a similar role in Supply Chain or IT  supported with a Bachelor degree  Have proven and strong knowledge of SAP SD MM PP  BW  EA and PBI  Strong knowledge of the various business processes  especially Demand to Supply Planning  Preferably experience in the process  or food industry  Have experience in co operation in different types of international and diverse organizations  Live within reasonable distance of Delft  The Netherlands or willing to move About us No matter which team you are on  at DSM you ll be part of a powerful shared purpose   to create brighter lives for all  You ll get opportunities to work collaboratively with different departments and industry experts to make a positive difference to the future of millions of people and the planet we all share  Together  we ll understand the needs of every customer and offer solutions that promote their success and impact  today and in the future How to Aan projecten die ertoe doen  Met mensen die dat belangrijk vinden  Want als je weet waarom je iets doet  neemt de waarde enorm toe  Dat is de kern van wie wij zijn  Wij werken aan een toekomst waar iedereen doet waar hij of zij goed in is  Van doen waar je gelukkig van wordt  Van werk dat je aan de volgende generatie uit kunt leggen  Dat is ook de reden waarom wij zélf elke dag weer met veel plezier aan het werk gaan  Olympia geeft werk betekenis  Dat is onze merkbelofte  Wat ga je doen  Olympia groeit  Om deze groei mogelijk te maken is het van belang dat er binnen Olympia meer gedigitaliseerd en geautomatiseerd wordt  Het contact versterken met de uitzendkracht en de klant staat hierin centraal  Slim gebruik maken van data speelt hierbij een essentiële rol  Als Data Scientist help je Olympia om waarde te halen uit data  Typische projecten zijn bijvoorbeeld het ontwikkelen van voorspelmodellen welke klanten leads het meest kansrijk zijn  welke uitzendkrachten of werknemers meer risico op uitstroom hebben  of wat het budget is voor marketing de komende maanden  Je optimaliseert het matchingalgoritme binnen het nieuwe Applicant Tracking System en daarnaast denk en ontwikkelen je mee aan ons data science platform  De mogelijkheden zijn eindeloos en je helpt actief mee kansen te identificeren binnen heel Olympia  Sales  marketing  backoffice  vestigingen  overal liggen kansen   Wie ben je  Voor deze rol zoeken we een collega die samen met ons kan en durft te ondernemen en wil groeien met betekenis  Iemand die ongecompliceerd resultaat boekt en daadwerkelijk verandering en innovatie brengt bij een mooi en sterk merk  De ideale kandidaat  Is een Data Scientist in hart en nieren  Je bent gepassioneerd over je vak  Is 32 40 uur per week pionier  data science is groeiende bij Olympia  Nog niet alles is bedacht en dat betekent een wereld van mogelijkheden waarin je helpt de toekomst te vormen  Is gedreven en ambitieus  je wilt jezelf blijven ontwikkelen  nieuwe dingen leren en het verschil maken  Is proactief en in staat zelf kansen te identificeren waar data science van toegevoegde waarde is binnen de organisatie  Weet dondersgoed dat het draait om resultaten en gaat daar volledig voor  maar wilt ook fijn werken en is bovenal een leuke en gezellige collega om in je team te hebben  Daarnaast beschik je als Data
